GSP33brssbh1u:6: tatrāthābda ānantaryārthaḥ parigṛhyate nādhikārārthaḥ, brahmajijñāsāyāḥ anadhikāryatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:10: sati cānantaryārthatve yathā dharmajijñāsā pūrvavṛttaṃ vedādhyayanaṃ niyamenāpekṣata evaṃ brahmajijñāsāpi yatpūrvavṛttaṃ niyamenāpekṣate tadvaktavyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:15: yathāca hṛdayādyavadānānāmānantaryaniyamaḥ, kramasya vivakṣitatvānna tatheha kramo vivakṣitaḥ, śeṣaśeṣitve 'dhikṛtādhikāre vā pramāṇābhāvāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:19: bhavyaśca dharmo jijñāsyo na jñānakāle 'sti, puruṣavyāpāratantratvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:20: iha tu bhūtaṃ brahma jijñāsyaṃ nityatvānna puruṣavyāpāratantram /
GSP33brssbh1u:22: yā hi codanā dharmasya lakṣaṇaṃ sā svaviṣaye niyuñjānaiva puruṣamavabodhayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:23: brahmacodanā tu puruṣamavabodhayatyeva kevalaṃ, avabodhasya codanājanyatvānna puruṣo 'vabodhe niyujyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:28: teṣu hi satsu prāgapi dharmajijñāsāyā ūrdhvaṃ ca śakyate brahmajijñāsituṃ jñātuṃ ca na viparyaye
GSP33brssbh1u:32: 'tadyatheha karmacito lokaḥ kṣīyata evamevāmutra puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyate'
GSP33brssbh1u:39: brahmaṇa iti karmaṇiṣaṣṭhī na śeṣe, jijñāsāpekṣyatvājjijñāsāyāḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:41: nanu śeṣaṣaṣṭhīparigrahe 'pi brahmaṇo jijñāsākarmatvaṃ na virudhyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:43: evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇaḥ karmatvamutsṛjya sāmānyadvāreṇa parokṣaṃ karmatvaṃ kalpayato vyartha prayāsaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:47: tasminpradhāne jijñāsākarmaṇi parigṛhīte yairjijñāsitairvinā brahma jijñāsitaṃ na bhavati tānyarthākṣiptānyeveti na pṛthaksūtrayitavyāni /
GSP33brssbh1u:48: yathā rājāsau gacchatītyukte saparivārasya rājño gamanamuktaṃ bhavati tadvat /
GSP33brssbh1u:50: 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' (taitti.3.1) ityādyāḥ śrutayaḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:70: yadi hi nātmāstitvaprasiddhiḥ syāt sarvo loko nāhamasmīti pratīyāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:72: yadi tarhi loke brahmātmatvena prasiddhamasti tato jñātamevetyajijñāsyatvaṃ punarāpannam /
GSP33brssbh1u:75: dehamātraṃ caitanyaviśiṣṭamātmeti prakṛtā janā laukāyatikāśca pratipannāḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:82: asti tadvyatirikta īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvāktiriti kecit /
GSP33brssbh1u:87: FN: adhikaraṇamiti- viṣayaḥ saṃdehaḥ saṃgatiḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ siddhānta ityekaikamadhikaraṇaṃ pañcāvayavaṃ jñeyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:89: brahmaṇo hi nivṛttāvaraṇatvena phalarūpatvaṃ tajjñānopayogitayā caturthisamāsa eṣitavyaḥ 'caturthī tadarthe' ityādineti kecit /
GSP33brssbh1u:109: yata iti kāraṇanirdeśaḥ asya jagato nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtasyānekakartṛbhoktṛsaṃyuktasya pratiniyatadeśakālanimittakriyāphalāśrayasya manasāpyacintyaracanārūpasya janmasthitibhaṅgaṃ yataḥ sarvajñātsarvaśakteḥ kāraṇādbhavati tadbrahmeti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:110: anyeṣāmapi bhāvavikārāṇāṃ triṣvevāntarbhāva iti janmasthitināśānāmiha grahaṇam /
GSP33brssbh1u:111: yāskaparipaṭhitānāṃ tu 'jāyate 'sti' ityādīnāṃ grahaṇe teṣāṃ jagataḥ sthitkāle saṃbhāvyamānatvānmūlakāraṇādutpattisthitināśāṃ jagato na gṛhītāḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:112: syurityāśaṅkyeta, tanmā śaṅkīti yotpattirbrahmastatraiva sthitiḥ pralayaśca ta eva gṛhyante
GSP33brssbh1u:113: na yathoktaviśeṣaṇasya jagato yathoktaviśeṣaṇamīśvaraṃ muktvānyataḥ pradhānādacetanādaṇubhyo 'bhāvātsaṃsāriṇo vā utpattyādi saṃbhāvayituṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:122: satsu tu vedāntavākyeṣu jagato janmādikāraṇavādiṣu tadarthagrahaṇadārḍhāyānumānamapi vedāntavākyāvirodhi pramāṇaṃ bhavanna
GSP33brssbh1u:124: tathāhi- 'śrotavyo mantavyaḥ' (bṛha. 2.4.5) iti śrutiḥ 'paṇḍito medhāvī gandhārānevopasaṃpadyetaivamevehācāryavānpuruṣo veda' (chāndo.6.14.2) iti ca puruṣabuddhisāhāyyamātmanor dāyati /
GSP33brssbh1u:125: na dharmajijñāsāyāmiva śrutyādayo 'nubhavādayaśca yathāsaṃbhavamiha pramāṇaṃ anubhavāvasānatvādbhūtavastuviṣayatvācca brahmajñānasya /
GSP33brssbh1u:126: kartavye hi viṣaye nānubhavāpekṣāstīti śrutyādīnāmeva prāmāṇyaṃ syātpuruṣādhīnātmalābhatvācca kartavyasya /
GSP33brssbh1u:127: kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śakyaṃ laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ ca karma,
GSP33brssbh1u:128: yathāśvena gacchati, padbhyāmanyathā vā, na vā gacchatīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:129: tathā 'atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti, nātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti', 'udite
GSP33brssbh1u:130: juhoti, anudite juhoti' iti vidhipratiṣedhāścātrārthavantaḥ syuḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:132: natu vastvevaṃ naivamasti nāstīti vā vikalpyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:136: nahi sthāṇāvekasmisthāṇurvā puruṣo 'nyo veti tattvajñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:140: tatraivaṃ sati brahmajñānamapi vastutantrameva, bhūtavastu viṣayatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:141: nanu bhūtavastutve brahmaṇaḥ pramāṇāntaraviṣayatvameveti vedāntavākyavicāraṇānarthikaiva prāptā
GSP33brssbh1u:145: sati hīndriyaviṣayatve brahmaṇa-, idaṃ brahmaṇā saṃbaddhaṃ kāryamiti gṛhyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:146: kāryamātrameva tu gṛhyamāṇaṃ kiṃ brahmaṇā saṃbaddhaṃ kimanyena kenacidvā saṃbaddhamiti na śakyaṃ niścetum /
GSP33brssbh1u:158: tasya ca nirṇayavākyam- 'ānandāddhyeva khalvimāni bhūtāni jāyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:162: FN: 'idaṃ sarvamasṛjata yadidaṃ kiñca' iti pratyakṣam /
GSP33brssbh1u:168: mahata ṛgvedādeḥ śāstrasyānekavidyāsthānopabṛṃhitasya pradīpavatsarvārthāvadyotinaḥ sarvajñakalpasya yoniḥ kāraṇaṃbrahma /
GSP33brssbh1u:170: yadyadvistarārthaṃ śāstraṃ yasmātpuruṣaviśeṣātsaṃbhavati, yathā vyākaraṇādi pāṇinyāderjñeyaikadeśārthamapi sa tato 'pyadhikataravijñāna
GSP33brssbh1u:172: kimu vaktavyamanekaśākhābhedabhinnasya devatiryaṅmanuṣyavarṇāśramadipravibhāgahetor ṛgvedādyākhyasya sarvajñānākarasyāprayatnenaiva līlānyayena puruṣaniḥśvāsavadyasmānmahato
GSP33brssbh1u:175: tasya mahato bhūtasya niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktimattvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssbh1u:176: athavā yathokta ṛgvedādiśāstraṃ yoniḥ kāraṇaṃ pramāṇamasya brahmaṇo yathāvatsvarūpādhigame
GSP33brssbh1u:178: śāstramudāhṛtaṃ pūrvasūtre- 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:179: kimarthaṃ tarhīdaṃ sūtraṃ, yāvatā pūrvasūtra evaivañjātīyakaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:181: ucyate- tatra pūrvasūtrākṣareṇa spaṣṭaṃ śāstrasyānupādānājjanmādi kevalamanumānamupanyastamityāśaṅkyeta tāmāśaṅkāṃ nirvartayitumidaṃ sūtraṃ pravavṛte śāstrayonitvāditi // 3 //
GSP33brssbh1u:183: purāṇāni sṛṣṭyādipratipādakavākyāni parakṛtipurākalparūpānarthavādāṃśca prādhānyenopabṛṃhayanti prasaṅgādadvaitabhāgaṃ karmabhāgaṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:189: vyākaraṇaṃ tāvadasminnarthe idaṃ padaṃ sādhviti padārthānvyākaroti /
GSP33brssbh1u:190: niruktaṃ teṣu teṣu padeṣu yaugikamarthaṃ pradarśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:192: jyotiṣaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ jayeddetāmāvāsyāyāmamāvāsyayā yajetetyādinopāttaṃ kālaviśeṣaṃ vyavasthāpayati
GSP33brssbh1u:193: tathāca tattaddeśavyākhyānāya bahavo maharṣayaḥ purāṇādinibandhapraṇetāro yatra pravṛttāstasya mahattvaṃ vyaktameva /
GSP33brssbh1u:210: mantrāṇāṃ ca 'iṣe tvā' ityādīnāṃ kriyātatsādhanābhidhāyitvena karmasamavāyitvamuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:211: na Dvacidapi vedavākyānāṃ vidhisaṃsparśamantareṇārthavattā dṛṣṭopapannā vā
GSP33brssbh1u:212: na ca pariniṣṭhite vastusvarūpe vidhiḥ saṃbhavati, kriyāviṣayatvādvidheḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:221: tatteṣu vedavākyeṣu bhūtānāṃ siddārthapratipādakavākyānāṃ kriyārthena kriyāpratipādakavākyena 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyaṃ, paśunā yajete' tyādinā sahānvayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:222: tathāca nindyatvādyarthapūraṇenānvaye kṛte kriyāparatvasiddhyā prāmāṇyaṃ siddham /
GSP33brssbh1u:226: tadbrahma sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti jagadutpatti sthitilayakāraṇaṃ vedāntaśāstrādevāvagamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:228: sarveṣu hi vedānteṣu vākyāni tātparyeṇaitasyārthasya pratipādakatvena samanugatāni /
GSP33brssbh1u:236: naca tadgatānāṃ padānāṃ brahmasvarūpaviṣaye niścite samanvaye
GSP33brssbh1u:245: natu tathā brahmaṇa upāsanāvidhiśeṣitvaṃ saṃbhavati, ekatve heyopādeyāśūnyatayā kriyākārakādidvaitavijñānopamardepapatteḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:248: yadyapyanyatra vedavākyānāṃ vīdhisaṃsparśamantareṇa pramāṇatvaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:249: tathāpyātmavijñānasya phalaparyantatvānna tadviṣayasya śāstrasya prāmāṇyaṃ śakyaṃ pratyākhyātum
GSP33brssbh1u:250: na cānumānagamyaṃ śāstraprāmāṇyaṃ, yenānyatra dṛṣṭaṃ nidarśanamapekṣeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:252: atrāpare pratyavatiphaṣṭhante- yadyapi śāstrapramāṇakaṃ brahma tathāpi pratipattividhiviṣayataiva śāstreṇa brahma samarpyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:253: yathā yūpāhavahanīyādīnyalaukikānyapi vidhiśaṣatayā śāstreṇa samarpyante tadvat /
GSP33brssbh1u:256: tathāhi śāstratātparyavida āhuḥ- 'dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam' iti
GSP33brssbh1u:265: sati ca vidhiparatve yathā svargādikāmasyāgnihotrādisādhanaṃ vidhīyata evamamṛtatvakāmasya brahmajñānaṃ vidhīyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:266: nanviha jijñāsyavailakṣaṇyamuktam- karmakāṇḍe bhavyo dharmo jijñāsya iha tu bhūtaṃ nityanivṛttaṃ brahma jijñāsyamiti /
GSP33brssbh1u:273: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' (muṇḍa. 3.2.9) ityādividhāneṣu satsu ko

GSP33brssbh1u:280: nanu vastumātrakathane 'pi rajuriyaṃ nāyaṃ sarpa ityādau bhrāntijanitabhītinivartanenārthavattvaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:290: śārīraṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca karma śrutismṛtisiddhaṃ dharmākhyaṃ, yadviṣayā jijñāsā 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' (jai.sū. 1.1.1) iti sūtritā, adharmo 'pi
GSP33brssbh1u:292: tayoścodanālakṣaṇayorarthānarthayordharmādharmayoḥ phale pratyakṣe sukhaduḥkhe śarīravāṅmanobhirevopabhujyamāne viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanye brahmādiṣu sthāvarānteṣu prasiddhe /
GSP33brssbh1u:301: tathā manuṣyādiṣu nārakasthāvarānteṣu sukhalavaścodanālakṣaṇadharmasādhya eveti gamyate tāratamyena vartamānaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:302: tathordhvagateṣvadhogateṣu ca dehavatsu duḥkhatāratamyardānāttaddhetoradharmasya pratiṣedhacodanākṣaṇasya tadanuṣṭhāyināṃ ca tāratamye gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:303: evamavidyādidoṣavatāṃ dharmādharmatāratamyanimittaṃ śarīropādānapūrvakaṃ sukhaduḥkhatāratamyanimittaṃ saṃsārarūpaṃ śrutismṛtinyāyaprasiddham /
GSP33brssbh1u:304: tathāca smṛtiḥ- 'na ha vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayorapahatirasti'
GSP33brssbh1u:306: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' (chāndo. 8.12.1) iti priyāpriyasparśanapratiṣedhāccodanālakṣaṇadharmakāryatvaṃ mokṣākhyasyāśarīratvasya pratiṣidhyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:310: mahāntaṃ vibhumātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati' (kāṭha. 1.2.21) 'aprāṇo
GSP33brssbh1u:314: tatra kiñcitpariṇāmi nityaṃ yasminvikriyamāṇe 'pi tadevedamiti buddhirna vihanyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:319: yatra dharmādharmī saha kāryeṇa kālatrayaṃ ca nopāvartete /
GSP33brssbh1u:324: atastadbrahma yasyeyaṃ jijñāsā prastutā, tadyadi kartavyoṣatvenopadiyeta,
GSP33brssbh1u:325: tena ca kartavyena sādhyaścenmokṣo 'bhyupagamyeta, anitya eva syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:326: tatraivaṃ sati yathoktakarmaphaleṣveva tāratamyāvasthiteṣvanityeṣu kaścidatiśayo mokṣa iti prasajyeta, nityaśca mokṣaḥ sarvairmokṣavādibhirabhyupagamyate, ato na kartavyaśeṣatvena brahmopadeśo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:327: apica 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' (muṇḍa. 3.2.9) 'kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāpare' (muṇḍa. 2.2.8) /
GSP33brssbh1u:333: (ī(?). 7) ityevamādyāḥ śrutayo brahmavidyānantaraṃ mokṣaṃ darśayantyo madhye kāryāntaraṃ vārayanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:336: yathā tiṣṭhangāyatīti tiṣṭhatigāyatyayormadhye tatkartṛkaṃ kāryāntaraṃ nāstīti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:337: 'tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā yo 'smākamavidyāyāḥ paraṃ pāraṃ tārayasi' (pra. 6.8)
GSP33brssbh1u:338: 'śrutaṃ hyeva me bhagavaddṛśebhyastarati śokamātmaviditi so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi tvaṃ mā bhagavacchokasya pāraṃ tārayatu' (chāndo. 7.1.3) 'tasmai
GSP33brssbh1u:347: yathā 'anantaṃ vai mano 'nantā viśvedevā anantameva sa tena lokaṃ jayati'
GSP33brssbh1u:360: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' (muṇḍa. 3.2.9) iti caivamādīni tadbhāvāpattivacanāni saṃpadādipakṣe na sāmañjasyenopapadyeran /
GSP33brssbh1u:364: evaṃbhūtasya brahmaṇastaj jñānasya ca na kayācidyuktyā śakyaḥ kāryānupraveśaḥ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:367: 'yenedaṃ sarvaṃ vijānāti taṃ kena vijānīyāt' (bṛha. 2.4.13) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:368: tathopāstikriyākarmatvapratiṣedho 'pi bhavati- yadvācānabhyuditaṃ yena vāgabhyudyate ityaviṣayatvaṃ brahmaṇa upanyasya, 'tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi nedaṃ yadidamupāsate' (kena. 1.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:374: tathāca śāstram- 'yasyāmataṃ tasya mataṃ, mataṃ yasya na veda saḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:378: yasya tūtpādyo mokṣastasya mānasaṃ, vācikaṃ, kāyikaṃ vā kāryamapekṣata iti yuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:379: tathā vikāryatve ca tayoḥ pakṣayormokṣasya dhruvamanityatvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:380: nahi dadhyādi vikāryaṃ, utpādyaṃ vā dhaṭādi, nityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ loke /
GSP33brssbh1u:382: svarūpavyatiriktatve 'pi brahmaṇo nāpyatvaṃ, sarvagatatvena nityāptasvarūpatvātsarveṇa brahmaṇaḥ, ākāśasyeva /
GSP33brssbh1u:384: saṃskāro hi nāma saṃskāryasya guṇādhānena vā syāddoṣāpanayanena vā /
GSP33brssbh1u:387: svātmadharma eva saṃsthirobhīto mokṣaḥ kriyayātmani saṃskriyamāṇe
GSP33brssbh1u:398: nanu dehāśrayayā snānācamanayajñopavītādikayā kriyayā dehī saṃskriyamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:402: tayā dehāśrayayā tatsaṃhata eva kaścidavidyayātmatvena parigṛhītaḥ saṃskriyata iti yuktam
GSP33brssbh1u:403: yathā dehāśrayacikitsānimittena dhātusāmyena tatsaṃhatasya tadabhimānina ārogyaphalaṃ, ahamaroga iti yatra buddhirutpadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:404: evaṃ snānācamanayajñopavītādinā ahaṃ śuddhaḥ saṃskṛta iti yatra buddhirutpadyate sa saṃskriyate
GSP33brssbh1u:406: tenaiva hyahaṅkartrāhaṃpratyayaviṣayeṇa pratyayinā sarvāḥ kriyā nirvartyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:407: tatphalaṃ ca sa evāśnāti, 'tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādvattyanāśnannanyo abhicākāśīti' (muṇḍa. 3.1.1) iti mantravarṇāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:410: karmādhyakṣaḥ sarvabhūtādhivāsaḥ sākṣī cetā kevalo nirguṇaśca' (śvetā.
GSP33brssbh1u:414: etau mantrāvanādheyātiśayatāṃ nityaśuddhatāṃ ca brahmaṇo darśayataḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:417: ato 'nyanmokṣaṃ prati kriyānupraveśadvāraṃ na śakyaṃ kenaciddarśayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:418: tasmāt jñānamekaṃ muktvā kriyāyā gandhamātrasyāpyanupraveśa iha nopapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:422: kriyā hi nāma sā yatra vastusvarūpanirapekṣaiva codyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:424: yathā yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ manasā dhyāyedvṣaṭkariṣyan iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:426: dhyānaṃ cintanaṃ yadyapi mānasaṃ tathāpi puruṣeṇa kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śakyaṃ, puruṣatantratvāt
GSP33brssbh1u:428: pramāṇaṃ ca yathābhūtavastuviṣayamato jñānaṃ kartumakartumanyathā vā
GSP33brssbh1u:440: tatraivaṃ sati yathābhūtabrahmātmaviṣayamapi jñānaṃ na codanātantram /
GSP33brssbh1u:443: kimarthāni tarhi 'ātmā vāre draṣyavyaḥ śrotavyaḥ' ityādīni vidhicchāyāni vacanāni /
GSP33brssbh1u:445: yo hi bahirmukhaḥ pravartate puruṣaḥ iṣṭaṃ me bhūyādadaniṣṭaṃ mābhūditi,
GSP33brssbh1u:446: naca tatrātyantikaṃ puruṣīrthaṃ labhate, tamātyantikapuruṣārthavāñchinaṃ svābhāvikakāryakaraṇasaṃghātapravṛttigocarādvimukhīkṛtya pratyagātmasrotastayā pravartayanti 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'
GSP33brssbh1u:449: 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' (bṛha. 2.4.6) 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet kena kaṃ vijānīyāt vījñātāramare kena
GSP33brssbh1u:453: alaṅkāro hyayamasmākaṃ yadbrahmātmāvagatau satyāṃ sarvakartavyatāhāniḥ kṛtakṛtyatā ceti /
GSP33brssbh1u:460: yadapi kecidāhuḥ- 'pravṛttinivṛttividhitaccheṣavyatirekeṇa kevalavastuvādī vedabhāgo nāsti' iti tanna, aupaniṣadasya puruṣasya puruṣasyānanyaśeṣatvāt
GSP33brssbh1u:461: yo 'sāvupaniṣatsvevādhigataḥ puruṣo 'saṃsārī brahma utpādyādicaturvidhadravyavilakṣaṇaḥ svaprakaraṇastho 'nanyośeṣaḥ, nāsau nāsti nādhigamyata iti vā śakyaṃ vaditum, 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā' (bṛha.
GSP33brssbh1u:462: 3.9.26) ityāmaśabdāt, ātmanaśca pratyākhyātumaśakyatvāt, ya eva nirākartā
GSP33brssbh1u:467: nahyahaṃpratyayaviṣayakartṛvyatirekeṇa tatsākṣī sarvabhūtasthaḥ sama ekaḥ kūṭasthanityaḥ puruṣo vidhikāṇḍe tarkasamaye vā kenacidadhigataḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:468: sarvasyātmā, ataḥ sa na kenacitpratyākhyātuṃ śakyo vidhiśeṣatvaṃ vā netum /
GSP33brssbh1u:469: asmatvādeva ca sarveṣāṃ na heyo nāpyupādeyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:471: puruṣo vināśahetvābhāvādavināśī, vikriyāhetvabhāvācca, kūṭasthanityaḥ, ata eva nityāśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:472: tasmāt 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭā sā parā gatiḥ' (kāṭha. 1.3.11) 'taṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:473: tvaupaniṣadaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchāmi' (bṛha. 3.9.23) iti caupaniṣadatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ puruṣasyopaniṣatsu prādhānyena prakāśyamānatva upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:474: ato bhūtavastuparo vedabhāgo nāstīti vacanaṃ sāhasamātram /
GSP33brssbh1u:475: yadapi śāstratātparyavidāmanukramaṇam- 'dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam' ityevamādi,
GSP33brssbh1u:480: bhavyārthatvena, kūṭasthanityaṃ bhūtaṃ nopadiśatīti ko hetuḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:482: akriyātve 'pi bhūtasya kriyāsādhanatvātkriyārthaṃ eva bhūtopadeśa iti cet
GSP33brssbh1u:487: yadi nāmopadiṣṭaṃ kiṃ tava tena syāditi /
GSP33brssbh1u:489: tadavagatyā mithyājñānasya saṃsārahetornivṛttiḥ prayojanaṃ kriyata ityavāśiṣṭamarthavattvaṃ kriyāsādhanavastūpadeśena /
GSP33brssbh1u:490: apica 'brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ' iti caivamādyā nivṛttirupadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:501: tasmātprasaktakriyānivṛttyaudāsīnyameva 'brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ' ityādiṣu pratiṣedhārthaṃ manyāmahe, anyatra prajāpatitrātādibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:503: yadapyuktaṃ- kartavyavidhyanupraveśamantareṇa vastumātramucyamānamānarthakaṃ syāt 'saptadvīpā vasumatī' tyādivaditi,
GSP33brssbh1u:505: rajuriyaṃ nāyaṃ sarpa iti vastumātrakathane 'pi prayojanasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:507: atrocyate- nāvagatabrahmātmabhāvasya yathāpūrvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ va vedapramāṇajanitabrahmātmabhāvavirodhāt
GSP33brssbh1u:508: nahi śarīrādyātmābhimānino duḥkhabhayādimattvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tasyaiva vedapramāṇajanitabrahmātmāvagame tadabhimānanivṛttau tadeva mithyājñānanimittaṃ duḥkhabhayādimattvaṃ bhavatīti śakyaṃ kalpayitum nahi dhanino gṛhasthasya dhanābhimānino dhanāpahāranimittaṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tasyaiva pravrajitasya dhanābhimānarahitasya tadeva dhanāpahranimittaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:509: naca kuṇḍalinaḥ kuṇḍalitvābhimānanimittaṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tasyaiva kuṇḍalaviyuktasya kuṇḍalitvābhimānanimittaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:510: taduktaṃ śrutyā- 'ārīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' (chāndo.
GSP33brssbh1u:512: śarīre patite 'śarīratvaṃ syāt, na jīvata iti cenna, saśarīratvasya mithyājñānanimittattvāt
GSP33brssbh1u:513: na hyātmanaḥ śarīrātmābhimānalakṣaṇaṃ mithyājñānaṃ muktvānyataḥ saśarīratvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum
GSP33brssbh1u:521: na tvātmano dhanadānādivaccharīrādibhiḥ svasvāmisaṃbandhanimittaṃ kiñcicchakyaṃ kalpayitum
GSP33brssbh1u:524: atrāhuḥ- dehādivyatiriktasyātmana ātmīye dehādāvabhimāno gauṇo na mithyeti
GSP33brssbh1u:526: yasya hi prasiddho vastubhedaḥ, yathā kesarādimānākṛtiviśeṣo 'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ siṃhaśabdapratyayabhāṅmukhyo 'nyaḥ prasiddhaḥ tataścānyaḥ puruṣaḥ prāyikaiḥ krauryaśauryādibhiḥ siṃhaguṇaiḥ saṃpannaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:527: siddhaḥ, tasya puruṣe siṃhaśabdapratyayau gauṇau bhavato nāprasiddhavastubhedasya /
GSP33brssbh1u:528: tasya tvanyatrānyaśabdapratyayau bhrāntinimittāveva bhavato na gauṇau /
GSP33brssbh1u:531: śabdapratyayau, tadvaddehādisaṃghāte 'hamiti nirupacāreṇa śabdapratyayāvātmānātmāvivekenotpadyamānau kathaṃ gauṇau śakyau vaditum /
GSP33brssbh1u:536: tathāca brahmavidviṣayā śrutiḥ- ' tadyathāhinirlvayanī valmīke mṛtā
GSP33brssbh1u:538: athāyamaśarīro 'mṛtaḥ prāṇo brahmaiva teja eva' (bṛha. 4.4.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:539: 'sacakṣuracakṣuriva sakarṇo 'karṇa iva savāgavāgiva samanā amanā iva saprāṇo 'prāṇa iva' iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:540: smṛtirapi ca- 'sthitaprajñasyakā bhāṣā' (bha.gī. 2.54) ityādyā sthitaprajñalakṣaṇānyācakṣāṇā viduṣaḥ sarvapravṛttyasaṃbandhaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:542: yasya tu yathāpūrvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ nāsāvavagatabrahmātmabhāva ityanavadyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:546: yadi hyavagataṃ brahmānyatra viniyujyeta bhavettadā vidhiśeṣitvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:548: tasmānna pratapattividhiviṣayatayā śāstrapramāṇakatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavatītyataḥ svatantrameva brahma śāstrapramāṇakaṃ vedāntavākyasamanvayāditi siddham /
GSP33brssbh1u:549: evañca sati 'athāto brahmajijñāsā' iti tadviṣayaḥ pṛthakśāstramārambha
GSP33brssbh1u:557: tasmādahaṃ brahmāsmītyetadavasānā eva sarve viṣayaḥ sarvāṇi cetarāṇi pramāṇāni /
GSP33brssbh1u:567: FN: pūrvapakṣiṇā kriyāśeṣatayā brahma pratipādyata ityuktaṃ tadvyāvṛttyarthamiti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:568: pūrṇatayā juhūdvārā kratuśeṣatāvādātmano 'pi jñānadvārā karmaśeṣatvāttadarthā vedāntāstadvidhiśeṣā bhaviṣyantītyāśaṅkyāha tatkeneti /
GSP33brssbh1u:571: yathāvā śrāddhe piṇḍapradānapūjottaraṃ piṇḍānāṃ gaṅgādipravāhe prakṣepaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:579: valkalādivaccittarañjako rāgādikaṣāyo mṛditaḥ kṣālitaḥ vināśito yasya jñānavairāgyābhyāsakṣārajalena tasmai /
GSP33brssbh1u:582: pralayakāle vāyuragnyādīnsaṃvṛṇoti saṃharatīti saṃvargaḥ, svāpakāle prāṇo vāgādīnsaṃharatīti saṃhārakriyāyogātsaṃvargaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:585: yadvācā śabdenānabhyuditamaprakāśitaṃ, yena bhmaṇā sā vāgabhyadyate prakāśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:595: tathāca - 'māyā hyeṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yanmāṃ paśyasi nārada /
GSP33brssbh1u:611: ahaṃpratyayaviṣayo yaḥ kartā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātopahito jīvātmā tadvyatirekeṇa /
GSP33brssbh1u:619: ahinirlvayanī sarpatvak valmīkādau pratyastā nikṣiptā mṛtā sarpeṇa tyaktābhimānā vartata evamityādyūhyam
GSP33brssbh1u:622: athāta iti tṛtīye śrutyādibhiḥ śeṣaśeṣitve siddhe satyanantaraṃ śeṣiṇaiva śeṣasya prayuktisaṃbhavātkonāma kratave kovā puruṣārtāyeti jijñāsā pravṛttā caturthādau /
GSP33brssbh1u:629: tathāca lokayātrakāryaṃ sadbrahmāhamiti bodhakāryaṃ- advaitasākṣātkāraśca kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh1u:630: anveṣṭavyātmavijñānāt- 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā', so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ iti tadvijñānātpūrvamātmano mātṛtvaṃ pramāprameyapramāṇavibhāgaśca /
GSP33brssbh1u:635: evaṃ tāvadvedāntavākyānāṃ brahmātmāvagatiprayojanānāṃ brahmātmani tātparyeṇa samanvitānāmantareṇāpi kāryānupraveśaṃ, brahmaṇi paryavasānamuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:637: sāṃkhyādayastu pariniṣṭhitaṃ vastu pramāṇāntaragamyameveti manyamānāḥ pradhānādīni kāraṇāntarāṇyanumimānāstatparatayaiva vedāntavākyāni yojayanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:638: sarveṣveva vedāntavākyeṣu sṛṣṭiviṣayeṣvanumānenaiva kāryeṇa kāraṇaṃ lilakṣayiṣitam /
GSP33brssbh1u:640: kāṇādāstvetebhya eva vākyebhya īśvaraṃ nimittakāraṇamanumimate aṇūṃśca samavāyikāraṇam /
GSP33brssbh1u:643: tatra padavākyapramāṇajñenācāryeṇa vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmāvagatiparatvadarśanāya vākyābhāsayuktābhāsavipratipattayaḥ pūrvapakṣīkṛtya nirākriyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:644: tatra sāṃkhyāḥ pradhānaṃ triguṇamacetanaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti manyamānā
GSP33brssbh1u:645: āhuḥ- yāni vedāntavākyāni sarvajñasya sarvaśakterbrahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvaṃ darśayantītyavocastāni pradhānakāraṇapakṣe 'pi yojayituṃ śakyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:649: yattu jñānaṃ manyase sa sattvadharmaḥ , 'sattvātsaṃjāyate jñānam' (gī.
GSP33brssbh1u:651: tena ca sattvadharmeṇa jñānena kāryakāraṇavantaḥ puruṣāḥ sarvajñā yoginaḥ prasiddhāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:653: na kevalasyākāryakāraṇasya puruṣopalabdhimātrasya sarvajñatvaṃ kiñcijjñatvaṃ vā kalpayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:654: triguṇatvāttu pradhānasya sarvajñānakāraṇabhūtaṃ sattvaṃ pradhānāvasthāyāmapi vidyata iti pradhānasyācetanasyaiva sataḥ sarvajñatvamupacaryate /
GSP33brssbh1u:655: vedāntavākyeṣvavaśyaṃ ca tvayāpi sarvajñaṃ brahmābhyupagacchatā sarvajñānāktimattvenaiva sarvajñatvamupagantavyam
GSP33brssbh1u:656: nahi sarvaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ kurvadeva brahma vartate /
GSP33brssbh1u:657: tathāhi- jñānasya nityatve jñānakriyāṃ prati svātantryaṃ brahmaṇo hīyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:658: athānityaṃ taditi jñānakriyāyā uparametāpi brahma, tadā sarvajñānāktimattvenaiva sarvajñatvamāpatati
GSP33brssbh1u:662: nāsaṃhatasyaikātmakasya brahmaṇa ityevaṃ prāptaṃ idaṃ sūtramārabhyate-
GSP33brssbh1u:664: buddhau yaḥ pratibimbaḥ sa tādṛśabimbapūrvakaḥ pratibimbatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:673: na sāṃkhyaparikalpitamacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ vedānteṣvāśrayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:680: tatredaṃśabdavācyaṃ nāmarūpavyākṛtaṃ jagatprāgutpatteḥ sadātmanāvadhārya tasyaiva prakṛtasya sacchabdavācyasyekṣaṇapūrvakaṃ tejaḥprabhṛteḥ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:690: tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ na jāyate' (muṇḍa. 1.1.9) ityevamādīnyapi sarvajñeśvarakāraṇaparāṇi vākyānudāhartavyāni /
GSP33brssbh1u:691: yattūktaṃ sattvadharmeṇa jñānena sarvajñaṃ pradhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP33brssbh1u:696: yadi guṇasāmye sati sattvavyapāśrayāṃ jñānāktimāśritya sarvajñaṃ pradhānamucyeta kāmaṃ rajastamovyapāśrayāmapi jñānapratibandhakaśaktimāśritya kiñcijjñamucyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:703: tathāsati yannimittamīkṣitṛtvaṃ pradhānasya tadeva sarvajñaṃ mukhyaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇamiti yuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:706: atrocyate- idaṃ tāvadbhavānpraṣṭavyaḥ, kathaṃ nityajñānakriyatve sarvajñatvahāniriti /
GSP33brssbh1u:707: yasya hi sarvaviṣayāvabhāsanakṣamaṃ jñānaṃ nityamasti so 'sarvajña iti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssbh1u:708: anityatve hi jñānasya kadācijjānāti kadācinnajānātītyasarvajñatvamapi syāt
GSP33brssbh1u:709: nāsau jñānanityatve doṣo 'sti jñānanityatve jñānaviṣayaḥ svātantryavyapadeśo nopapadyata iti cenna, pratatauṣṇyaprakāśe 'pi
GSP33brssbh1u:711: nanu saviturdāhyaprakāśasaṃyoge sati dahati prakāśayatīti vyapadeśaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:714: asatyapi karmaṇi savitā prakāśata iti kartṛtvavyapadeśadarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:715: evamasatyapi jñānakarmaṇi brahmaṇaḥ 'tadaikṣata' iti kartṛtvavyapadeśopapatterna vaiṣamyam
GSP33brssbh1u:718: tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīye nāmarūpe avyākṛte vyācikīrṣite iti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:720: yogaśāstravidaḥ, kimu vaktavyaṃ tasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasya sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhṛtiviṣayaṃ nityajñānaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:723: apicāvidyādimataḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ śarīrādyapekṣā jñānotpattiḥ syānna jñānapratibandhakāraṇarahitasyeśvarasya
GSP33brssbh1u:725: 'na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate na tatsamaścābhyadhikaśca dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:726: parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca' (śvetā.
GSP33brssbh1u:729: sa vetti vedyaṃ na ca tasyāsti vettā tamāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam'
GSP33brssbh1u:737: tatkṛtaśca śabdapratyayavyavahāro lokasya dṛṣṭo ghaṭacchidraṃ karakādicchidramityādirākāśāvyatireke 'pi tatkṛtā cākāśe ghaṭākāśādibhedamithyābuddhirdṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssbh1u:743: yathā tu tarkeṇāpi brahmaṇa eva kāraṇatvaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyate na pradhānādīnāṃ tathā prapañcayiṣyati- 'na vilakṣaṇatvādasya'- (bra. 2.1.4)
GSP33brssbh1u:747: yathā pratyāsannapatanatāṃ nadyāḥ kūlasyālakṣya kūlaṃ pipātiṣatītyacetane
GSP33brssbh1u:748: 'pi kūle cetanavadupacāro dṛṣṭaḥ, tadvadacetano 'pi pradhāne pratyāsannasarge cetanavadupacāro bhaviṣyati 'tadaikṣata' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:749: yathā loke kaściccetanaḥ snātvā bhuktvā cāparāhne grāmaṃ rathena gamiṣyāmītīkṣitvānantaraṃ tathaiva niyamena pravartate, tathā pradhānamapi mahadādyākāreṇa niyamena pravartate /
GSP33brssbh1u:771: (chāndo. 6.2.1,3) iti ca tejo 'bannānāṃ sṛṣṭimuktvā tadeva prakṛtaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:772: sadīkṣitṛ, tāni ca tejo 'bannāni, devatāśabdena parāmṛśyāha- 'seyaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:773: devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupravaśya nāmarūpe
GSP33brssbh1u:775: tatra yadi pradhānamacetanaṃ guṇavṛttyekṣitṛ kalpyeta tadeva prakṛtatvātseyaṃ devateti parāmṛśyeta
GSP33brssbh1u:777: jīvo hi nāma cetanaḥ śarīrādhyakṣaḥ prāṇānāṃ dhārayitā,
GSP33brssbh1u:781: nācetanasya pradhānasya cetano jīvaḥ svarūpaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:782: atha tu cetanaṃ brahma mukhyamīkṣitṛ parigṛhyate tasya jīvaviṣaya ātmaśabdaprayoga upapadyate
GSP33brssbh1u:783: tathā 'sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' (chāndo. 6.14.3) ityatra 'sa ātmā' iti prakṛtaṃ sadaṇimānamātmānamātmaśabdenopadiśya 'tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti cetanasya śvetaketorātmatvenopadiśati, aptejasostu viṣayatvādacetanatvaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:789: yathā rājñaḥ sarvārthakāriṇi bhṛtye bhavatyātmaśabdo mamātmā bhadrasena iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:790: pradhānaṃ hi puruṣasyātmano bhogāpavargo kurvadupakaroti, rājña iva bhṛtyaḥ saṃdhivigrahādiṣu vartamānaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:795: FN: anena pūrvasṛṣṭyanubhūtena prāṇadhṛtihetunāmātmanā sadrūpeṇa yathoktā devatāḥ sargānantaraṃ praviśya nāma rūpaṃ ceti
GSP33brssbh1u:799: na pradhānamacetanamātmaśabdālambanaṃ bhavitumarhati, 'sa ātmā' iti prakṛtaṃ sadaṇimānamādāya 'tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti cetanasya śvetaketormokṣayitavyasya tanniṣṭhamupadiśya 'ācāryavānpuruṣo veda' 'tasya
GSP33brssbh1u:800: tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chāndo. 6.14.2) iti mokṣopadeśāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:801: yadi hyacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ tadasīti grāhayenmumukṣuṃ cetanaṃ santamacetano 'sīti tadā viparītavādī śāstraṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:804: yadi cājñasya sato mumukṣoracetanamanātmānamātmetyupadiśetpramāṇabhūtaṃ śāstraṃ sa śraddhadhānatayāndhagolāṅgūlanyāyena tadātmadṛṣṭiṃ na
GSP33brssbh1u:805: parityajet, tadvyatiriktaṃ cātmānaṃ na pratipadyeta, tathā sati puruṣārthādvihanyetānarthaṃ na ṛcchet /
GSP33brssbh1u:806: tasmādyathā svargādyarthino 'gnihotrādisādhanaṃ yathābhūtamupadiśati tathā mumukṣorapi 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti yathābhūtamevātmānamupaduśatīti yuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:807: evañca sati taptaparaśugrahaṇamokṣadṛṣṭāntena satyābhisandhasya mokṣopadeśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:812: bhṛtye tu svāmibhṛtyabhedasya pratyakṣatvādupapanno gauṇa ātmaśabdo mamātmā bhadrasena iti
GSP33brssbh1u:813: apica Dvacidgauṇaḥ śabdo dṛṣṭa iti naitāvatā śabdapramāṇaker'tho gauṇī kalpanā nyāyyā, sarvatrānāśvāsaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brssbh1u:814: yattūktaṃ cetanācetanayoḥ sādhāraṇa ātmābdaḥ kratujvalanayoriva jyotiḥśabda iti, tanna, anekārthatvāsyānyāyyatvāt
GSP33brssbh1u:815: tasmāccetanaviṣaya eva mukhya ātmaśabdaścetanatvopacārādbhūtādiṣu prayujyate bhūtātmendriyātmeti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:819: prakṛtaṃ tu sadīkṣitṛ, saṃnihitaścetanaḥ śvetaketuḥ nahi cetanasya śvetaketoracetana ātmā saṃbhavatītyavocāma /
GSP33brssbh1u:821: jyotiḥśabdo 'pi laukikena prayogeṇa jvalana eva rūḍhor'thavādakalpitena tu jvalanasādṛśyena kratau pravṛtta ityadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:822: athavā pūrvasūtra evātmaśabdaṃ nirastasamastagauṇatvasādhāraṇatvaśaṅkatayā vyākhyāya tataḥ svatantra eva pradhānakāraṇanirākaraṇaheturvyākhyeyaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:826: tadā cetanaṃ santaṃ mumukṣumacetano 'sītibruvacchāstraṃ viparītavādibhūtvā puṃso 'narthāyetikṛtvā syādapramāṇamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssbh1u:828: 'yathā satyābhisaṃdhastaptaṃ paraśuṃ sa na dahyate 'tha mucyate' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:833: yadyānātmaiva pradhānaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ 'sa ātmā tattvamasi' itīhopadiṣṭaṃ syātsa tadupadeśaśravaṇādanātmajñatayā tanniṣṭho mā bhūditi
GSP33brssbh1u:835: yathārundhatīṃ didarśayiṣustatsamīpasthāṃ sthūlāṃ tārāmamukhyāṃ prathamamarundhatiti grāhayitvā tāṃ pratyākhyāya paścādarundhatīmeva grāhayati tadvannāyamātmeti brūyāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:843: 'uta tamādeśamaprākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātamiti kathaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sa ādeśo bhavatīti yathā somyaikena
GSP33brssbh1u:844: mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam'
GSP33brssbh1u:845: 'evaṃ somya sa ādeśo bhavati' (chāndo. 6.1.1,3) iti vākyopakrame śravaṇāt
GSP33brssbh1u:846: naca sacchabdavācye pradhāne bhogyavargakāraṇe heyatvenāheyatvena vā vijñāte bhoktṛvargo vijñāto bhavati, apradhānavikāratvādbhoktṛvargasya /
GSP33brssbh1u:849: he śvetaketo, uta api ādisyata ityādeśastaṃ śāstrācāryoktigamyaṃ vastvaprākṣyaḥ pṛṣṭavānasyācāryam
GSP33brssbh1u:850: vācārabhyamāṇamuccāryamāṇaṃ nāmadheyameva vikāro na tu ghaṭaśarāvādināmātirikto mṛdi vikāro vastuto 'sti paramārthato mṛttikaiva tu satyaṃ vastvastīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:852: tadeva sacchabdavācyaṃ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate- 'yatraitatpuruṣaḥ svapiti nāma satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati tasmādenaṃ svapitītyācakṣate svaṃ hyapīto bhavati' (chāndo. 6.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:853: eṣā śrutiḥ svapitītyetatpuruṣasya lokaprasiddhaṃ nāma nirvakti /
GSP33brssbh1u:860: sa upādhidvayoparame suṣuptāvasthāmupādhikṛtaviśeṣābhāvātsvātmani pralīna iveti 'svaṃ hyapīto bhavati' ityucyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:861: yathā hṛdayaśabdanirvacanaṃ śrutvā darśitam- 'sa vā eṣa ātmā hṛdi tasyaitadeva niruktaṃ hṛdyayamiti tasmādhṛdayamiti' (chāndo. 8.3.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:862: yathāvāśanāyodanyāśabdapravṛttimūlaṃ darśayati śrutiḥ- 'āpa eva tadaśitaṃ nayante' 'teja eva tatpītaṃ nayante' (chā. 6. 8. 3,5) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:863: evaṃ svamātmānaṃ sacchabdavācyamapīto bhavatītīmamarthaṃ svapitināmanirvacanena darśayati
GSP33brssbh1u:864: naca cetana ātmācetanaṃ pradhānaṃ svarūpatvena pratipadyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:865: yadi punaḥ pradhānamevātmīyātvātsvāśabdenaivocyeta, evamapi cetano 'cetanamapyetīti viruddhamāpadyeta
GSP33brssbh1u:866: śrutyantaraṃ ca - 'prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram' /
GSP33brssbh1u:868: ato yasminnapyayaḥ sarveṣāṃ cetanānāṃ taccetanaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ na pradhānam FN: yatra suptau puṃsaḥ svapitītyetannāma bhavati tadā puruṣaḥ satā saṃpannastenaikībhūta iti yojanā /
GSP33brssbh1u:871: yadi tārkikasamaya iva vedānteṣvapi bhinnā kāraṇāvagatirabhaviṣyatkvaciccetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:876: vipratiṣṭherannevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo lokāḥ' (kau. 3.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:879: 'ātmana eṣa prāṇo jāyate' (pra. 3.3) iti cātmanaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ darśayanti sarve vedāntāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:885: vipratiṣṭheran nānāgatitvena diśo daśāpi prasṛtāḥ syurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:889: svaśabdenaiva ca sarvajña īśvaro jagataḥ kāraṇamiti śrūyate śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ mantropaniṣadi sarvajñamīśvaraṃ prakṛtya 'sa kāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścijjanitā na cādhipaḥ' (śve. 6.9) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:890: tasmāt sarvajñaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ, nācetanaṃ pradhānamanyadveti siddham // 11 //
GSP33brssbh1u:896: 'janmādyasya yataḥ' ityārabhya 'śrutatvācca' ityevamantaiḥ sūtrairyānyudāhṛtāni vedāntavākyāni teṣāṃ sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktirīśvaro
GSP33brssbh1u:898: gatisāmānyopanyāsena ca sarve vedāntāścetanakāraṇavādina iti vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssbh1u:902: 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛha. 4.5.15) 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmātha yatrānyatpaśyatyanyacchṛṇotyanyadvijānāti tadalpaṃ vo vai bhūmā tadamṛtamatha yadalpaṃ tanmartyam' (chāndo. 7.24.1) 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste' (tai.ā. 3.12.7) 'niṣkalaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:906: iti caivaṃ sahasraśo vidyāvidyāviṣayabhedena brahmaṇo dvirūpatāṃ darśayanti vākyāni /
GSP33brssbh1u:911: eka eva tu paramātmeśvarastaistairguṇaviśeṣairviśiṣṭa upāsyo yadyapi bhavati tathāpi yathāguṇopāsanameva phalāni bhidyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:912: 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti śruteḥ, 'yathākraturasmiṃloke
GSP33brssbh1u:913: puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati' (chā. 3.14.1) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:914: smṛteśca- 'yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaranbhāvaṃ tyajatyante kalevaram /
GSP33brssbh1u:915: taṃ tamevaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ //' (gī. 8.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:916: yadyapyeka ātmā sarvabhūteṣu sthāvarajaṅgameṣu gūḍhastathāpi cittopādhiviśeṣatāratamyādātmanaḥ kūṭasthanityasyaikarūpasyāpyuttarottaramāviṣkṛtasya tāratamyamaiśvaryaśaktiviśeṣaiḥ śrūyate- 'tasya ya ātmānamāvistarāṃ veda'
GSP33brssbh1u:920: yatra yatra vibhūtyādyatiśayaḥ sa sa īśvara ityupāsyatayā codyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:921: evamihāpyādityamaṇḍale hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvapāpmodayaliṅgātpara eveti vakṣyati /
GSP33brssbh1u:923: evaṃ sadyomuktikāraṇamapyātmajñānamupādhiviśeṣadvāreṇopadiśyamānamapyavivakṣitopādhisaṃbandhaviśeṣaṃ parāparaviṣayatvena saṃdihyamānaṃ vākyagatiparyālocanayā nirṇetavyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:925: evamekamapi brahmāpekṣitopādhisaṃbandhaṃ nirastopādhisaṃbandhaṃ copāsyatvena jñeyatvena ca vedānteṣūpadiśyata iti pradarśayituṃ paro grantha ārabhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:932: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimihānandamayaśabdena parameva brahmocyate yatprakṛtam
GSP33brssbh1u:941: iha tu 'tasya priyameva śiraḥ' ityādi śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:942: śārīratvaṃ ca śrūyate- 'tasyaiṣa eva śārīra ātmā /
GSP33brssbh1u:944: tasya pūrvasya vijñānamayasyaiṣa eva śārīra ātmā ya eṣa ānandamaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:945: naca saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyasaṃspārśo vārayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:952: ānandamayaṃ prastutya 'raso vai saḥ' iti tasyaiva rasatvamuktvocyate-
GSP33brssbh1u:960: śrutyantare ca 'vijñānamānandaṃ brahma' (bṛ. 3.9.28) iti brahmaṇyevānandaśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:961: evamānandaśabdasya bahukṛtvo brahmaṇyabhyāsādānandamaya ātmā brahmeti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:965: mukhyameva hyātmānamupadidikṣu śāstraṃ lokabuddhimanusarat, annamayaṃ śarīramanātmānamatyantamūḍhānāmātmatvena
GSP33brssbh1u:969: yathārundhatīnidarśane barhvīṣvapi tārāsvamukhyāsvarundhatīṣu darśitāsu yāntyā pradarśyate sā mukhyaivārundhatī bhavati, evamihāpyānandamayasya sarvāntaratvānmukhyamātmatvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:970: yattu brūṣe, priyādīnāṃ śirastvādikalpanānupapannā mukhyasyātmana iti,
GSP33brssbh1u:972: śārīratvamapyānandamayasyānnamayādiśarīraparamparayā pradarśyamānatvāt, na punaḥ sākṣādeva śārīratvaṃ saṃsārivat, tasmādāndamayaḥ para evātmā // 12
GSP33brssbh1u:982: prakṛtivacanādayamanyaḥ śabdo vikāravacanaḥ samadhigataḥ, ānandamaya iti mayaṭo vikārthatvāt
GSP33brssbh1u:985: 'tatprakṛtavacane mayaṭ' (pā. 5.4.21) iti hi pracuratāyāmapi mayaṭ smaryate /
GSP33brssbh1u:986: yathā 'annamayo yajñaḥ' ityannapracura ucyate, evamānandapracuraṃ brahmānandamaya ucyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:987: ānandapracuratvaṃ ca brahmaṇo manuṣyatvādārabhyottarasminnuttarasminsthāne śataguṇa ānanda ityuktvā brahmānandasya niratiśayatvāvadhāraṇāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:991: yasmādānandahetutvaṃ brahmaṇo vyapadiśati śrutiḥ- 'eṣa hyevānandayāti' iti
GSP33brssbh1u:993: yo hyanyānānandayati sa pracurānanda iti prasiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:994: yathā loke yo 'nyeṣāṃ dhanikatvamāpādayati sa pracuradhana iti gamyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:1002: yasmādākāśādikrameṇa sthāvarajaṅgamāni bhūtānyajāyanta, yacca bhūtāni sṛṣṭvā tānyanupraviśya guhāyāmavasthitaṃ, sarvāntaraṃ, yasya vijñānāya 'anyo 'ntara ātmānyo 'ntara ātmā' iti prakrāntaṃ tanmāntravarṇikameva
GSP33brssbh1u:1025: tatra prākśarīrādyutpatterabhidhyānaṃ sṛjyamānānāṃ ca vikārāṇāṃ sraṣṭuravyatirekaḥ sarvavikārasṛṣṭiśca, na parasmādātmano 'nyatropapadyate
GSP33brssbh1u:1029: rasaṃhyevāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati' (tai. 2.7) iti jīvānandamayau bhedena
GSP33brssbh1u:1033: śrutismṛtī, yāvatā na labdhaiva labdhavyo bhavatītyuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1038: pratiṣidhyata eva tu paramārthataḥ sarvajñātparameśvarādanyo draṣṭā śrotā vā 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā' (bṛ. 3.7.23) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh1u:1040: yathā māyāvinaścarmakhaḍgadharātsūtreṇākāśamadhirohataḥ sa eva māyāvī paramārtharūpo bhūmiṣṭho 'nyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1049: ānandamayādhikāre ca 'so 'kāmayata bahusyāṃ prajāyeya' (tai. 2.6) iti kāmayitṛtvanirdeśānnānumānikamapi
GSP33brssbh1u:1052: pūrvasūtrodāhṛtāṃ kāmayitṛtvaśrutimāśritya prasaṅgātpunarnirākriyate gatisāmānyaprapañcanāya asminn asya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti |
GSP33brssbh1u:1054: yasmādasminnānandamaye prakṛta ātmani pratibuddhasyāsya jīvasya tadyogaṃ śāsti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1064: yadā tvetasminnānandamaye nirantaraṃ tādātmyena pratitiṣṭhati tadā saṃsārabhayānnivartata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1065: tacca paramātmaparigrahe ghaṭate, na pradhānaparigrahe jīvaparigrahe vā /
GSP33brssbh1u:1067: idaṃ tviha vaktavyam- 'sa vā eṣa puruṣo 'nnarasamayaḥ' /
GSP33brssbh1u:1069: anyo 'ntara ātmā prāṇamayaḥ' tasmāt 'anyo 'ntara ātmā manomayaḥ' tasmāt
GSP33brssbh1u:1071: mayaṭpravāhe satyānandamaya evākasmādardhajaratīyanyāyena kathamiva mayaṭaḥ prācuryarthātvaṃ brahmaviṣayatvaṃ cāśrīyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1075: tasmāttasmādāntarasyāntarasyānyasyānyasyātmana ucyamānatvāt ānandamayāttu na kaścidanya āntara ātmocyate, tenānandamayasya brahmatvam, anyathā prakṛtahānāprakṛtaprakriyāprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33brssbh1u:1076: atrocyate- yadyapyannamayādibhya ivānandamayādanyo 'ntara ātmeti na śrūyate tathāpi nānandamayasya brahmatvaṃ, yata ānandamayaṃ prakṛtya
GSP33brssbh1u:1082: tatra yadbrahma mantravarṇe prakṛtam- 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma' iti,
GSP33brssbh1u:1088: tatra kathaṃ brahmaṇaḥ svapradhānatvaṃ śakyaṃ vijñātum /
GSP33brssbh1u:1090: nanvānandamayāvayavatvenāpi brahmaṇi vijñāyamāne na prakṛtatvaṃ hīyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:1092: atrocyate- tathā sati tadeva brahmānandamaya ātmāvayavī tadeva ca brahmapucchaṃ pratiṣṭhāvayava ityasāmañjasyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1093: anyataraparigrahe tu yuktaṃ 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityatraiva brahmanirdeśa āśrayituṃ, brahmaśabdasaṃyogāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1095: apica brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā ityuktatvedamucyate- 'tadapyeṣa śloko bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1104: kathaṃ punaḥ svapradhānaṃ sadbrahma, ānandamayasya pucchatvena nirdiśyate-
GSP33brssbh1u:1110: apica ānandamayasya brahmatve priyādyavayavatvena saviśeṣaṃ brahmābhyupagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1111: nirviśeṣaṃ tu brahma vākyaśeṣe śrūyate, vāṅmanasayoragocaratvābhidhānāt- '
GSP33brssbh1u:1116: apica ānandapracura ityukte duḥkhāstitvamapi gamyate prācuryasya loke pratiyogyalpatvāpekṣatvāt
GSP33brssbh1u:1117: tathāca sati, 'yatra nānyatpaśti nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmā'
GSP33brssbh1u:1120: brahma tu na pratiśarīraṃ bhidyate, 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma' (taitti.
GSP33brssbh1u:1125: rasaṃhyevāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati, ko hyevānyātkaḥ prāṇyāt, yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt'
GSP33brssbh1u:1129: yadica ānandamayaśabdasya brahmaviṣayatvaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet, tata uttareṣvānandamātraprayogeṣvapyānandamayābhyāsaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:1132: ityānandaprātipadikasya brahmaṇi prayogadarśanāt, 'yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na
GSP33brssbh1u:1133: syāt' ityādirbrahmaviṣayaḥ prayogo na tvānandamayābhyāsa ityavagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1137: nanvānandamayasyopasaṃkramitavyasyānnamayādivadbrahmatve sati naiva viduṣo brahmaprāptiphalaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh1u:1141: yato vāco nivartante' ityadinā ca prapañcyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1142: yā tvānandamayasaṃnidhāne 'so 'kāmayata bahusyāṃ prajāyeyeti' iyaṃ śrutirudāhṛtā sā 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityanena saṃnihitatareṇa brahmaṇā saṃbadhyamānā nānandamayasya brahmatāṃ pratibodhayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1147: 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' ityatra puṃliṅgenāpyātmaśabdena brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvāt
GSP33brssbh1u:1148: yā tu bhārgavī vāruṇī vidyā 'ānando brahmeti vyajānāt' iti tasyāṃ mayaḍaśravaṇāt, priyaśirastvādyaśravaṇācca yuktamānandasya brahmatvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1149: tasmādaṇumātramapi viśeṣamanāśritya na svata eva priyaśirastvādi brahmaṇa upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1151: tasmādannamayādiṣvivānandamaye 'pi vikārārtha eva mayaḍvijñeyo na prācuryārthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1152: sūtrāṇi tvevaṃ vyākhyeyāni- 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityatra kimānandamayāvayavatvena brahma vivakṣyata uta svapradhānatveneti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1153: pucchaśabdādavayavatveneti prāpta ucyate- 'ānandamayo 'bhyāsāt' ānandamaya ātmetyatra 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' iti svapradhānameva brahmopadiśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:1159: pucchamityavayavaśabdānna svapradhānatvaṃ brahmaṇa iti yaduktaṃ, tasya parihāro vaktavyaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:1162: annamayādīnāṃ hi śiraādiṣu pucchāntevavayaveḥṣūkte tvānandamayasyāpi śiraādīnyavayavāntarāṇyuktvāvayavaprāyāpattyā 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'
GSP33brssbh1u:1166: sarvasya vikārajātasya sānandamayasya kāraṇatvena brahma vyapadiśyate-
GSP33brssbh1u:1169: naca kāraṇaṃ sat brahma svavikārasyānandamayasya mukhyayā vṛttyāvayava upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1170: aparāṇyapi sūtrāṇi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pucchavākyanirdiṣṭasyaiva brahmaṇa upapādakāni draṣṭavyāni FN: anātmye sasaṃbandhitayādhyastendriyajātenāpañcākṛtabhūtakāryeṇātmyena tādātmyādihīne, anirukte nikṛṣyocyanta iti niruktāni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi taiścābhedavarjite, niḥśeṣalayasthānaṃ nilayanaṃ māyā tacchūnye /
GSP33brssbh1u:1171: udaramiti ut api aramalpam antaraṃ bhedam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1175: yato yasmāt vācaḥ śaktivṛttyā tamaprakāśyaiva nivartante /
GSP33brssbh1u:1183: idamāmnāyate- 'atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate
GSP33brssbh1u:1184: hiraṇyaśmaśrurhiraṇyakeśa āpraṇakhātsarvaṃ eva suvarṇaḥ' 'tasya yathā kapyāsaṃ puṇḍarīkamevamakṣiṇī tasyoditi nāma sa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhya udita
GSP33brssbh1u:1185: udeti ha vai sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyo ya evaṃ veda' 'ityadhidaivatam' ( chā.
GSP33brssbh1u:1189: sūryamaṇḍale cakṣuṣi copāsyātvena śrūyate kiṃvā nityasiddhaḥ parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1193: akṣipuruṣe 'pi tadevātideśena prāpyate- 'tasyaitasya tadeva rūpaṃ yadamuṣya rūpam' iti
GSP33brssbh1u:1198: 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita iti sve mahimni' (chā. 7.24.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1201: ' sa eṣa ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ ca' (chāṃ 1.6.8)
GSP33brssbh1u:1203: 'sa eṣa ye caitasmādarvāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe manuṣyakāmānāṃ ca'
GSP33brssbh1u:1205: naca parameśvarasya maryādāvadaiśvaryaṃ yuktam, 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya'
GSP33brssbh1u:1208: 'antastaddharmopadeśāt' iti, 'ya eṣo 'ntarāditye' 'ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi' iti ca śrūyamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvara eva, na saṃsārī /
GSP33brssbh1u:1211: tadyathā- 'tasyoditi nāma' iti śrāvayitvā asyādityapuruṣasya nāma 'sa eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhya uditaḥ' iti sarvapāpmāpagamena nirvakti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1222: tathādhyātmamapi- ' yāvamuṣya geṣṇau tau geṣṇau' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1224: tadya ime vīṇāyāṃ gāyantyetaṃ te gāyanti tasmātte dhanasanayaḥ' (chā.
GSP33brssbh1u:1225: 1.7.6) iti ca laukikeṣvapi gāneṣvasyaiva gīyamānatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1230: lokakāmeśititṛtvamapi niraṅ kuśaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ parameśvaraṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1231: yattūktaṃ hiraṇyaśmaśrutvādirūpaśravaṇaṃ parameśvare nopapadyata iti, atra
GSP33brssbh1u:1233: 'māyā hyeṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yanmāṃ paśyasi nārada /
GSP33brssbh1u:1234: sarvabhūtaguṇairyuktaṃ maivaṃ māṃ jñātumarhasi' iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1235: apica yatra tu nirastasarvaviśeṣaṃ pārameśvaraṃ rūpamupadiśyate, bhavati tatra śāstram- 'śabdarmasparśamarūpamavyayam' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:1236: sarvakāraṇattvāttu vikāradharmairapi kaiścidviśiṣṭaḥ parameśvara upāsyatvena nirdiśyate- 'sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ'
GSP33brssbh1u:1247: kapermarkaṭasyāsaḥ pṛṣṭa(puccha) bhāgo 'tyantatejasvī tattulyaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ yathātyantadīptimattathāsya devasyākṣiṇī prakṛṣṭadīptimatī, tasya uditīti udita udgataḥ sakāryasarvapāpāspṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ sa eṣa ityādhidaivikapuruṣoktiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1248: amuṣmādādityādūrdhvagā ye lokāsteṣāmīśitā ye ca devānāṃ kāmā bhogāsteṣāṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1252: asti cādityādiśarīrābhimānibhyo jīvebhyo 'nya īśvaro 'ntaryāmī, 'ya āditye tiṣṭhannādityāntaro yamādityo na veda yasyādityaḥ śarīraṃ ya ādityamantaro
GSP33brssbh1u:1253: yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛ. 3.7.9) iti śrutyantare bhedavyapadeśāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1254: tatra hi 'ādityādantaro yamādityo na veda' iti vediturādityādvijñānātmano 'ntaryāmī spaṣṭaṃ nirdiśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1260: idamāmananti- 'asya lokasya kā gatirityākāśa iti hovāca sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyanta ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yantyākāśo
GSP33brssbh1u:1262: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimākāśaśabdena paraṃ brahmābhidhīyata uta bhūtākāśamiti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1267: yathā- 'yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt' (tai. 2.7) iti 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1) iti caivamādau /
GSP33brssbh1u:1270: kutaḥ, taddhi prasiddhatareṇa prayogeṇa śīghraṃ buddhimārohati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1271: nacāyamākāśaśabda ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇaḥ śakyo vijñātuṃ, anekārthatvaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brssbh1u:1276: nanu bhūtākāśaparigrahe vākyaśeṣo nopapadyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni
GSP33brssbh1u:1287: parasya hi brahmaṇa idaṃ liṅgam- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva
GSP33brssbh1u:1294: tathā 'ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yanti' iti brahmaliṅgaṃ 'ākāśo hyevaibhyo jyāyānākāśaḥ parāyaṇam' iti ca jyāyastvaparāyaṇatve /
GSP33brssbh1u:1300: api cāntavattvadoṣeṇa śālāvatyasya pakṣaṃ ninditvā, anantaṃ kiñcidvaktukāmena jaivalinā ākāśaḥ parigṛhītaḥ, taṃ cākāśamudgīthe saṃpādyopasaṃharati- 'sa eṣa parovarīyānudgīthaḥ sa eṣo 'nantaḥ' (chāṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:1303: yatpunaruktaṃ bhūtākāśaṃ prasiddhibalena prathamataraṃ pratīyata iti, atra
GSP33brssbh1u:1304: brūmaḥ- prathamataraṃ pratītamapi sat vākyaśeṣagatānbrahmaguṇāndṛṣṭvā na parigṛhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1307: tathākāśaparyāyavācināmapi brahmaṇi prayogo dṛśyate- 'ṛco akṣare parame vyomandevā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ' (ṛ.saṃ 1.164.39) 'saiṣā bhārgavī vāruṇī vidyā parame vyomanpratiṣṭhitā' (tai. 3.6) 'oṃ kaṃ brahma khaṃbrahma'
GSP33brssbh1u:1314: nirvahitā utpattisthitihetuḥ, te nāmarūpe yadantarā yasmādanye yasya vā
GSP33brssbh1u:1315: madhye staḥ tannāmarūpāspṛṣṭaṃ brahmeti vākyoṣādatrākāśo brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1317: deśato 'nantatvaṃ paratvaṃ, guṇata utkṛṣṭatvaṃ varīyastvaṃ, kālato vastutaścāparicchinnatvamānantyam
GSP33brssbh1u:1319: vyoman vyomni, parame prakṛṣṭe, aśrare kūṭasthe brahmaṇi, ṛco ṛgupakṣitāḥ sarve vedā jñāpakāḥ santi /
GSP33brssbh1u:1325: katamā sā devateti prāṇā iti hovāca sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃviśanti prāṇamabhyujjihate saiṣā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā'
GSP33brssbh1u:1329: iti caivamādau brahmaviṣayaḥ prāṇaśabdo dṛśyate, vāyuvikāre tu prasiddhataro lokavedayoḥ, ata iha prāṇaśabdena katarasyopādānaṃ yuktamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1333: nanu pūrvavadihāpi talliṅgādbrahmaṇa eva grahaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1334: ihāpi vākyaśeṣe bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamanaṃ pārameśvaraṃ karma pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1337: evaṃ hyāmnāyate- 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyete prāṇaṃ cakṣuḥ prāṇaṃ manaḥ sa yadā prabudhyate prāṇadevādhi punarjāyante'
GSP33brssbh1u:1338: (śa.brā. 10.3.3.6) iti. pratyakṣaṃ caitatsvāpakāle prāṇavṛttāvaparilupyamānāyāmindriyavṛttayaḥ parilupyante prabodhakāle ca prādurbhavantīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1342: naca tayorbrahmatvamasti, tatsāmānyācca prāṇasyāpi na brahmatvamityevaṃ prāpte sūtrakāra āha- 'ata eva prāṇaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1344: ata eva talliṅgātprāṇaśabdamapi paraṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1345: prāṇasyāpi hi brahmaliṅgasaṃbandhaḥ śrūyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃviśanti prāṇamabhyujjihate' (chāṃ 1.115) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1346: prāṇanimittau sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmutpattipralayāvucyamānau prāṇasya brahmatāṃ gamayataḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1351: ihatu sendriyāṇāṃ saśarīrāṇāṃ ca jīvāviṣṭānāṃ bhūtānāṃ, 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1353: nanu sahāpi viṣayairindriyāṇāṃ svāpaprabodhayoḥ prāṇe 'pyayaṃ prāṇācca prabhavaṃ śṛṇumaḥ- 'yadā suptaḥsvapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati tadainaṃ vāksarvairnāmabhiḥ sahāpyeti' (kau. 3.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1357: yatpunaḥ prāṇaśabdasya pañcavṛttau prasiddhataratvaṃ, tadākāśaśabdasyeva pratividheyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1359: atra kecidudāharanti- 'prāṇasya prāṇam', 'prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ'
GSP33brssbh1u:1363: yathā pituḥ piteti prayoge 'nyaḥ pitā ṣaṣṭīnirdiṣṭo 'nyaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:1364: prathamānirdiṣṭaḥ pituḥ piteti gamyate, tadvat 'prāṇasya prāṇam' iti śabdabhedātprasiddhātprāṇādanyaḥ prāṇasya prāṇa iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1365: nahi sa eva tasyeti bhedanirdeśārhe bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1366: yasya ca prakaraṇe yo nirdiśyate nāmāntareṇāpi sa eva tatra prakaraṇī nirdiṣṭa iti gamyate
GSP33brssbh1u:1367: yathā jyotiṣṭomādhikāre- 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta' ityatra jyotiḥśabdo jyotiṣṭomaviṣayo bhavati, tathā parasya brahmaṇaḥ prakaraṇe
GSP33brssbh1u:1368: 'prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ' iti śrutaḥ prāṇaśabdo vāyuvikāramātraṃ kathamavagamayet /
GSP33brssbh1u:1371: FN: cākrāyaṇarṣirdhanārthī rājño yajñaṃ gatvovāca- he prastotaḥ, yā devatā prastāvaṃ sāmabhaktimanvāyattānugatā
GSP33brssbh1u:1375: bhūteṣvindriyāṇi sūkṣmatvādbhoktṛsāmīpyācca sārāṇi atasteṣāṃ layodayoktyetareṣāmapi tatsiddheḥ śeṣaghaṭanetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1377: prāṇaḥ paramātmā bandhanamāśrayaḥ svarūpaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1381: idamāmananti- 'atha yadataḥ paro jyotirdīpyate viśvataḥpṛṣṭeṣu sarvataḥpṛṣṭeṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥpuruṣe jyotiḥ' (chā. 3.13.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1389: tamo jyotiriti hīmau śabdau parasparapratidvandvī vīṣayau prasiddhau /
GSP33brssbh1u:1393: nahi rūpādihīnaṃ brahma 'dīpyate' iti mukhyāṃ śrutirmahati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1395: nahi carācarabījasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmakasya dyaurmaryādā yuktā /
GSP33brssbh1u:1396: kāryasya tu jyotiṣaḥ paricchinnasya dyaurmaryādā syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1410: sarvatrāpi gamyamānasya jyotiṣaḥ 'paro divaḥ' ityupāsanārthaḥ pradeśaviśeṣaparigraho na virudhyate
GSP33brssbh1u:1414: 'idaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnāntaḥ puruṣe jyotiḥ' (chā. 3.13.7) iti ca kaukṣeye jyotiraṣi paraṃ jyotiradhyasyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1419: 'tadetaddṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cepyupāsīta' iti ca śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1420: 'cakṣuṣyaḥ śruto bhavati ya evaṃ veda' (chā. 3.13.8) iti cālpaphalaśravaṇādabrahmatvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1423: naca pūrvasminnapi vākye brahma nirdiṣṭamasti, 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:1425: athāpi kathañcitpūrvasminvākye brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ syādevamapi na tasyeha pratyabhijñānamasti
GSP33brssbh1u:1426: tatra hi 'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' (3.12.1,6) iti dyauradhikaraṇatvena śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1427: atra punaḥ 'paro divo jyotiḥ' iti dyaurmaryādātvena /
GSP33brssbh1u:1428: tasmātprākṛtaṃ jyotiriha grāhyamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ-jyotiriha brahma grāhyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1431: pūrvasminhi vākye catuṣpādbrahma nirdiṣṭam- 'tāvānasya mahimā tato jyāyāṃśca pūruṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1432: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' (chā. 3.12.6) ityanena mantreṇa /
GSP33brssbh1u:1433: tatra yaccatuṣpādo brahmaṇastripādamṛtaṃ dyusaṃbandhirūpaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tadeveha dyusaṃbandhānnirdiṣṭamiti pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1434: tatparityajya prākṛtaṃ jyotiḥ kalpayataḥ prakṛtahānāprakṛtaprakriye prasajyeyātām /
GSP33brssbh1u:1435: na kevalaṃ pūrvavākyājjyotirvākya eva brahmānuvṛttiḥ, parasyāmapi śāṇḍilyavidyayāmanuvartiṣyate brahma /
GSP33brssbh1u:1437: yattūktam- 'jyotiradīpyate' iti caitau śabdau kārye jyotiṣi prasiddhāviti
GSP33brssbh1u:1442: yadvā nāyaṃ jyotiḥśabdaścakṣurvṛtterevānugrāhake tejasi vartate, anyatrāpi prayogadarśanāt
GSP33brssbh1u:1445: tathā sati brahmaṇo 'pi caitanyarūpasya samastajagadavabhāsahetutvādupapanno jyotiḥśabdaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:1446: 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' (kau.
GSP33brssbh1u:1449: yadapyuktaṃ dyumaryādatvaṃ sarvagatasya brahmaṇo nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1450: atrocyate- sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upāsanārthaḥ pradeśaviśeṣaparigraho na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1451: nanuktaṃ niṣpradeśasya brahmaṇaḥ pradeśaviśeṣakalpanā nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1454: tathāhi- ādityo, cakṣuṣi, hṛdaye, iti pradeśaviśeṣasaṃbandhāni brahmaṇa
GSP33brssbh1u:1461: 'dṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cetyupāsīta' iti tu pratīkadvārakaṃ dṛṣṭatvaṃ śrutatvaṃ ca bhaviṣyati
GSP33brssbh1u:1463: nahīyate phalāya brahmāśrayaṇīyaṃ, iyate neti niyamaheturasti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1466: yatra tu guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ pratīkaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ vā brahmopadiśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:1467: tatra saṃsāragocarāṇyevoccāvacāni phalāni dṛśyante- 'annādo vasudāno vidante vasu ya evaṃ veda' (bṛ. 4.4.24) ityādyāsu śrutiṣu /
GSP33brssbh1u:1468: yadyapi na svavākye kiñcijjyotiṣo brahmaliṅgamasti tathāpi pūrvasminvākye dṛśyamānaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1469: taduktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa- 'jyotiścaraṇābhidhānāt' iti kathaṃ punarvākyāntaragatena brahmasaṃnidhānena jyotiḥśrutiḥ svaviṣayācchakyā pracyāvayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:1471: 'yadataḥ paro jyotiḥ' iti prathamatarapaṭhitena yacchabdena sarvanāmnā dyusaṃbnandhātpratyabhijñāyamāne pūrvavākyanirdiṣṭe brahmaṇi svasāmārthyena parāmṛṣṭe satyarthājjyotiḥśabdasyāpi brahmaviṣayatvopapatteḥ tasmādiha jyotiriti brahma pratipattavyam // 24 //
GSP33brssbh1u:1478: tāsāṃ tejobannānāmekaikaṃ dvidhā vibhajya punaścekaikaṃ bhāgaṃ dvedhā kṛtvā svabhāgāditarabhāgayornikṣipya trivṛtkaraṇaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1480: ekatvasāmyādbhūrityasminnakṣare prajāpateḥ śirodṛṣṭiruktā tathātrāpi sārūpyaṃ vācyaṃ anyathādhyāsāsiddheḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:1489: kaukṣeyakaṃ hi jyotirjīvabhāvenānupraviṣṭasya paramātmano vikāraḥ jīvābhāve dehasya śaithilyāt jīvataścauṣṇyājjāyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1492: vasu hiraṇyaṃ karmaphalaṃ dadātīti vasudāna iti guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1493: sarvanāmnā svasāmarthyena svasya sarvanāmnaḥ sāmartyaṃ saṃnihitavācitvaṃ tadbalena parāmṛṣṭe satīti yojanā /
GSP33brssbh1u:1494: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam |
GSP33brssbh1u:1495: atha yaduktaṃ pūrvasminnapi vākye na brahmabhihitamiti, 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ kiñca' (chāṃ. 3.12.1) iti gāyatryākhyasya chandaso
GSP33brssbh1u:1497: kathaṃ punaśchandobhidhānānna brahmābhihitamiti śakyate vaktuṃ, yāvatā
GSP33brssbh1u:1500: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' iti gāyatrīmupakramya tāmeva
GSP33brssbh1u:1501: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākyapramāṇabhedairvyakhyāya 'saiṣā catuṣpādā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī tadetadṛcābhyanuktaṃ tāvānasya mahimā' iti tasyāmeva vyākhyātarūpāyāṃ gāyatryāmudāhṛto mantraḥ kathamakasmādbrahma catuṣpādabhidadhyāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1502: yo 'pi tatra 'yadvai tadbrahma' (chā. 3.12.5,6) iti brahmaśabdaḥ so 'pi
GSP33brssbh1u:1503: chandasaḥ prakṛtatvācchandoviṣaya eva 'ya etāmevaṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ veda'
GSP33brssbh1u:1516: tathānyatrāpi vikāradvāreṇa brahmaṇa upāsanaṃ dṛśyate- 'etaṃ hyeva bahvṛcā mahatyukthe mīmāṃsanta etamagnāvadhvaryava etaṃ mahāvrate chandogāḥ'
GSP33brssbh1u:1520: apara āha- sākṣādeva gāyatrīśabdena brahma pratipādyate, saṃkhyāsāmānyāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1521: yathā gāyatrī catuṣpadā ṣaḍakṣaraiḥ pādaistathā brahma catuṣpāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1523: tadyathā- 'te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santastatkṛtam' ityupakramyāha
GSP33brssbh1u:1527: FN: ya etāṃ prakṛtāṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ vedarahasyaṃ madhuvidyārūpaṃ veda tasyodayāstamayarahitabrahmaprāptirbhavatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:1528: etamṛgvedino mahatyukthe śastre upāsate, adhvaryavo yajurvedinaḥ kratau
GSP33brssbh1u:1532: te vā ete pañcānye ādhidaivikāḥ, pañcānye ādhyātmikāste militvā daśa santaḥ kṛtamityucyate
GSP33brssbh1u:1537: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayāni hi nirdiśyāha- 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1538: nahi brahmānāśrayaṇe kevalasya chandaso bhūtādayaḥ pādā upapadyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:1540: anayā hi ṛcā svarasena brahmaivābhidhīyate, 'pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' (chā. 3.12.5) iti sarvātmatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1542: smṛtiśca brahmaṇa evaṃrūpatāṃ darśayati- 'viṣṭabhyāhamidaṃ kṛtsnamekāṃśena sthito jagat' (bhaga. 10.42) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1543: 'yadvai tadbrahma' (chā. 3.12.7) iti ca nirdeśa evaṃ sati mukhyārtha
GSP33brssbh1u:1548: tadeva brahma jyotirvākye dyusaṃbandhātpratyabhijñāyamānaṃ parāmṛśyata iti sthitam // 26 //
GSP33brssbh1u:1549: FN: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākprāṇa iti ṣaṭprakārā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:1551: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt |
GSP33brssbh1u:1552: yadapyetaduktaṃ pūrvatra- 'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' iti saptamyā dyaurādhāratvenopadiṣṭā iti, punaḥ 'atha yadataḥ paro divaḥ' iti pañcamyā maryādātvena, tasmādupadeśabhedānna tasyeha pratyabhijñānamasti,
GSP33brssbh1u:1555: ubhayasminnapi saptamyante pañcamyante copadeśe na pratyabhijñānaṃ virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1556: yathā loke vṛkṣāgrasaṃbaddho 'pi śyena ubhayathopadiśyamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:1557: vṛkṣāgre śyeno vṛkṣāgrātparataḥ śyena iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:1559: apara āha- yathā loke vṛkṣāgreṇāsaṃbaddho 'pi śyena ubhayathopadiśyamāno dṛśyate, vṛkṣāgre śyeno vṛkṣāgrātpurataḥ śyena iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:1560: evaṃ ca divaḥ paramapi sadbrahma divītyupadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1566: asti kauṣītakibrāhmaṇopaniṣadīndrapratardanākhyāyikā- 'pratardano ha vai daivodāsirindrasya priyaṃ dhāmopajagāma yuddhena ca pauruṣeṇa ca'
GSP33brssbh1u:1568: tasyāṃ śrūyate- 'sa hovāca praṇo 'smi prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛtamityupāḥsva' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1569: tathottaratrāpi 'atha khalu prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' (ko. 1.1,2,3) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1570: tathā 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:1571: ante ca 'sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' (ko. 3.8) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:1572: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimiha prāṇaśabdena vāyumātramabhidhīyata upa devatātmeti,
GSP33brssbh1u:1574: nanu 'ata eva prāṇaḥ' ityatra varṇitaṃ prāṇaśabdasya brahmaparatvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1582: 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādi jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1584: tatra prasiddhervāyuḥ prāṇa iti prāpta ucyate-prāṇaśabdaṃ brahma vijñeyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1586: tathāhi- paurvāparyeṇa paryalocyamāne vākye padārthānāṃ samanvayo brahmapratipādanapara upalabhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1587: upakrame tāvat, 'varaṃ vṛṇīṣva' itīndreṇoktaḥ pratardanaḥ paramaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:1588: puruṣārthaṃ varamupacikṣepa- 'tvameva me vṛṇīśva yaṃ tvaṃ manuṣyāya hitatamaṃ manyase' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1589: tasmai hitatamatvenopadiśyamānaḥ prāṇaḥ kathaṃ paramātmā na syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1593: tathā 'sa yo māṃ veda na ha vai tasya kenacana karmaṇā loko mīyate na
GSP33brssbh1u:1594: steyena na bhrūṇahatyayā' (kau. 3.1) ityādi ca brahmaparigrahe ghaṭate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1595: brahmavijñānena hi sarvakarmakṣayaḥ prasiddhaḥ- 'kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (mu. 2.2.8) ityādyāsu śrutiṣu /
GSP33brssbh1u:1600: 'sa na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānbhavati no evāsādhunā karmaṇā kanīyāneṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokasya unninīṣate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1601: eṣa u bhavāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhyo 'dho ninīṣate' iti,
GSP33brssbh1u:1606: sa netyādinā dharmādyaspṛṣṭatvaṃ tatkārayitṛtvaṃ tadīśitṛtvaṃ ca sarvamuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1607: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin |
GSP33brssbh1u:1611: vaktā hīndro nāma kaścidvigrahavāndevatāviśeṣaḥ svamātmānaṃ pratardanāyācacakṣe- 'māmeva vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā'
GSP33brssbh1u:1613: sa eṣa vakturātmatvenopadiśyamānaḥ prāṇaḥ kathaṃ brahma syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1622: 'yā ca kācidbalakṛtirindrakarmaiva ta' diti hi vadanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1625: niścite caivaṃ devatātmopadeśe hitatamatvādivacanāni yathāsaṃbhavaṃ tadviṣayāṇyeva yojayitavyāni
GSP33brssbh1u:1629: 'yāvaddhyasmiñsarīre prāṇo vasati tāvadāyuḥ' iti prāṇasyaiva prajñātmanaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:1630: pratyagbhūtasyāyuṣyapradhānopasaṃhārayoḥ svātantryaṃ darśayati na devatāviśeṣasya parācīnasya
GSP33brssbh1u:1631: tathāstitve ca prāṇānāṃ niḥśreyasamityadhyātmamevendriyāśrayaṃ prāṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1632: tathā 'prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' (kau. 3.3) iti,
GSP33brssbh1u:1633: 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' iti cepakramya 'tadyathā
GSP33brssbh1u:1634: rathasyāreṣu nemirarpitā nābhāvarā arpitā evamevaitā bhūtamātrāḥ prajñāmātrāsvarpitāḥ prajñāmātrāḥ prāṇe 'rpitāḥ sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' iti viṣayondriyavyavahārānabhibhūtaṃ pratyagātmānamevopasaṃharati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1635: 'sa ma ātmeti vidyāt' iti copasaṃhāraḥ pratyagātmaparigrahe sādhurna parācīnaparigrahe /
GSP33brssbh1u:1639: FN: tvaṣṭṛputraṃ viśvarūpaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ahanaṃ, arunmukhān rauti yathārthaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:1640: śabdayatīti rut vedāntavākyaṃ tanmukhe yeṣāṃ te runmukhāstebhyo
GSP33brssbh1u:1642: yasyāreṣu neminābhyormadhyasthaśalākāsu cakropāntarūpā nemirarpitā, nābhau cakrapiṇḍikāyāmarā arpitāḥ evaṃ bhūtāni pṛthivyādīni pañca mīyanta iti
GSP33brssbh1u:1643: mātrā bhogyāḥ śabdādayaḥ pañceti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1645: indro nāma devatātmānaṃ svamātmānaṃ paramātmatvenāhameva paraṃ brahmetyārṣeṇa darśanena yathāśāstraṃ paśyannupadiśati sma- 'māmeva
GSP33brssbh1u:1649: 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavat' (bṛ. 1.4.10) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1657: vijñānastutimanusaṃdadhāti- 'tasya me tatra lobha ca na mīyate sa yo māṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:1658: veda na ha vai tasya kena ca karmaṇā loko mīyate' ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh1u:1660: yasmādīdṛśānyapi krūrāṇi karmāṇi kṛtavato mama brahmabhūtasya lomāpi na hiṃsyate, sa yo 'nyo 'pi māṃ veda na tasya kenacidapi karmaṇā loko hiṃsyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1661: vijñeyaṃ tu brahmaiva 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā' iti vakṣyamāṇam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1663: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt |
GSP33brssbh1u:1664: yadyapyadhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmadarśanānna parācīnasya devatātmana upadeśaḥ tathāpi na brahmavākyaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1666: jīvasya tāvadasminvākye vispaṣṭaṃ liṅgamupalabhyate 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:1667: atra hi vāgādibhiḥ karaṇairvyāpṛtasya kāryakaraṇādhyakṣasya jīvasya vijñeyatvamabhidhīyate
GSP33brssbh1u:1668: tathā mukhyaprāṇaliṅgamapi- 'atha khalu prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1672: ye tu imaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhya iti paṭhanti teṣāmimaṃ jīvamindriyagrāmaṃ vā parigṛhya śarīramutthāpayatīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1675: jīvamukhyaprāṇaparigrahe ca prāṇaprajñātmanoḥ sahavṛttitvenābhedanirdeśaḥ svarūpeṇa ca bhedanirdeśa ityubhayayā nirdeśa upapadyate- 'yo vai prāṇaḥ sā prajñā yā vai prajñā sa prāṇaḥ saha hyetāvasmiñśarīre vasataḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:1678: tasmādihajīvamukhyaprāṇayorantara ubhau vā pratīyeyātāṃ na brahmeti cet,
GSP33brssbh1u:1680: evaṃ sati trividhamupāsanaṃ prasajyeta- jīvopāsane mukhyaprāṇopāsanaṃ brahmopāsanaṃ ceti
GSP33brssbh1u:1683: 'māmeva vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛtamityupāḥsva' ityuktvānte 'sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando
GSP33brssbh1u:1690: yattu mukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ darśitam- 'idaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' iti,
GSP33brssbh1u:1694: itareṇa tu jīvanti yasminnetāvupāśritau' (kāṭha. 2.5.5) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1695: yadapi na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt ityādi jīvaliṅgaṃ darśitaṃ tadapi na brahmapakṣaṃ nivārayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1698: buddhyādyupādhikṛtaṃ tu viśeṣamāśritya brahmaiva sañjīvaḥ kartā bhoktā cetyucyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1699: tasyopādhikṛtaviśeṣaparityāgena svarūpaṃ brahma darśayituṃ 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādinā pratyagātmābhimukhīkaraṇārthamupadeśo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1701: tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi nedaṃ yadidamupāsate //
GSP33brssbh1u:1702: ' (ke. 1.4) ityādi ca śrutyantaraṃ vacanādikriyāvyāpṛtasyaivātmano brahmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1703: yatpunaretaduktam- 'saha hyetāvasmiñśarīre vasataḥ sahotkrāmataḥ' iti prāṇaprajñātmanorbhedadarśanaṃ brahmavāde nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1705: jñānakriyāśaktidvayāśrayayorbuddhiprāṇayoḥ pratyagātmopādhibhūtayorabhedanirdeśopapatteḥ upādhidvayopahitasya tu pratyagātmanaḥ svarūpeṇābheda ityataḥ prāṇa eva prajñātmetyekīkaraṇamaviruddham /
GSP33brssbh1u:1706: athavā nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvādiha tadyogāt ityasyāyamanyor'thaḥ- na brahmavākyo 'pi jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1708: trividhamiha brahmopāsane vivakṣitaṃ prāṇadharmeṇa prajñādharmeṇa svadharmeṇa ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:1713: bhūtamātrā prajñayā vācaṃ samāruhya vācā sarvāṇi nāmānyāpnoti' ityādiḥ prajñādharmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1714: tā vā etā daśaiva bhūtamātrā adhiprajñaṃ daśa prajñāmātrā adhibhūtam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1715: yaddhi bhūtamātrā na syurna prajñāmātrāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1716: yaddhi prajñāmātrā na syurna bhūtamātrāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1719: 'tadyathā rathasyāreṣu nemirarpitā nābhāvarā arpitā evamevaitā bhūtamātrāḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:1720: prajñāmātrāsvarpitāḥ prajñāmātrāḥ prāṇe 'rpitāḥ sa eṣa prāṇa eva
GSP33brssbh1u:1722: tasmādbrahma evaitadupādhidvayadharmeṇa svadharmeṇa caikamupāsanaṃ trividhaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1726: iti śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye śrīśaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtau prathamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ FN: yathāyogaṃ kiñcidatra jīvavākyaṃ kiñcinmukhyaprāṇavākyaṃ kiñcidbrahmavākyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1727: prāṇasaṃvāde- vāgādayaḥ sarve pratyekamātmanaḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ manyamānāstannirdidhārayiṣayā prajāpatimupajagmuḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:1728: sa tānuvāca yasminnutkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataramiva bhavati sa vaḥ śreṣṭha iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1732: etadbhāti gacchatīti vānaṃ tadeva bāṇamasthiraṃ śarīramavaṣṭabhyāśrityeti
GSP33brssbh1u:1733: pañca śabdādayaḥ pañca pṛthivyādaya iti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1734: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhaya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1736: yena caitanyena vāgabhyudyate preryate vadanasāmarthyamāpadyate tadeva vāgāderagamyaṃ brahma
GSP33brssbh1u:1737: upāseti svatantrāṇāṃ trayāṇāmupāstau vākyabhedaḥ, natvekasyaiva brahmaṇastaddharmeṇetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:1745: prathame pāde 'janmādyasya yataḥ' ityākāśādeḥ samastasya jagato
GSP33brssbh1u:1747: tasya samastajagatkāraṇasya brahmaṇo vyāpitvaṃ, nityatvaṃ, sarvajñatvaṃ,
