GSP33brssbh1u:2142: 'eṣa u eva vāmanīreṣa hi sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati' /
GSP33brssbh1u:2143: ' eṣa u eva bhāmānīreṣa hi sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti' (chā. 4.15.2,3,4) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:2156: santi hyanyānyapi pṛthivyādīni sthānānyasya nirdiṣṭāni- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:2158: teṣu hi cakṣurapi nirdiṣṭam- 'yaścakṣuṣi tiṣṭhan' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2159: 'sthānādivyapadeśāt' ityādigrahaṇenaitaddarśayati- na kevalaṃ sthānamevaikamanucitaṃ brahmaṇo nirdiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate, kiṃ tarhi nāmarūpamityevañjātīyakamapyanāmarūpasya brahmaṇo 'nucitaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:2161: nirguṇamapi sadbrahma nāmarūpagatairguṇaiḥ saguṇamupāsanārthaṃ tatra tatropadiśyata ityetadapyuktameva
GSP33brssbh1u:2162: sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyarthaṃ sthānaviśeṣo na virudhyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2164: FN: sthānādanyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakārāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvaṅgatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2166: apica naivātra vivaditavyaṃ, kiṃ brahmāsminvākye 'bhidhīyate na veti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2168: sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ hi brahma yadvākyopakrame prakrāntaṃ 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti tadevehābhihitaṃ, prakṛtaparigrahasya nyāyyatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2169: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' (chā. 4 14.1) iti ca gatimātrābhidhānapratijñānāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2170: kathaṃ punarvākyopakrame sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma vijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2171: ucyate- 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' ityetadagnīnāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvopakosala uvāca- 'vijānāmyahaṃ yatprāṇo brahma kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmi' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2172: tatredaṃ prativacanam- 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kaṃ'
GSP33brssbh1u:2176: yadi tasya viśeṣaṇatvena kaṃśabdaḥ sukhavācī nopādīyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:2177: tathā sati kevale bhūtākāśe brahmaśabdo nāmādiṣviva pratīkābhiprāyeṇa prayukta iti pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2178: tathā kaṃśabdasya viṣayendriyasaṃparkajanite sāmaye sukhe prasiddhatvāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:2179: yadi tasya khaṃśabdo viśeṣaṇatvena nopādīyeta, laukikaṃ sukhaṃ brahmeti
GSP33brssbh1u:2181: itaretaraviśeṣatau tu kaṅkhaṃśabdau sukhātmakaṃ brahma gamayataḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2182: tatra dvitīye brahmaśabde 'nupādīyamāne kaṃ khaṃ brahmetyevocyamāne
GSP33brssbh1u:2184: tanmā bhūdityubhayoḥ kaṅkhaṃśabdayorbrahmaśabdaśirastvaṃ 'kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2187: pratyekaṃ ca gārhapatyādayo 'gnayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ mahimānamupadiśya 'eṣā somya te 'smadvidyātmavidyā ca' ityupasaṃharantaḥ pūrvatra brahma nirdiṣṭamiti jñāpayanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2188: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' iti ca gatimātrābhidhānapratijñānamarthāntaravivakṣāṃ vārayati
GSP33brssbh1u:2189: 'yathā puṣkarapalāśā āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate' (chā. 4.14.3) iti cākṣisthānaṃ puruṣaṃ vijānataḥ pāpenānupaghātaṃ bruvannakṣisthānasya puruṣasya brahmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2190: tasmātprakṛtasyaiva brahmaṇo 'kṣisthānatāṃ saṃyadvāmatvādiguṇatāṃ coktvārcirādikāṃ tadvido gatiṃ vakṣyāmītyupakramate- 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca' (chā. 4.15.1) iti // 15 //
GSP33brssbh1u:2195: brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoste brahmaśirasī tayorbhāvo brahmaśirastvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2197: itaścākṣisthānaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvaraḥ, yasmācchrutopaniṣatkasya śrutarahasyavijñānasya brahmavido yā gatirdevayānākhyā prasiddhā śrutau-
GSP33brssbh1u:2202: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ' (gī. 8.24) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2204: 'atha yadu caivāsmiñchavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣamevābhisaṃbhavanti'
GSP33brssbh1u:2205: ityupakramya 'ādityāccandramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa enānbrahma gamayatyeva devapatho brahmapatha etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavamāvarte nāvartante' (chā. 4.17.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2206: tadiha brahmavidviṣayā prasiddhayā gatyākṣisthānasya brahmatvaṃ niścīyate
GSP33brssbh1u:2209: asminnupāsake mṛte putrādayaḥ śavyaṃ śavasaṃbandhi saṃskārādikarma kurvanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2212: yatpunaruktaṃ chāyātmā, vijñānātmā, devatātmā vā syādakṣisthāna iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2216: yadaiva hi kaścitpuruṣaścakṣurāsīdati tadā cakṣuṣi puruṣacchāyā dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2218: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣaḥ' iti ca śrutiḥ saṃnidhānātsvacakṣuṣi dṛśyamānaṃ puruṣamupāsyatvenopadiśati
GSP33brssbh1u:2219: nacopāsanākāle chāyākaraṃ kañcitpuruṣaṃ cakṣuḥsamīpe saṃnidhāpyopāsta iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum
GSP33brssbh1u:2220: 'asyaiva śarīrasya nāśamanveṣa naśyati' (chā. 8.9.1) iti śrutiśchāyātmano 'pyanavasthitatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2221: asaṃbhavācca tasminnamṛtatvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ na chāyātmani pratītiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2226: yadyapi vijñānātmā paramātmano 'nanya eva, tathāpyavidyākāmakarmakṛtaṃ tasminmartyatvamadhyaropitaṃ bhayaṃ cetyamṛtatvābhayatve nopapadyete /
GSP33brssbh1u:2228: devatātmanastu 'raśmibhireṣo 'sminpratiṣṭhitaḥ' iti śruteryadyapi cakṣuṣyavasthānaṃ syāttathāpyātmatvaṃ tāvanna saṃbhavati, parāgrūpatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2235: asmiṃśca pakṣe dṛśyata iti prasiddhavadupādānaṃ śāstrādyapekṣaṃ vidvadviṣayaṃ prarocanārthamiti vyākhyeyam // 17 //
GSP33brssbh1u:2238: bhīṣā bhayena, asmāt brahmaṇaḥ, pavate calati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2239: uktāpekṣayā pañcamo mṛtyuḥ samāptāyuṣāṃ nikaṭe dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2243: 'ya imaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni yo 'ntaro yamayati'
GSP33brssbh1u:2244: ityupakramya śrūyate- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhanpṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na
GSP33brssbh1u:2245: veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛha. 3.7.1,2) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2247: sa kimadhidaivādyabhimānī devatātmā kaścitkiṃvā prāptāṇimādyaiśvaryaḥ kaścidyogī kiṃvā paramātmā kiṃvārthāntaraṃ kiñcidityapūrvasaṃjñādarśanātmasaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2248: kiṃ tāvannaḥ pratibhāti, saṃjñayā aprasiddhatvātsaṃjñino 'pyasiddhenārthāntareṇa kenacidbhavitavyamiti
GSP33brssbh1u:2255: yogino vā kasyacitsiddhasya sarvānupraveśena yamayitṛtvaṃ syāt, natu paramātmā pratīyeta, akāryakaraṇatvādityevaṃ prāpta idamucyate- yo
GSP33brssbh1u:2258: tasya hi paramātmano dharmā iha nirdiśyamānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:2259: pṛthivyādi tāvadadhidaivatādibhedabhinnaṃ samastaṃ vikārajātamantastiṣṭanyamayatīti paramātmano yamayitṛtvaṃ dharma upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2261: eṣa ta 'ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' iti cātmatvāmṛtatve mukhye paramātmana upapadyete /
GSP33brssbh1u:2262: 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda' iti ca pṛthivīdevatāyā avijñeyamantaryāmiṇaṃ bruvandevatātmano 'nyamantaryāmiṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2271: FN: āyatanaṃ śarīraṃ, lokyate 'neneti lokacakṣuḥ, jyotirmanaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2280: ata uttaramucyate- naca smārte pradhānamantaryāmiśabdaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2282: yadyapyadṛṣṭatvādivyapadeśaḥ pradhānasyasaṃbhavati tathāpi na draṣṭṛtvādivyapeśaḥ saṃbhavati, pradhānasyācetanatvena tairabhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2283: 'adṛṣṭo draṣṭāśrutaḥ śrotāmato mantāvijñāto vijñātā' (bṛha. 3.7.23) iti hi vākyaśeṣa iha bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2287: śārīro hi cetanatvāddraṣṭā śrotā mantā vijñātā ca bhavati, ātmā ca pratyaktvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2289: adṛṣṭatvādayaśca dharmāḥ śārīre parasiddhāḥ darśanādikriyāyāḥ kartari pravṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2294: kartarīti kriyāyāṃ guṇaḥ kartā, pradhānaṃ karma, tatraikasyāṃ kriyāyāmekasya guṇatvapradhānatvayorvirodhānna kartuḥ karmatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2299: yadyapi draṣṭṛtvādayo dharmastasya saṃbhavanti tathāpi ghaṭākāśavadupādhiparicchinnatvānna kārtsyena pṛthivyādiṣvantaravasthātuṃ niyantuṃ ca śaknoti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2300: apicobhaye 'pi hi śākhinaḥ kāṇvā mādhyandinānāścāntaryāmiṇo bhedenainaṃ śārīraṃ pṛthivyādivadadhiṣṭhānatvena niyamyatvena cādhīyate- 'yo vijñāne
GSP33brssbh1u:2305: 'yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan' ityasminnapi pāṭhe vijñānaśabdena śārīra ucyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2312: atra hi prakṛtādantaryāmiṇo 'nyaṃ draṣṭāraṃ, śrotāraṃ, mantāraṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2319: eko hi pratyagātmā bhavati, na dvau pratyagātmānau saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2320: ekasyaiva tu bhedavyavahāra upādhikṛto yathā ghaṭākāśo mahākāśa iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2321: tataśca jñātṛjñeyādibhedaśrutayaḥ pratyakṣādīni ca pramāṇāni saṃsārānubhavo vidhipratiṣedhaśāstraṃ ceti sarvametadupapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2322: tathāca śrutiḥ 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati'
GSP33brssbh1u:2324: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' iti vidyāviṣaye sarve
GSP33brssbh1u:2330: 'yattadadreśyamagrāhyamagotramavarṇamacakṣuḥśrotraṃ tadapāṇipādaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ sarvagataṃ susūkṣmaṃ tadavyayaṃ yadbhūtayoniṃ paripaśyanti dhīrāḥ'
GSP33brssbh1u:2332: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimayamadreśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ pradhānaṃ syāduta śārīra āhosvitparameśvara iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2333: tatra pradhānamacetanaṃ bhūtayoniriti yuktaṃ, acetanānāmeva taddṛṣṭāntatvenopādānāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2334: 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca yathā pṛthivyāmoṣadhaḥ saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2339: nahi kevalasya cetanasya tatra sūtrayonitvaṃ keśalomayonitvaṃ cāsti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2340: cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ hyacetanamūrṇanābhiśarīraṃ sūtrasya yoniḥ, puruṣaśarīraṃ ca keśalomnāmiti prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh1u:2346: pradhāne na saṃbhavanti, kathaṃ pradhānaṃ bhūtayoniḥ pratijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2350: tatra yaḥ paro 'kṣarācchrutaḥ sa sarvajñaḥ sarvavitsaṃbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2352: yadā tu yoniśabdo nimittavācī tadā śārīro 'pi bhūtayoniḥ syāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:2354: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate- yoyamadṛśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ sa parameśvara eva syānnānya iti
GSP33brssbh1u:2357: parameśvarasya hi dharma ihocyamāno dṛśyate- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit' iti
GSP33brssbh1u:2358: nahi pradhānasyācetanasya śārīrasya vopādhiparicchinnadṛṣṭeḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvavittvaṃ vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2359: nanvakṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭādbhūtayoneḥ parasyaiva tatsarvajñatvaṃ ca na bhūtayoniviṣayamityuktam
GSP33brssbh1u:2364: tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca jāyate' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2365: tasmānnirdeśasāmyena pratyabhijñāyamānatvātprakṛtasyaivākṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvavittvaṃ ca dharma ucyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2369: 'yenākṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ veda satyaṃ provāca tāṃ tattvato brahmavidyām' (muṇḍa.
GSP33brssbh1u:2370: 1.2.13) iti prakṛtya tasyaivākṣarasya bhūtayoneradṛśyatvādiguṇakasya vaktavyatvena pratijñātatvāt
GSP33brssbh1u:2371: kathaṃ tarhi 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' iti vyapadiśyata iti, uttarasūtre tadvakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2372: apicātra dve vidye veditavye ukte- 'parā caivāparā ca' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2373: tatrāparāmṛgvedādilakṣaṇāṃ vidyāmuktvā bravīti- 'atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate ityādi
GSP33brssbh1u:2375: yadi punaḥ parameśvarādanyadadṛśyatvādiguṇakamakṣaraṃ parikalpyeta neyaṃ parā vidyā syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2378: tisraśca vidyāḥ pratijñāyeran, tvatpakṣe 'kṣarādbhūtayoneḥ parasya paramātmanaḥ pratipādyamānatvāt
GSP33brssbh1u:2379: dve eva tu vidye veditavye iha nirdiṣṭe /
GSP33brssbh1u:2380: 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati' (muṇḍa. 1.1.3) iti caikavijñānena sarvavijñānāpekṣaṇaṃ sarvātmake brahmaṇi vivakṣyamāṇe
GSP33brssbh1u:2383: (muṇḍa. 1.1.1) iti brahmavidyāṃ prādhānyenopakramya parāparavibhāgena parāṃ vidyāmakṣarādhigamanīṃ darśayaṃstayā brahmavidyātvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2384: sā ca brahmavidyāsamākhyā tadadhigamyasyākṣarasyābrahmatve bādhitā syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2386: 'plavā hyete adṛḍhā yajñarūpā aṣṭādaśoktamavaraṃ yeṣu karma /
GSP33brssbh1u:2387: etacchreyo yo 'bhinandanti mūḍhā jarāmṛtyuṃ te punarevāpiyanti' (muṇḍa.
GSP33brssbh1u:2389: ninditvā cāparāṃ vidyāṃ tato viraktasya paravidyādhikāraṃ darśayati-
GSP33brssbh1u:2396: apica sthūlāḥ pṛthivyādayo dṛṣṭāntatvenopāttā iti na sthūla eva dārṣṭāntiko bhūtayonirabhyupagamyate
GSP33brssbh1u:2402: 'aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhātī' tyatra 'tejo vai ghṛtaṃ' iti śeṣānnirṇayavadatrāpi adṛśyavādeḥ śeṣānnirṇayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2403: yena jñānenākṣaraṃ prakṛtaṃ bhūtayoniṃ puruṣaṃ satyaṃ veda /
GSP33brssbh1u:2409: pratyakṣādinā karmasādhyāṃllokānanityatayā jñātvā nirvedaṃ vairāgyaṃ gacchet /
GSP33brssbh1u:2410: kutaḥ, kṛtena karmaṇā akṛto mokṣo nāsti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2412: itaśca parameśvara eva bhūtayonirnetarau śārīraḥ pradhānaṃ vā /
GSP33brssbh1u:2415: viśinaṣṭi hi prakṛtaṃ bhūtayoniṃ śārīrādvilakṣaṇatvena- ' divyo hyamūrtaḥ puruṣaḥ sabāhyābhyantaro hyajaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2419: tathā pradhānādapi prakṛtaṃ bhūtayoniṃ bhedena vyapadiśati-
GSP33brssbh1u:2421: akṣaramavyākṛtaṃ nāmarūpabījaśaktirūpaṃ bhūtasūkṣmamīśvarāśrayaṃ tasyaivopādhibhūtaṃ sarvasmādvikārātparo yo 'vikārastasmātparataḥ para iti bhedena vyapadeśātparamātmānamiha vivakṣitaṃ darśayati nātra pradhānaṃ nāma kiñcitsvatantraṃ tattvamabhyupagamya tasmādbhedavyapadeśa ucyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2422: kiṃ tarhi yadi pradhānamapi kalpyamānaṃ śrutyavirodhenāvyākṛtādiśabdavācyaṃ bhūtasūkṣmaṃ parikalpyeta parikalpyatām /
GSP33brssbh1u:2429: apica 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' ityasyānantaram 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' iti prāṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ pṛthivīparyantānāṃ tatvānāṃ sargamuktvā tasyaiva
GSP33brssbh1u:2431: cakṣuṣī candrasūryau diśaḥ śrotre vāgvivṛtāśca vedāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2432: vāyuḥ prāṇo hṛdayaṃ viśvamasya padbhyāṃ pṛthivī hyeṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā'
GSP33brssbh1u:2439: kathaṃ punarbhūtayonerayaṃ rūpopanyāsa iti gamyate, prakaraṇāt, 'eṣaḥ' iti ca prakṛtānukarṣaṇāt
GSP33brssbh1u:2442: yathopādhyāyaṃ prakṛtyaitasmādadhīṣvaiṣa vedavedāṅgapāraga iti vacanamupādhyāyaviṣayaṃ bhavati tadvat /
GSP33brssbh1u:2446: anye punarmanyante- nāyaṃ bhūtayone rūpopanyāsaḥ, jāyamānatvenopanyāsāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2448: khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī' iti hi pūrvatra
GSP33brssbh1u:2450: uttaratrāpi ca 'tasmādagniḥ samidho yaśca sūryaḥ' ityevamādi, 'ataśca
GSP33brssbh1u:2451: sarvā oṣadhayo rasāśca' ityevamantaṃ jāyamānatvenaiva nirdekṣyati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2453: sarvātmatvamapi sṛṣṭiṃ parisamāpyopadekṣyati- 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma'

GSP33brssbh1u:2479: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kiṃ vaiśvānaraśabdena jāṭharo 'gnirupadiśyata uta bhūtāgniratha tadabhimāninī devatā athavā śārīra āhosvitparameśvara iti /

GSP33brssbh1u:2525: etatsmaryamāṇaṃ rūpaṃ mūlabhūtāṃ śrutimanumāpayadasya vauśvānaraśabdasya parameśvaraparatve 'numānaṃ liṅgaṃ gamakaṃ syādityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssbh1u:2744: tacca śrutyantare brahmaṇo dṛṣṭam- 'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvati brāhmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2750: yathā brahmaṇaḥ pratipādakaḥ vaiśeṣiko heturukto naivamarthāntarasya vaiśeṣiko hetuḥ pratipādako 'stītyāha /
GSP33brssbh1u:2753: tasyācetanasya pradhānasya pratipādakaḥ śabdastacchabdaḥ, na tacchabdo 'tacchabdaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2754: na hyatrācetanasya pradhānasya pratipādakaḥ kaścicchabdo 'sti, yenācetanaṃ pradhānaṃ kāraṇatvenāyatanatvena vāvagamyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:2759: yadyapi prāṇabhṛto vijñānātmana ātmatvaṃ cetanatvaṃ ca saṃbhavati tathāpyupādhiparicchinnajñānasya sarvajñatvādyasaṃbhave satyasmādevātacchabdātprāṇabhṛdapi na dyubhvādyāyatanāśrayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2764: bhedavyapadeśaśceha bhavati- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti jñeyajñātṛbhāvena /
GSP33brssbh1u:2765: tatra prāṇabhṛttāvanmumukṣutvāj jñātā, pariśeṣādātmaśabdavācyaṃ brahma dyubhvādyāyatanamiti gamyate, na prāṇabhṛt // 5 //
GSP33brssbh1u:2771: paramātmani hi sarvātmake vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ syānna kevale prāṇabhṛti // 6 //

GSP33brssbh1u:2788: yadāpi paiṅgyupaniṣatkṛtena vyākhyānenāsyāmṛci sattvakṣetrajñāvucyete tadāpi na virodhaḥ kaścit
GSP33brssbh1u:2790: prāṇabhṛddhīha ghaṭādicchidravatsattvādyupādhyabhimānitvena pratiśarīraṃ gṛhyamāṇo dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ na bhavatīti niṣidhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2793: yathā ghaṭādicchidrāṇi ghaṭādibhirupādhibhirvinopalakṣyamāṇāni mahākāśa eva bhavanti, tadvatprāṇabhṛtaḥ parasmādanyatvānupapatteḥ pratiṣedho
GSP33brssbh1u:2798: tasyaiva hi bhūtayonivākyasya madhya idaṃ paṭhitam 'yasmindyauḥ pṛthivī
GSP33brssbh1u:2804: idaṃ samāmananti- 'bhūmā tveva vidijñāsitavya iti bhūmānaṃ bhagavo vijijñāsa iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2805: yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmātha yatrānyatpaśyatyanyacchṛṇotyanyadvijānāti tadalpam' (chā. 7.23,24) ityādi
GSP33brssbh1u:2811: tathā 'śrutaṃ hyeva me bhagavaddṛśebhyastarati śokamātmaviditi so 'haṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:2812: bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ mā bhagavāñśokasya pāraṃ tārayatu' (chāṃ. 7.1.3) iti prakaraṇotthānātparamātmā bhūmetyapi pratibhāti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2813: tatra kasyopādanaṃ nyāyyaṃ kasya vā hānamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2818: yathā hi 'asti bhagavo nāmno bhūyaḥ' iti, 'vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2819: tathā 'asti bhagavo nāmno bhūyaḥ' iti, mano vāva vāco bhūyaḥ' iti ca nāmādibhyo hyā prāṇādbhūyaḥpraśnaprativacanapravāhaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2820: naivaṃ prāṇātparaṃ bhūyaḥpraśnaprativacanaṃ dṛśyate 'sti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya ityādo vāva prāṇādbhūya iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2821: prāṇameva tu nāmādibhya āśāntebhyo bhūyāsaṃ 'prāṇo vā āśāyā bhūyān'
GSP33brssbh1u:2823: 'ativādyasītyativādyasmīti brūyānnāpahnuvīta' ityabhyanujñāya 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti prāṇavratamativāditvamanukṛṣyāparityajyaiva prāṇaṃ satyādiparamparayā bhūmānamavatārayanprāṇameva bhūmānaṃ manyanta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2824: kathaṃ punaḥ prāṇe bhūmani vyākhyāyamāne 'yatra nānyatpaśyati'
GSP33brssbh1u:2829: tathāca śrutiḥ 'na śṛṇoti na paśyati' ityādinā sarvakaraṇavyāpārapratyastamayarūpāṃ suṣuptyavasthāmuktvā
GSP33brssbh1u:2831: prāṇasya jāgaraṇaṃ bruvatī prāṇapradhānāṃ suṣuptyavasthāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2832: yaccaitadbhūmnaḥ sukhatvaṃ śrutam- 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukham' (chā. 7.23)
GSP33brssbh1u:2834: 'atraiṣa devaḥ svapnānna paśyatyatha yadetasmiñśarīre sukhaṃ bhavati'
GSP33brssbh1u:2836: yacca 'yo vai bhūmā tadamṛtam' (chā. 7.24.1) iti tadapi prāṇasyāviruddhaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2838: kathaṃ punaḥ prāṇaṃ bhūmānaṃ manyamānasya tarati śokamātmavit ityātmavividiṣayā prakaraṇasyotthānamupapadyate
GSP33brssbh1u:2840: tathāhi-' prāṇo ha pitā prāṇo mātā prāṇo bhrātā prāṇaḥ svasā prāṇa ācāryaḥ prāṇo brāhmaṇaḥ' (chā. 7.15.1) iti prāṇameva sarvātmānaṃ karoti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2841: 'yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evamasminprāṇe sarvaṃ samarpitam' iti ca sarvātmatvāranābhinidarśanābhyāṃ ca saṃbhavati vaipulyātmikā bhūmarūpatā prāṇasya /
GSP33brssbh1u:2843: tata idamucyate- paramātmaiveha bhūmā bhavitumarhati na prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2846: saṃprasāda iti suṣuptaṃ sthānamucyate, samyakprasīdatyasminniti nirvacanāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2847: bṛhadāraṇyake ca svapnajāgaritasthānābhyāṃ saha pāṭhāt tasyāṃ ca saṃprasādāvasthāyāṃ prāṇo jāgartīti prāṇo 'tra saṃprasādo 'bhipreyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2850: nahi nāmaiva nāmno bhūya iti nāmna ūrdhvamupadiṣṭam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2855: nanviha nāsti praśno 'sti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya iti, nāpi prativacanamasti prāṇādvāva bhūyo 'stīti, kathaṃ prāṇādadhi bhūmopadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2856: prāṇaviṣayameva cātivāditvāmuttaratrānukṛṣyamāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ- 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2862: yathaiṣo 'gnihotrī yaḥ satyaṃ vadatītyukte na satyavadanenāgnihotritvaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2865: tathā 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' ityukte na satyavadanenātivāditvam, kena tarhi, prakṛtena prāṇavijñānenaiva /
GSP33brssbh1u:2866: satyavadanaṃ tu prāṇavido viśeṣo vivakṣyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2874: prakṛtavyāvṛttyarthaśca tuśabdo na saṃgacchate 'eṣa tu vā ativadati' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2875: 'satyaṃ tveva vijijñāsitavyam' (chā. 7.16) iti ca prayatnāntarakaraṇamarthāntaravivakṣāṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2876: tasmādyathaikavedapraśaṃsāyāṃ prakṛtāyāmeṣa tu mahābrāhmaṇo yaścaturo vedānadhīta ityekavedebhyor'thāntarabhūtaścaturvedaḥ praśasyate tādṛgetaddraṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2880: tatra prāṇāntamanuśāsanaṃ śrutvā tūṣṇībhūtaṃ nāradaṃ svayameva sanatkumāro vyutpādayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2881: yatprāṇavijñānena vikārānṛtaviṣayeṇātivāditvamanativāditvameva tat 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2884: tathā vyutpāditāya nāradāya 'so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ satyenātivadāni' ityevaṃ pravṛttāya vijñānādisādhanaparamparayā bhūmānamupadiśati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2885: tatra yatprāṇādadhi satyaṃ vaktavyaṃ pratijñātaṃ tadeveha bhūmetyucyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2886: tasmādasti prāṇādadhi bhūmna upadeśa ityataḥ prāṇādanyaḥ paramātmā bhūmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2890: nacānyatra paramātmajñānācchokavinivṛttirasti, 'nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' (śve. 6.15) iti śrutyantarāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2897: prakaraṇānte paramātmavivakṣā bhaviṣyati, 'bhūmā tu prāṇa eveti cet' na /
GSP33brssbh1u:2898: 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita iti sve mahimni' (chā. 7.24.1) ityādinā bhūmna evā prakaraṇasamāpteranukarṣaṇāt
GSP33brssbh1u:2907: apica ye bhūmni śrūyante dharmāste paramātmanyupapadyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:2908: 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvajānāti sa bhūmā' iti darśanādivyavahārābhāvaṃ bhūmānyavagamayati
GSP33brssbh1u:2914: yadapi tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sukhamuktaṃ, tadapyātmana eva sukharūpatvavivakṣayoktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2915: yata āha- 'eṣo 'sya parama ānanda etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni
GSP33brssbh1u:2917: ihāpi 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukhaṃ nālpe sukhamasti bhūmaiva sukham' iti sāmayasukhanirākaraṇena brahmaiva sukhaṃ bhūmānaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2918: 'yo vai bhūmā tadamṛtam' ityamṛtatvamapīha śrūyamāṇaṃ paramakāraṇaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:2921: tathāca satyatvaṃ svamahimapratiṣṭhitatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ sarvāttmatvamiti caite dharmāḥ śrūyamāṇāḥ paramātmanyevopapadyante nānyatra /
GSP33brssbh1u:2930: sa hovācaitadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantyasthūlamanaṇu' (bṛ.
GSP33brssbh1u:2932: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimakṣaraśabdena varṇa ucyate kiṃvā parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2933: tatrākṣarasamāmnāya ityādāvakṣaraśabdasya varṇe prasiddhatvāt prasiddhyatikramasya cāyuktatvāt 'oṅkāra evedaṃ sarvam' (chā. 2.23.3)
GSP33brssbh1u:2935: varṇa evākṣaraśabda iti, evaṃ prāpta ucyate- para evātmākṣaraśabdavācyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2938: tatra hi pṛthivyādeḥ samastavikārajātasya kālatrayavibhaktasya 'ākāśa eva tadotaṃ ca protaṃ ca' ityākāśe pratiṣṭhitatvamuktvā 'kasminnu khalvākāśa otaśca protaśca' ityanena praśnenedamakṣaramavatāritam tathācopasaṃhṛtam- 'etasminnu khalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśca protaśca' iti
GSP33brssbh1u:2940: yadapi 'oṅkāra evedaṃ sarvam' iti tadapi brahmapratipattisādhanatvātstutyarthaṃ draṣṭavyam
GSP33brssbh1u:2941: tasmānna kṣaratyaśnute ceti nityatvāvyāpitatvābhyāmakṣaraṃ parameva brahma
GSP33brssbh1u:2951: praśāsanaṃ hīha śrūyate- 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ' (bṛ. 3.8.9) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2954: na hyacetanānāṃ ghaṭādikāraṇānāṃ mṛdādīnāṃ ghaṭādiviṣayaṃ praśāsanamasti
GSP33brssbh1u:2963: etadakṣaraṃ gārgyadṛṣṭaṃ daṣṭraśrutaṃ śrotramataṃ mantravijñātaṃ vijñātṛ'
GSP33brssbh1u:2967: tathā 'nānyadato 'sti draṣṭṛ nānyadatosti śrotṛ nānyadato 'sti mantṛ nānyadato 'sti vijñātṛ' ityātmabhedapratiṣedhāt na śārīrasyāpyupādhimato
GSP33brssbh1u:2975: 'etadvai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yadoṅkārastasmādvidvānetenaivāyatanenaikataramanveti iti prakṛtya śrūyate-
GSP33brssbh1u:2982: 'sa tejasi sūrye saṃpannaḥ'' 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam' iti ca tadvido deśaparicchinnasya phalasyocyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2997: īkṣatestu tathābhūtameva vastu loke karma dṛṣṭamityataḥ paramātmaivāyaṃ samyagdarśanaviṣayabhūta īkṣatikarmatvena vyadiṣṭa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2999: nanvabhidhyāne paraḥ puruṣa uktaḥ, īkṣaṇe tu parātparaḥ, kathamitara itaratra pratyabhijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3001: nacātra jīvanaghanaśabdena prakṛto 'bhidhyātavyaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ parāmṛśyate, yena tasmātparātparo 'yamīkṣitavyaḥ puruṣo 'nyaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3005: saindhavakhilyavadyaḥ paramātmano jīvarūpaḥ khilyabhāva upādhikṛtaḥ paraśca viṣayendriyebhyaḥ so 'tra jīvaghana iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3006: apara āha- 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam' ityatītānantaravākyanirdiṣṭo yo brahmalokaḥ paraśca lokāntarebhyaḥ so 'trajīvaghana ityucyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3007: jīvānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ karaṇaparivṛtānāṃ sarvakaraṇātmani hiraṇyagarbhe brahmalokanivāsini saṃghātopapatterbhavati brahmaloko jīvaghanaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3008: tasmātparo yaḥ paramātmekṣaṇakarmabhūtaḥ sa evābhidhyāne 'pi karmabhūta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3009: paraṃ puruṣamiti ca viśeṣaṇaṃ paramātmaparigraha evāvakalpate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3010: paro hi puruṣaḥ paramātmaiva bhavati yasmātparaṃ kiñcidanyannāsti,
GSP33brssbh1u:3011: 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' iti ca śrutyantarāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3012: 'paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yadoṅkāraḥ' iti ca vibhajyānantaramoṅkāreṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyātavyaṃ bruvanparameva brahmaparaṃ puruṣaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3013: 'yathā pādodarastvacā vinirmucyata evaṃ ha vai sa pāpmanā vinirmucyate'
GSP33brssbh1u:3015: atha yaduktaṃ paramātmābhidhyāyino na deśaparicchinnaphalaṃ yujyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3017: brahmalokaprāptiḥ krameṇa ca samyagdarśanotpattiriti kramamuktyabhiprāyametadbhaviṣyatītyadoṣaḥ FN: paraṃ nirviśeṣam, aparaṃ kāryaṃ, āyatanena prāptisādhanena, anveti prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3019: piṇḍaḥ sthūlo virāṭ tadapekṣayā sūtrasya paratvamti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3026: 'atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadbhāva vijijñāsitavyam' /
GSP33brssbh1u:3028: tatra yo 'yaṃ dahare hṛdayapuṇrīke dahara ākāśaḥ śrutaḥ sa kiṃ bhūtākāśo 'thavā vijñānātmā'thavā paramātmeti saṃśayyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3031: ākāśaśabdo hyayaṃ bhūtākāśe parasmiṃśca prayujyamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3032: tatra kiṃ bhūtākāśa eva daharaḥ syātkiṃvā para iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3033: tathā brahmapuramiti kiṃ jīvo 'tra brahmanāmā tasyedaṃ puraṃ śarīraṃ brahmapuramathavā parasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ puraṃ brahmapuramiti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3034: tatra jīvasya parasya vānyatarasya purasvāmino daharākāśatve saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3035: tatrākāśaśabdasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvādbhūtākāśa eva daharaśabda iti prāptam
GSP33brssbh1u:3037: 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśaḥ' iti ca bāhyāyantarabhāvakṛtabhedasyopamānopameyabhāvaḥ dyāvāpṛthivyādi ca
GSP33brssbh1u:3039: athavā jīvo dahara iti prāptam, brahmapuraśabdāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3043: nahi parasya brahmaṇaḥ śarīreṇa svasvāmibhāvaḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3044: tatra purasvāminaḥ puraikadeśe 'vasthānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā rājñaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3045: manaupādhikaśca jīvaḥ, manaśca prāyeṇa hṛdaye pratiṣṭhitamityato jīvasyaivedaṃ hṛdaye 'ntaravasthānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3050: ata uttaraṃ brūmaḥ- parameśvara evātra daharākāśo bhavitumarhati na bhūtākāśo jīvo vā /
GSP33brssbh1u:3054: ityupakramya 'kiṃ tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyaṃ yadbhāva vijijñāsitavyam'
GSP33brssbh1u:3056: 'sa brūyādyavānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa ubhe asmindyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite' (chā. 8.1.3) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:3057: tatra puṇḍarīkadaharatvena prāptadaharatvasyākāśasya prasiddhākāśaupamyena daharatvaṃ nivartayanbhūtākāśatvaṃ daharasyākāśasya nivartayatīti gamyate
GSP33brssbh1u:3058: yadyapyākāśaśabdo bhūtākāśe rūḍhastathāpi tenaiva tasyopamā nopapadyata iti bhūtākāśaśaṅkā nivartitā bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3062: apica kalpayitvāpi bhedamupamānopameyabhāvaṃ varṇayataḥ paricchinnatvādabhyantarākāśasya na bāhyākāśaparimāṇatvamupapadyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:3069: satyasaṃkalpaḥ' iti cātmatvāpahatapāpmatvādayaśca guṇā na bhūtākāśe saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3070: yadyapyātmaśabdo jīve saṃbhavati tathāpītarebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo jīvāśaṅkāpi nivartitā bhavati
GSP33brssbh1u:3071: nahyupādhiparicchinnasyārāgropamitasya jīvasya puṇḍarīkaveṣṭhanakṛtaṃ daharatvaṃ śakyaṃ nivartayitum
GSP33brssbh1u:3073: yadātmatayā jīvasya sarvagatatvādi vivakṣyeta tasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sākṣātsarvagatatvādivivakṣyatāmiti yuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3074: yadapyuktaṃ brahmapuramiti jīvena parasyopalakṣitatvādrājña iva jīvasyaivedaṃ purasvāminaḥ puraikadeśavartitvamastviti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3075: atra brūmaḥ- parasyaivedaṃ brahmaṇaḥ puraṃ saccharīraṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:3078: 'sa etasmājjīvaghanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣamīkṣate' (praṃ 5.5) 'sa vā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvāsu pūrṣu puriśayaḥ' (bṛ. 2.5.18) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3080: yathā śālagrāme viṣṇaḥ saṃnihita iti tadvat /
GSP33brssbh1u:3081: 'tadyatheha karmacito lokaḥ kṣīyata evamevāmutra puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyate'
GSP33brssbh1u:3082: (chā. 8.1.6) iti ca karmaṇāmantavatphalamuktvā 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajatyetāṃśca satyānkāmānsteṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' iti prakṛtadaharākāśavijñānasyānantaphalatvaṃ vadanparamātmatvamasya sūcayati
GSP33brssbh1u:3084: śrutaṃ, paraviśeṣaṇatvenopādānāditi atra brūmaḥ- yadyākāśo nānveṣṭavyatvenoktaḥ syāt 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśaḥ'
GSP33brssbh1u:3087: 'taṃ cedbrūyuryadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ kiṃ tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyaṃ yadbhāva vijijñāsitavyam' ityākṣipya parihārāvasara ākāśaupamyopakrameṇa
GSP33brssbh1u:3090: evaṃ hi sati yadantaḥsamāhitaṃ dyāvāpṛthivyādi tadanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ cokta syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3093: dyāvāpṛthivyādisamādhānādhāramākāśamākṛṣya 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajantyetāṃśca satyānkāmān' iti samuccayārthena caśabdenātmānaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:3096: sahāntaḥsthaiḥ samāhitaiḥ pṛthivyādibhiḥ satyaiśca kāmairvijñeya ukta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3098: FN: brahmapuraṃ śarīraṃ, daharaṃ sūkṣmaṃ, puṇḍarīkaṃ tadākāratvātprakṛtaṃ hṛdayameva /
GSP33brssbh1u:3105: pūrṣu śarīreṣu, puri hṛdaye vā śete iti puruṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3108: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca |
GSP33brssbh1u:3111: itaśca parameśvara eva daharaḥ, yasmāddaharavākyaśeṣe parameśvarasyaiva pratipādakau gatiśabdau bhavataḥ- 'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya
GSP33brssbh1u:3113: tatra prakṛtaṃ daharaṃ brahmalokaśabdenābhidhāya tadviṣayā gatiḥ prajāśabdavācyānāṃ jīvānāmabhidhīyamānā daharasya brahmatāṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3114: tathā hyaharaharjīvānāṃ suṣuptavasthāyāṃ brahmaviṣayaṃ gamanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:3115: śrutyantare- 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) ityevamādau /
GSP33brssbh1u:3116: loke 'pi kila gāḍhaṃ suṣuptamācakṣate brahmībhūto brahmatāṃ gata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3117: tathā brahmalokaśabdo 'pi prakṛte dahare prayujyamāno jīvabhūtākāśaśaṅkāṃ nivartayanbrahmatāmasya gamayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3119: gamayedyadi brahmaṇo loka iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsavṛttyā vyutpādyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:3120: sāmānādhikaraṇavṛttyā tu vyutpādyamāno brahmaiva loko brahmaloka iti parameva brahma gamayiṣyati
GSP33brssbh1u:3121: etadeva cāhararbrahmalokagamanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brahmaśabdasya sāmānādhikaraṇyavṛttiparigrahe liṅgam
GSP33brssbh1u:3122: nahyaharaharimāḥ prajāḥ kāryabrahmalokaṃ satyalokākhyaṃ gacchantīti śakyaṃ kalpayitum // 15
GSP33brssbh1u:3127: tasminsarvasamādhānamuktvā tāṃ sminneva cātmaśabdaṃ prayujyāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇayogaṃ copaduśya
GSP33brssbh1u:3133: evamiha prakṛte dahare vidhāraṇalakṣaṇaṃ mahimānaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3134: ayaṃ ca mahimā parameśvara eva śrutyantarādupalabhyate 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ' ityādeḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3135: tathānyatrāpi niścite parameśvaravākye śrūyate- 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya' iti
GSP33brssbh1u:3136: evaṃ dhṛteśca hetoḥ parameśvara evāyaṃ daharaḥ // 16 //
GSP33brssbh1u:3141: 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā' (chā. 8.1.4), 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni
GSP33brssbh1u:3143: jīve tu na kvacidākāśaśabdaḥ prayujyamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3144: bhūtākāśastu satyāmapyākāśaśabdaprasiddhāvupamānopameyabhāvādyasaṃbhavānna grahītavya ityuktam FN: ā samāntātkāśate dīpyata ityākāśaḥ svayañjyotirīśvaraḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3146: yadi vākyaśeṣabalena dahara iti parameśvaraḥ parigṛhyetāstītarasyāpi jīvasya vākyaśeṣe parāmarśaḥ - 'atha ya eṣa saṃprasādo
GSP33brssbh1u:3147: 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirūpasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca' (chā. 8.3.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3148: atra hi saṃprasādaśabdaḥ śrutyantare suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ dṛṣṭatvāttadavasthāvantaṃ jīvaṃ śaknotyupasthāpayituṃ nārthāntaram /
GSP33brssbh1u:3154: tasmāditaraparāmarśāt 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśa' ityatra sa eva jīva ucyate iti cet /
GSP33brssbh1u:3162: FN: samyakprasīdatyasmiñjīvo viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanitaṃ kāluṣyaṃ jahātīti suṣuptiḥ saṃprasādo jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3167: athedānīṃ mṛtasyevāmṛtasekātpunaḥ samutthānaṃ jīvāśaṅkāyāḥ kriyate uttarasmātprajāpatyādvākyāt
GSP33brssbh1u:3168: tatrahi 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā' ityapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamātmānamanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ ca pratijñāya 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmā'
GSP33brssbh1u:3170: 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi' (chā. 8.9.3) iti ca tameva punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśya 'ya eṣa svapne mahīyamānaścaratyeṣa ātmā' (chā. 8.10.1)
GSP33brssbh1u:3171: iti 'tadyatraitatsuptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyeṣa ātmā'
GSP33brssbh1u:3174: nāhaṃ khalvayamevaṃ saṃpratyātmānaṃ jānātyayamahamasmīti no evemāni
GSP33brssbh1u:3176: tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi no evānyatraitasmāt iti copakramya śarīrasaṃbandhanindāpūrvakaṃ 'eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ' iti jīvameva śarīrātsamutthitamuttamapuruṣaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3178: ataḥ 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ' iti jīva evokta iti cetkaścidbrūyāt, taṃ prati brūyāt- 'āvirbhūtasvarūpastu' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3185: etaduktaṃ bhavati- 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi ityakṣilakṣitaṃ draṣṭāraṃ nirdiśyodaśarāvabrāhmaṇenainaṃ śarīrātmatāyā vyutthāpya 'etaṃ tveva te'
GSP33brssbh1u:3187: 'paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate' iti yadasya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ paraṃ brahma tadrūpatayainaṃ jīvaṃ vyācaṣṭe na jaivena rūpeṇa /
GSP33brssbh1u:3189: taccāpahatapāpmatvādidharmakaṃ, tadeva ca jīvasya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ 'tattvamasi' ityādiśāstrebhyaḥ, netaradupādhikalpitam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3190: yāvadeva hi sthāṇāviva puruṣabuddhiṃ dvaitalakṣaṇāmavidyāṃ nivartayankūṭasthanityadṛksvarūpamātmānamahaṃ brahmāsmīti na pratipadyate tāvajjīvasya jīvatvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3191: yadā tu dehendriyamanobuddhisaṃghātādvyutthāpya śrutyā pratibodhyate, nāsi tvaṃ dehendriyamanobuddhisaṃghātaḥ, nāsi saṃsārī, kiṃ tarhi tadyatsatyaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:3192: sa ātmā caitanyamātrasvarūpastattvamasīti, tadā kūcasthanityadṛksvarūpamātmānaṃ pratibudadhyāsmāccharīrādyabhimānātsamuttiṣṭhansa eva kūṭasthanityadṛksvarūpa ātmā bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3193: 'sa yo ha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' (muṇḍa. 3.2.1)
GSP33brssbh1u:3195: tadeva cāsya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ yena śarīrātsamutthāya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3196: kathaṃ punaḥ svaṃ ca rūpaṃ svenaiva niṣpadyata iti saṃbhavati kūṭasthanityasya suvarṇādīnāṃ tu dravyāntarasaṃparkādabhibhūtasvarūpāṇāmanabhivyaktāsādhāraṇaviśeṣāṇāṃ kṣāraprakṣepādibhiḥ śodhyamānānāṃ svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3198: natu tathātmacaitanyajyotiṣo nityasya kenacidabhibhavaḥ saṃbhavatyasaṃsargitvādvyomna iva, dṛṣṭavirodhācca /
GSP33brssbh1u:3200: tacca śarīrādasamutthitasyāpi jīvasya sadā niṣpannameva dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3201: sarvo hi jīvaḥ paśyanśṛṇvanmanvāno vijānanvyavaharatyanyathā vyavahārānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3203: ataḥ kimātmakamidaṃ śarīrātsamutthānaṃ, kimātmikā vā svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiriti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3206: yathā śuddhasya sphaṭikasya svācchyaṃ śauklyaṃ ca svarūpaṃ prāgvivekagrahaṇādraktanīlādyupādhibhiraviviktamiva bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3207: pramāṇajanitavivekagrahaṇāttu parācīnaḥ sphaṭikaḥ svācchyena śauklyena ca svenarūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata ityucyate prāgapi tathaiva san /
GSP33brssbh1u:3208: tathā dehādyupādhyaviviktasyaiva sato jīvasya śrutikṛtaṃ vivekavijñānaṃ śarīrātsamutthānaṃ vivekavijñānaphalaṃ svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiḥ kevalātmasvarūpāvagatiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3211: kaunteya na karoti na lipyate' (gī.13.31) iti ca saśarīratvāśarīratvaviśeṣābhāvasmaraṇāt
GSP33brssbh1u:3214: evaṃ mithyājñānakṛta eva jīvaparameśvarayorbhedo na vastukṛtaḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:3219: yo 'kṣiṇi prasiddho draṣṭā draṣṭṛtvena vibhāvyate so 'mṛtābhayalakṣaṇādbrahmaṇo 'nyaścetsyāttato
GSP33brssbh1u:3223: tathā dvitīye 'pi paryāye 'ya eṣaḥ svapne mahīyamānaścarati' iti na prathamaparyāyanirdiṣṭādakṣipuruṣāddraṣṭuranyo nirdiṣṭaḥ, 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi' ityupakramāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3224: kiñcāhamadya svapne hastinamadrākṣaṃ nedānīṃ taṃ paśyāmīti dṛṣṭameva pratibuddhaḥ pratyācaṣṭe
GSP33brssbh1u:3225: draṣṭāraṃ tu tameva pratyabhijānāti ya evāhaṃ svapnamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhaṃ jāgaritaṃ paśyamīti
GSP33brssbh1u:3226: tathā tṛtīye 'pi paryāye 'nahi khalvayamevaṃ saṃpratyātmānaṃ jānātyayamahamasmīti no evemāni bhūtāni iti suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:3228: yattu tatra 'vināśamevāpīto bhavati' iti tadapi viśeṣavijñānavināśābhiprāyameva na vijñātṛvināśābhiprāyam
GSP33brssbh1u:3230: tathā caturthe 'pi paryāye 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi no
GSP33brssbh1u:3231: evānyatraitasmāt' ityupakramya 'maghavanmartyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram' ityādinā prapañcena śarīrādupādhisaṃbandhapratyākhyānena saṃprasādaśabdoditaṃ jīvaṃ 'svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate' iti brahmasvarūpāpannaṃ darśayanna
GSP33brssbh1u:3233: kecittu paramātmavivakṣāyāṃ 'etaṃ tveva te' iti jīvākarṣaṇamanyāyyaṃ manyamānā etameva vākyopakramasūcitamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamātmānaṃ te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmīti kalpayanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3236: 'etaṃ tveva te' iti ca pratijñāya prākcaturthātparyāyādanyamanyaṃ vyācakṣāṇasya prajāpateḥ pratārakatvaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:3237: tasmādyadavidyāpratyupasthāpitapāramārthikaṃ jaivaṃ rūpaṃ kartṛbhoktṛrāgadveṣādidoṣakaluṣitamanekānarthayogi tadvilayanena tadviparītamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaṃ pārameśvaraṃ svarūpaṃ vidyayā
GSP33brssbh1u:3239: apare tu vādinaḥ pāramārthikameva jaivaṃ rūpamiti manyante 'smadīyāśca
GSP33brssbh1u:3242: eka eva parameśvaraḥ kūṭasthanityo vijñānadhāturavidyayā māyayā māyāvivadanekadhā vibhāvyate nānyo vijñānadhāturastīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3245: tatrāyamabhiprāyaḥ - nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāve kūṭasthanitye ekasminnasaṅge paramātmani tadviparītaṃ jaivaṃ rūpaṃ vyomnīva
GSP33brssbh1u:3248: jīvasya tu na parasmādanyatvaṃ pratipipādayiṣati kiṃ tvanuvadatyevāvidyākalpitaṃ lokaprasiddhaṃ jīvabhedam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3249: evaṃ hi svābhāvikakartṛtvabhoktṛtvānuvādena pravṛttāḥ karmavidhayo na virudhyanta iti manyate
GSP33brssbh1u:3251: vāmadevavat' (bra. 1.1.30) ityādināvarṇiścāsmābhirvidvadbhedena karmavidhivirodhaparihāraḥ mahīyamāno vāsanāmayairviṣayaiḥ pūjyamāna iti svapnaparyāye, tadyatreti suṣuptiparyāye ca jīvameva prajāpatirvyācaṣṭa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3254: udaśarāveti udakapūrṇe śarāve pratibimbātmānaṃ dehaṃ svasyājñātaṃ yattanmahyaṃ vācyamityuktaḥ śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3262: ayaṃ suṣuptaḥ, saṃprati suṣuptau, ahaṃ ātmānaṃ ahaṅkārāspadamātmānaṃ na jānāti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3269: atha yo daharavākyaśeṣe jīvaparāmarśo darśitaḥ - 'atha ya eṣa saṃprasādaḥ'
GSP33brssbh1u:3270: (chā. 8.3.4) ityādi, sa dahare parameśvare vyākhyāyamāne na jīvopāsanopadeśo na prakṛtaviśeṣopadeśa ityarthakatvaṃ prāpnotīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3271: ata āha- anyārtho 'yaṃ jīvaparāmarśau na jīvasvarūpaparyavasāyī kiṃ tarhi parameśvarasvarūpaparyavasāyī
GSP33brssbh1u:3273: saṃprasādaśabdodito jīvo jāgaritavyavahāre dehendriyapañjarādhyakṣo bhūtvā tadvāsanānirmitāṃśca svapnānnāḍīcaro 'nubhūya śrāntaḥ śaraṇaṃ prepsurubhayarūpādapi śarīrābhimānātsamutthāya suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ paraṃ jyotirākāśaśabditaṃ paraṃ brahmopasaṃpadya viśeṣavijñānavattvaṃ ca
GSP33brssbh1u:3275: yadasyopasaṃpattavyaṃ paraṃ jyotiryena svena rūpeṇāyamabhiniṣpadyate sa eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇa upāsya ityevamartho 'yaṃ jīvaparāmarśaḥ parameśvaravādino 'pyupapadyate // 20 //
GSP33brssbh1u:3277: yadapyuktam, 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ' ityākāśasyālpatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ parameśvare nopapadyate, jīvasya tvārāgropanimitasyālpatvamavakalpata iti
GSP33brssbh1u:3279: ukto hyasya parihāraḥ parameśvarasyāpekṣikamalpatvamavakalpata iti 'arbhakaukastvāttadvyapadeśācca neti cenna nicāyyatvādevaṃ vyomavacca'
GSP33brssbh1u:3286: 'na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yamāgniḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:3287: tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' (mu. 2.210)
GSP33brssbh1u:3289: yatra yaṃ bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ yasya ca bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti sa kiṃ tejodhātuḥ kaściduta prājña ātmeti vicikitsāyāṃ tejodhāturiti tāvatprāptam
GSP33brssbh1u:3291: tejaḥsvabhāvakaṃ hi candratārakādi tejaḥsvabhāvaka eva suryo bhāsamāne
GSP33brssbh1u:3293: tathā saha sūryeṇa sarvamidaṃ candratārakādi yasminna bhāsate so 'pi
GSP33brssbh1u:3298: tasmāttejodhātuḥ kaścidityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prājña evātmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3307: samatvācca tejodhātūnāṃ sūryādīnāṃ na tejodhātumanyaṃ pratyapekṣāsti yaṃ bhāntamanubhāyuḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:3312: yathā sutapto 'yaḥpiṇḍo 'gnyanukṛtiragniṃ dahantamanudahati, bhaumaṃ vā rajo vāyuṃ vahantamanuvahantīti
GSP33brssbh1u:3314: tasya ceti caturthaṃ pādamasya ślokasya sūcayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3315: 'tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti tadhetukaṃ bhānaṃ sūryāderucyamānaṃ prājñamātmānaṃ gamayati
GSP33brssbh1u:3317: tejontareṇa suryāditejo vibhātītyaprasiddhaṃ viruddhaṃ ca, tejontareṇa tejontarasya pratidhātāt
GSP33brssbh1u:3318: athavā na sūryādīnameva ślokaparipaṭhitānāmidaṃ taddhetukaṃ vibhānamucyate
GSP33brssbh1u:3319: kiṃ tarhi 'sarvamidam' ityaviśeṣaśruteḥ sarvasyaivāsya nāmarūpakriyākārakaphalajātasya yābhivyaktiḥ sā brahmajyotiḥsattānimittā /
GSP33brssbh1u:3321: 'na tatra sūryo bhāti' iti ca tatraśabdamāharanprakṛtagrahaṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3324: anantaraṃ ca 'hiraṇmaye pare kośe virajaṃ brahma niṣphalam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3326: kathaṃ tajjyotiṣāṃ jyotirityata idamutthitam-'na tatra sūryo bhāti' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3328: tatra tu sa eva tejodhāturanyo na saṃbhavatītyupapāditam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3330: yato yadupalabhante tatsarvaṃ brahmaṇaiva jyotiṣopalabhyate, brahma tu nānyena jyotiṣopalabhyate svayaṃ jyotiḥsvarūpatvāt, yena sūryādayastasminbhāyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3334: FN: tatra tārakāntarāṇi candrādi ca na bhāti taṃ na bhāsayatīti yāvat /
GSP33brssbh1u:3341: tadbhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅ ko na pāvakaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3342: yadgatvā na nivartante taddhāma paramaṃ mama' (15.6) iti, 'yadādityagataṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:3344: yaccandramasi yaccāgnau tattejo viddhi māmakam' (15.12) iti ca // 23 //
GSP33brssbh1u:3348: 'aṅguṣṭamātraḥ puruṣaḥ madhya ātmani tiṣṭhati' iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3350: īśāno bhūtabhavyasya sa evādya sa u śva etadvai tat' (kā. 2.4.13) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:3351: tatra yo 'yamaṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣaḥ śrūyate sa kiṃ vijñānātmā kiṃvā
GSP33brssbh1u:3360: nahi parameśvaro balādyamena niṣkraṣṭuṃ śakyastena tatra saṃsāryaṅguṣṭhamātro niścitaḥ sa evehāpītyevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ -
GSP33brssbh1u:3367: anyatra bhūtācca bhavyācca yattatpaśyasi tadvada' (kā. 1.2.14) iti śabdādevetyabhidhānaśrutereveśāna iti parameśvaro 'yaṃ gamyata ityarthaḥ // 24 //
GSP33brssbh1u:3368: kathaṃ punaḥ sarvagatasya paramātmanaḥ parimāṇopadeśa ityatra brūmaḥ -
GSP33brssbh1u:3377: na cānyaḥ paramātmana iha grahaṇamarhatīśānaśabdādibhya ityuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3378: nanu pratiprāṇibhedaṃ hṛdayānāmanavasthitatvādapekṣamapyaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ nopapadyata ityata uttaramucyate- manuṣyādhikāratvāditi /
GSP33brssbh1u:3384: iti, tatpratyucyate- 'sa ātmā tattvamasi' ityādivatsaṃsāriṇa eva sato
GSP33brssbh1u:3386: dvirūpā hi vedāntavākyānāṃ pravṛttiḥ, kvacitparamātmasvarūpanirūpaṇaparā kvacidvijñānātmanaḥ paramātmaikatvopadeśaparā /
GSP33brssbh1u:3388: etamevārthaṃ pareṇa sphuṭīkariṣyati- 'aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo 'ntarātmā sadā janānāṃ hṛdaye saṃniviṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3393: 'śūdro yajñe 'navakḷptaḥ' iti paryudāsāt, upanīyata, tamadhyāpayīta, iti śūdrādhikāravāraṇam
GSP33brssbh1u:3403: teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmupariṣṭādye devādayastānapyadhikaroti śāstramiti bādarāyaṇa ācāryo manyante
GSP33brssbh1u:3408: tathā sāmarthyamapi teṣāṃ saṃbhavati, mantrārthavādetihāsapurāṇalokebhyo vigrahavattvādyavagamāt
GSP33brssbh1u:3412: apicaiṣāṃ vidyāgrahaṇārthaṃ brahmacaryādi darśayati- 'ekaśataṃ ha vai varṣāṇi maghavānprajāpatau brahmacaryamuvāsa' (chā. 8.11.3), 'bhṛgurvai
GSP33brssbh1u:3423: FN: devānāṃ karmasu nādhikāraḥ, devatāntarāṇāmuddeśyānāmabhāvāditi prathamasūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3427: syādetat, yadi vigrahavattvādyabhyupagamena devādīnāṃ vidyāsvadhikāro varṇyeta vigrahavattvādṛtvigādindrādīnāmapi svarūpasaṃnidhānena karmāṅgabhāvo 'bhyupagamyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:3438: tathāhi-'kati devāḥ' ityupakramya 'trayaśca trī ca śatā trayaśca trī ca
GSP33brssbh1u:3439: sahasrā' iti nirucya 'katama te' ityasyāṃ pṛcchāyām 'mahimāna evaiṣāmete trayastriṃśattveva devāḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.1,2) iti nirbruvatī śrutirekaikasya
GSP33brssbh1u:3441: tathā trayastriṃśato 'pi ṣaḍādyantarbhāvakrameṇa 'katama eko deva iti
GSP33brssbh1u:3442: prāṇaḥ' iti prāṇaikarūpatāṃ devānāṃ darśayantī tasyaikasya prāṇasya
GSP33brssbh1u:3444: tathā smṛtirapi- 'ātmano vai śarīrāṇi bahūni bharatarṣabha //
GSP33brssbh1u:3445: yogī kuryādbalaṃ prāpya taiśca sarvairmahīṃ caret //
GSP33brssbh1u:3450: anekarūpapratipattisaṃbhavāccaikaikā devatā bahubhī rūpairātmānaṃ pravibhajya bahuṣu yāgeṣu yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ gacchatīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3453: kvacideko 'pi vigrahavānanekatra yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ na gacchati, yathā bahubhirbhojayadbhirnaiko brāhmaṇo yugapadbhojyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3454: kvaciccaiko 'pi vigrahavānanekatra yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ gacchati, yathā bahubhirnamaskurvāṇaireko brāhmaṇo yugapannamaskriyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3455: tadvadihoddeśaparityāgātmakatvādyāgasya vigrahavatīmapyekāṃ devatāmuddiśya bahavaḥ svaṃ svaṃ dravyaṃ yugapatparityakṣyantīti vigrahavattve 'pi
GSP33brssbh1u:3458: vaiśvadevaśāstrasya hi nividi kati devā ityupakramya śākalyāya yājñavalkyena trayaścettyuttaram
GSP33brssbh1u:3462: prākamyaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca tatra kāmāvasāyitā' ityaṇimādyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3464: śabda iti cen nātaḥ prabhavāt pratyakṣānumānābhyām |
GSP33brssbh1u:3465: mā nāma vigrahavattve devādīnāmabhyupagamyamāne karmaṇi kaścidvirodhaḥ prasañji /
GSP33brssbh1u:3468: autpattikaṃ hi śabdasyārthena saṃbandhamāśritya 'anapekṣatvāt' iti vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ sthāpitam
GSP33brssbh1u:3469: idānīṃ tu vigrahavatī devatābhyupagamyamānā yadyapyaiśvaryayogādyugapadanekakarmasaṃbandhīni havīṃṣi bhuñjīta tathāpi vigrahayogādasmadādivajjananamaraṇavatī seti nityasya śabdasya nityenārthena nitye saṃbandhepratīyamāne yadvaidike śabde prāmāṇyaṃ sthitaṃ tasya virodhaḥ syāditi cet /
GSP33brssbh1u:3474: nanu janmādyasya yataḥ (bra. 1.1.2) ityatra brahmaprabhavatvaṃ jagato
GSP33brssbh1u:3476: apica yadi nāma vaidikācchabdādasya prabhavo 'bhyupagataḥ, kathametāvatā virodhaḥ śabde parihṛtaḥ yāvatā vasavo rudrā ādityā viśvedevā maruta
GSP33brssbh1u:3478: tadanityatve ca tadvācināṃ vaidikānāṃ vasvādiśabdānāmanityatvaṃ kena nivāryate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3479: prasiddhaṃ hi loke devadattasya putra utpanne yajñadatta iti tasya nāma kriyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3492: tataśca yo yastattatsthānamadhirohati sa sa indrādiśabdairabhidhīyata iti na doṣo bhavati
GSP33brssbh1u:3494: kathaṃ tarhi sthite vācakātmanā nitye śabde nityārthasaṃbandhini śabdavyavahārayogyārthavyaktiniṣpattirataḥ prabhava ityucyate kathaṃ punaravagamyate śabdātprabhavati jagaditi /
GSP33brssbh1u:3499: 'ete iti vai prajāpatirdevānasṛjatāsṛgramiti manuṣyānindava iti pitṛṃstiraḥ pavitramiti grahānāśava iti stotraṃ viśvānīti
GSP33brssbh1u:3501: tathānyatrāpi 'sa manasā vācaṃ mithunaṃ samabhavat' (bṛ. 1.2.4) ityādinā tatratatra śabdapūrvikā sṛṣṭiḥ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3503: ādau vedamayī divyā yataḥ sarvā pravṛttayaḥ' //
GSP33brssbh1u:3505: utsargo 'pyayaṃ vācaḥ saṃpradāyapravartanātmako draṣṭavyaḥ, anādinidhanāyā anyādṛśasyotsargasyāsaṃbhavāt
GSP33brssbh1u:3506: tathā 'nāma rūpaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca pravartanam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3509: ' sarveṣāṃ tu sa nāmāni karmāṇi ca pṛthakpṛthak /
GSP33brssbh1u:3512: apica cikīrṣitamarthamanutiṣṭhaṃstasya vācakaṃ śabdaṃ pūrvaṃ smṛtvā paścāttamarthamanuṣṭhatīti sarveṣāṃ naḥ pratyakṣametat /
GSP33brssbh1u:3513: tathā prajāpaterapi sraṣṭuḥ sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ vaidikāḥ śabdā manasi prādurbabhūvuḥ, paścāttadanugatānarthānsasarjeti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3515: ityevamādikā bhūrādiśabdebhya eva manasi prādurbhūtebhyo bhūrādilokānsṛṣṭāndarśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3518: varṇapakṣe hi teṣāmutpannapradhvaṃsitvānnityebhyaḥ śabdebhyo devādivyaktīnāṃ prabhava ityanupapannaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3521: tathāhi- adṛśyamāno 'pi puruṣaviśeṣo 'dhyayanadhvaniśravaṇādeva viśeṣato nirdhāryate devadatto 'yamadhīte yajñadatto 'yamadhīte iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3532: kāryapratyāyitaiḥ saṃskāraiḥ sahito 'ntyo varṇorthaṃ pratyāyayiṣyatīti cet
GSP33brssbh1u:3536: sa caicaikavarṇapratyayāhitasaṃskārabīje 'ntyavarṇapratyayajanitapari pāke pratyayinyekapratyayaviṣayatayā jhaṭiti pratyavabhāsate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3542: varṇā eva tu na śabdaḥ iti bhagavānupavarṣaḥ.
GSP33brssbh1u:3551: yadi hi pratyuccāraṇaṃ gavādivyaktivadanyā anyā varṇavyaktayaḥ pratīyeraṃstata ākṛtinimittaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3554: dvirgośabda uccārita iti hi pratipattirna tu dvau gośabdāviti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3555: nanu varṇā apyuccāraṇabhedena bhinnaḥ pratīyante devadattayajñadattayoradhyayanadhvaniśravaṇādeva bhedapratīterityuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3560: tadvaraṃ varṇavyaktiṣveva paropādhiko bhedapratyayaḥ svarūpanimittaṃ ca pratyabhijñānamiti kalpanālāghavam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3561: eṣa eva ca varṇaviṣayasya bhedapratyayasya bādhakaḥ pratyayo yatpratyabhijñānam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3562: kathaṃ hyekasminkālaṃ bahūnāmuccārayatāmeka eva sangakāro yugapadanekarūpaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3564: athavā dhvanikṛto 'yaṃ pratyayabhedo na varṇakṛta ityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3568: tannibandhanāścodāttādayo viśeṣā na varṇasvarūpanibandhanāḥ, varṇānāṃ pratyuccārāṇaṃ pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt
GSP33brssbh1u:3570: itaradhā hi varṇānāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānānāṃ nirbhedatvātsaṃyogavibhāgakṛtā udāttādiviśeṣāḥ kalperan /
GSP33brssbh1u:3571: saṃyogavibhāgānāṃ cāpratyakṣatvācca tadāśrayā viśeṣā varṇeṣvadhyavasituṃ śakyanta ityato nirālambanā evaita udāttādipratyayāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3572: apica naivaitadabhiniveṣṭavyamudāttādibhedena varṇānāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānānāṃ bhedo bhavediti
GSP33brssbh1u:3577: ekaikavarṇagrahaṇāhitasaṃskārāyāṃ buddhau jhaṭiti pratyava ūbhāsanāditi cet /
GSP33brssbh1u:3582: yato 'syāmapi buddhau gakārādayo varṇā anuvartante natu dakārādayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3583: yadi hyasyā buddhergakārādibhyor'thāntaraṃ sphoṭo viṣayaḥ syāttato
GSP33brssbh1u:3588: tatpratibrūmaḥ - saṃbhavatyanekasyāpyekabuddhiviṣayatvaṃ, paṅ ktirvanaṃ senā daśa śataṃ sahasramityādidarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3589: yā tu gaurityeko 'yaṃ śabda iti buddhiḥ, sā bahuṣveva varṇeṣvekārthāvacchedanibandhanaupacārikī vanasenādibuddhivadeva /
GSP33brssbh1u:3590: atrāha- yadi varṇā eva sāmastyenaikabuddhiviṣayatāmāpadyamānāḥ padaṃ syustato jārā rājā kapiḥ pikaḥ ityādiṣu padaviśeṣapratipattirna syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3591: ta eva hi varṇā itaratra cetaratra ca pratyavabhāsanta iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3592: atra vadāmaḥ - satyapi samastavarṇapratyavamarśe yathā kramānurodhinya eva pipīlikāḥ paṅ ktibuddhimārohanti, evaṃ kramānurodhana eva varṇāḥ padabuddhimārokṣyanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3594: vṛddhavyavahāre ceme varṇāḥ kramādyanugṛhītā gṛhītārthaviśeṣasaṃbandhāḥ santaḥ svavyavahāro 'pyekaikavarṇagrahaṇānantaraṃ samastapratyavamarśinyāṃ buddhau tādṛśā eva pratyavabhāsamānāstaṃ tamarthamavyabhicāreṇa
GSP33brssbh1u:3597: varṇāśceme krameṇa gṛhyamāṇāḥ sphoṭaṃ vyañjayanti sa sphoṭor'thaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:3598: vyanaktīti garīyasī kalpanā syāt, athāpi nāma pratyuccāraṇamanye 'nye
GSP33brssbh1u:3599: varṇāḥ syuḥ, tathāpi pratyabhijñālambanabhāvena varṇasāmānyānāmavaśyābhyupagantavyatvādyā varṇeṣvarthapratipādanaprakriyā racitā sā sāmānyeṣu saṃcārayitavyā /
GSP33brssbh1u:3600: tataśca nityebhyaḥ śabdebhyo devādivyaktīnāṃ prabhava ityaviruddham // 28
GSP33brssbh1u:3602: vasutvādijātivācakācchabdāttajjātīyāṃ cikīrṣitāṃ vyakti buddhāvālikhya tasyāḥ prabhavanaṃ, tadidaṃ tatprabhavatvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3607: tatra saṃnihitavācakaitacchabdo devānāṃ karaṇeṣvanugrāhakatvena saṃnihitānāṃ smārakaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3610: pavitraṃ somaṃ svāntavistaraskurvatāṃ grahāṇāṃ tiraḥpavitraśabdaḥ smārakaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:3611: ṛ.(?).ucośnuvatāṃ stotrāṇāmāśuśabdaḥ stotrānantaraṃ prayogaṃ viśatāṃ śastrāṇāṃ viśvaśabdaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:3615: sphuṭate varṇairvyajyata iti sphoṭo varṇābhivyaṅgyor'thastasya vyañjako gavādiśabdo nityastamabhipretyedamucyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3617: ekaiketi yathā ratnatattvaṃ bahubhiścākṣuṣapratyayaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāsate tathā gavādipadasphoṭo gakārādyekaikavarṇakṛtapratyayaiḥ sphoṭaviṣayairāhitāḥ saṃskārā bījaṃ yasmin citte tasmin antyavarṇakṛtapratyayena janitaḥ paripāko 'ntyaḥ saṃskāro yasminpratyayini citte ekaṃ gauriti padamiti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣastadviṣayatayā
GSP33brssbh1u:3619: vapanānantaraṃ ta eveme keśā iti dhīrbhrāntiriti yuktam, bhedadhīvirodhāt
GSP33brssbh1u:3623: pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇā anuvartante dhvanirvyāvartata iti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3625: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviruddhānekavyaktiṣvabhinnaṃ gotvaṃ tathā dhvaniṣu varṇā abhinnā evetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:3635: svatantrasya karturasmaraṇādibhiḥ sthite vedasya nityatve devādivyaktiprabhavābhyupagamena tasya virodhamāśaṅkya 'ataḥ prabhavāt'
GSP33brssbh1u:3636: iti parihṛtyedānīṃ tadeva vedanityatvaṃ sthitaṃ draḍhayati- ata eva ca
GSP33brssbh1u:3638: ata eva niyatākṛterdevāderjagato vedaśabdaprabhavatvādvedaśabde nityatvamapi pratyetavyam
GSP33brssbh1u:3639: tathāca mantravarṇaḥ - 'yajñena vācaḥ padavīyamāyāntāmanvavindannṛṣiṣu praviṣṭām (ṛ.sa. 10.71.3) iti sthitāmeva vācamanuvinnāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3642: FN: yajñena pūrvasukṛtena karmaṇā vāco vedasya padavīyaṃ mārgayogyatāṃ grahaṇayogyatāṃ āyannāptavantaḥ, tataḥstāṃ vācamṛṣiṣu praviṣṭāṃ vidyamānāṃ anvavindannanulabdhavanto yājñikā itiyāvat /
GSP33brssbh1u:3649: yadā tu khalu sakalaṃ trailokyaṃ parityaktanāmarūpaṃ nirlepaṃ pralīyate prabhavati cābhinavamiti śrutismṛtivādā vadanti tadā kathamavirodha iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3654: anādau ca saṃsāre yathā svāpaprabodhayoḥ pralayaprabhavaśravaṇe 'pi
GSP33brssbh1u:3655: pūrvaprabodhavaduktaprabodhe 'pi vyavahārānna kaścidvirodhaḥ, evaṃ kalpāntaraprabhavapralayayoriti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3656: svāpaprabodhayośca pralayaprabhavau śrūyete- 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na
GSP33brssbh1u:3657: kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati tadenaṃ vāksarvairnābhiḥ sahāpyeti cakṣuḥ sarvai rūpaiḥ sahāpyeti śrotraṃ sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ sahāpyeti manaḥ sarvairdhyānaiḥ sahāphayeti sa yadā pratibudhyate yathāgnerjjvalataḥ sarvā diśo visphuliṅgā vipratiṣṭherannevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇā yathātanaṃ vipratiṣṭante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo lokāḥ (kau. 3.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3662: satyapi sarvavyavahārocchedini mahāpralaye parameśvarānugrahādīśvarāṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ kalpāntaravyavahārānusaṃdhānopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3663: yadyapi prākṛtāḥ prāṇino na janmāntaravyavahāramanusamadadhānā dṛśyanta
GSP33brssbh1u:3665: tathāhi prāṇitvāviśeṣe 'pi manuṣyādistambaparyanteṣu jñānaiśvaryādipratibandhaḥ pareṇa pareṇa bhūyānbhavandṛśyate, tathā manuṣyādistambaparyanteṣu hiraṇyagarbhaparyanteṣu
GSP33brssbh1u:3666: jñānaiśvaryādyabhivyaktirapi pareṇa pareṇa bhūyasī bhavatītyetacchrutismṛtivādeṣvasakṛdanuśrūyamāṇaṃ na śakyaṃ vaditum /
GSP33brssbh1u:3667: tataścātītakalpānuṣṭhitaprakṛṣṭajñānakarmaṇāmīśvarāṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ vartamānakalpādau prādurbhavatāṃ parameśrānugṛhītānāṃ suptapratibuddhatvakalpāntaravyavahārānusaṃdhānopapattiḥ tathāca śrutiḥ - 'yo brahmaṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃśca prahiṇoti tasmai /
GSP33brssbh1u:3668: taṃ ha devamātmabuddhiprakāśaṃ mumukṣurvai śaraṇamahaṃ prapadye' (śve,
GSP33brssbh1u:3673: śrutirapyṛṣijñānapūrvakameva mantreṇānuṣṭhānaṃ darśayati- 'yo havā aviditārṣeyacchandodaivatabrāhmaṇena mantreṇa yajayati vādhyāpayati vā
GSP33brssbh1u:3674: sthāṇuṃ vacrchati gartaṃ vā pratipadyate'' (sarvānu. pari.) ityupakramya tasmādetāni mantre mantre vidyāt' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3677: dṛṣṭānuśravikasukhaduḥkhaviṣayau ca rāgadveṣau bhavato na vilakṣaṇaviṣayāvityato dharmādharmaphalabhūtottarā sṛṣṭirniṣpadyamānā pūrvasṛṣṭisadṛśyeva niṣpadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3678: smṛtiśca bhavati- 'teṣāṃ ye yāni karmāṇi prāksṛṣṭyāṃ pratipedire /
GSP33brssbh1u:3679: tānyeva te prapadyante sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ //
GSP33brssbh1u:3691: ataśca sarvakalpānāṃ tulyavyavahāratvātkalpāntavyavahārānusaṃdhānakṣamatvācceśvarāṇāṃ samānanāmarūpā eva pratisargaṃ viśeṣāḥ prādurbhavanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3694: samānanāmarūpatāṃ ca śrutismṛtī darśayataḥ - 'sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpayat
GSP33brssbh1u:3695: divaṃ ca pṛthivī cāntarikṣamatho svaḥ' (ṛ.saṃ. 10. 190.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3696: yathā pūrvasminkalpe sūryācandramaḥprabhṛti jagatkḷptaṃ tathāsminnapi kalpe parameśvaro 'kalpayadityarthaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:3699: 3.1.4.1) iti nakṣatreṣṭividhau yo 'gnirniravapadyasmai vāgnaye niravapattayoḥ samānanāmarūpatāṃ darśayatītyevañjātīyakā śrutirihodāhartavyā /
GSP33brssbh1u:3703: dṛśyante tāni tānyeva tathā bhāvā yugādiṣu //
GSP33brssbh1u:3710: prāṇaḥ paramātmā tatra jīva ekībhavati enaṃ prāṇaṃ sa jīvaḥ tadaitīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3716: ṛgvedo daśamaṇḍalātmakaḥ maṇḍalānāṃ daśatayamātrāstīti tatra bhavā ṛco dāśatayyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3717: arṣeya ṛṣiyogaḥ, chando gāyatryādi, daivatagnyādi, brāhmaṇaṃ viniyogaḥ etānyaviditāni yasminmantre, sthāṇuṃ sthāvaraṃ, gartaṃ narakam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3729: iha devādīnāmapi brahmavidyāyāmastyadhikāra iti yatpratijñātaṃ tatparyāvartyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3736: 'asau vā ādityo devamadhu' (chā. 3.1.1) ityatra manuṣyā ādityaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:3739: punaścādityavyapāśrayāṇi pañca rohitādīnyamṛtānyupakramya vasavo rudrā ādityā marutaḥ sādhyāśca pañca devagaṇāḥ krameṇa tattatamṛtamupajīvantītyupadiśya 'sa ya etadevamamṛtaṃ veda vasūnāmevaiko bhūtvāgninaiva mukhenaitadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati' ityādinā vasvādyupajīvyānyamṛtāni vijānatāṃ vasvādimahimaprāptiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3742: 'tathā agniḥ pādo vāyuḥ pāda ādityaḥ pādo diśaḥ pādaḥ' (chā. 3.18.2),
GSP33brssbh1u:3744: ityādiṣu devatātmopāsaneṣu na teṣāmeva devatātmānamadhikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3749: FN: pañceti caturvedokarmāṇi praṇavaścati pañca kusumāni tebhyaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:3750: somājyādidravyāṇi hutāni rohitādīni lohitaṃ, śuklaṃ, kṛṣṇaṃ, paraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:3751: madhye kṣobhata iva, ityuktāni pañca rohitādīnyamṛtāni tattanmantrabhāgaiḥ prāgādyūrdhvāntapañcadigavasthitābhirādityaraśmināḍībhirmadhvaṣūpasthitacchidrarūpābhirādityamaṇḍalamānītāni yaśastejaindriyavīryānnātmanā pariṇatāni pañcadikṣu
GSP33brssbh1u:3754: yadidaṃ jyotirmaṇḍalaṃ dyusthānamahorātrābhyāṃ bambhramajjagadavabhāsayati tasminnādityādayo devatāvacanāḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:3756: naca jyotirmaṇḍalasya hṛdayādinā vigraheṣu cetanayārthitvādinā vā yogo
GSP33brssbh1u:3763: pratyakṣādibhya eva hyavicāritaviśeṣebhyaḥ pramāṇebhyaḥ prasiddhyanartho lokātprasidhyatītyucyate
GSP33brssbh1u:3766: arthavādā api vidhinaikavākyatvātstutyarthāḥ santo na pārthagarthyena devādīnāṃ vigrahādisadbhāve kāraṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:3767: mantrā api śrutyādiviniyuktāḥ prayogasamavāyino 'bhidhānārthā na kasyacidarthasya pramāṇamityācakṣate
GSP33brssbh1u:3771: yamaṃ daṇḍahastaṃ, indraṃ vajrahastaṃ, likhantīti vigrahādipañcakasadbhāvādanadhikāradoṣo nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3781: manuṣyāṇāmapi na sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ sarveṣu rājasūyādiṣvadhikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3783: brahmavidyāṃ ca prakṛtya bhavati darśanaṃ śrautaṃ devādyadhikārasya
GSP33brssbh1u:3784: sūcakam- 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavattatharṣīṇāṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:3786: 'te hocurhanta tamātmānamanvicchāmo yamātmānamanviṣya sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmān' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3787: 'indro ha vai devānāmabhipravrāja virocana'surāṇām' (chā. 8.7.2) ityādi ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:3790: atra brūmaḥ jyotirādiviṣayā api ādityādayo devatāvacanāḥ śabdāścetanāvantamaiśvaryādyupetaṃ taṃ taṃ devatātmānaṃ samarpayanti,
GSP33brssbh1u:3792: asti hyaiśvaryayogāddevatānāṃ jyotirādyātmabhiścāvasthātuṃ yatheṣṭaṃ ca taṃ taṃ vigrahaṃ grahītuṃ sāmarthyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3794: 'medhātithiṃ ha kāṇvāyanamindro meṣo bhūtvā jahāra' (ṣaḍviṃśa. brā. 1.1)
GSP33brssbh1u:3796: smaryate ca- 'ādityaḥ puruṣo bhūtvā kuntīmupajagāma ha' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3802: atra brūmaḥ - pratyayāpratyayau hi sadbhāvāsadbhāvayoḥ kāraṇaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:3804: tathāhyanyārthamapi prasthitaḥ pathi patitaṃ tṛṇaparṇādyastītyeva pratipadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3806: tatra hi tṛṇaparṇādiviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravṛttamasti yena tadastitvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3807: atra punarvidhyuddeśaikavākyabhāvena stutyarther'thavādena pārthagarthyena vṛttāntaviṣayā pravṛttiḥ śakyādhyavasātum /
GSP33brssbh1u:3808: nahi 'na surāṃ pibet' iti nañvati vākye
GSP33brssbh1u:3813: vidhyuddeśārthavādayostvarthavādasthāni padāni pṛthaganvayavṛttāntaviṣayaṃ pratipadyānantaraṃ kaimarthyavaśena kāmaṃ vidheḥ stāvakatvaṃ pratipadyante
GSP33brssbh1u:3814: yathāhi- 'vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāmaḥ' ityatra vidhyuddeśavartināṃ vāyavyādipadānāṃ vidhinā saṃbandhaḥ, naivaṃ 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati'
GSP33brssbh1u:3816: nahi bhavati vāyurvā ālabheteti kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vā ālabhetetyādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:3817: vāyusvabhāvasaṃkīrtanena tvavāntaramanvayaṃ pratipadyaivaṃ viśiṣṭadaivatyamidaṃ karmeti vidhiṃ stuvanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3821: yatra tu tadubhayaṃ nāsti tatra kiṃ pramāṇāntarābhāvādguṇavādaḥ syādāhosvitpramāṇāntarāvirodhādvidyamānavāda iti pratītiśaraṇairvidyamānavāda āśrayaṇīyo na guṇavādaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3825: naca cetasyanārūḍhāyai tasyai tasyai devatāyai haviḥ pradātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3826: śrāvayati ca- 'yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ dhyāyedvaṣaṭkariṣyan'
GSP33brssbh1u:3829: tatra yādṛśaṃ mantrārthavādayorindrādīnāṃ svarūpamavagataṃ na tattādṛśaṃ śabdapramāṇakena pratyākhyatuṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3830: itihāsapurāṇamapi vyākhyātena mārgeṇa saṃbhavanmantrārthavādamūlatvātprabhavati devatāvigrahādi sādhayitim /
GSP33brssbh1u:3833: tathāca vyāsādayo devādibhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ vyavaharantīti smaryate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3834: yastu brūyādidānīntanānāmiva pūrveṣāmapi nāsti devādibhirvyavahartuṃ sāmarthyamiti sa jagadvaicitryaṃ pratiṣedhet /
GSP33brssbh1u:3835: idānīmiva ca nānyadapi sārvabhaumaḥ kṣatriyo 'stīti brūyāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3841: yogo 'pyaṇimādyaiśvaryarprāptiphalaḥ smaryamāṇo na śakyate sāhasamātreṇa pratyākhyātum /
GSP33brssbh1u:3842: śrutiśca yogamāhātmyaṃ prakhyāpayati- 'pṛthivyaptejo 'nilakhe samutthite pañcātmake yogaguṇe pravṛtte /
GSP33brssbh1u:3843: na tasya rogo na jarā na mṛtyuḥ prāptasya yogāgnimayaṃ śarīram'' (śvaṃ.
GSP33brssbh1u:3845: ṛṣīṇāmapi mantrabrāhmaṇadarśināṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāsmadīyena sāmarthyenopamātuṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3847: lokaprasiddhirapi na sati saṃbhave nirālambanādhyavasātuṃ yuktā /
GSP33brssbh1u:3851: FN: yataḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvatrādhikāro na saṃbhavati tato na cāpodyetetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3861: yathā manuṣyādhikāraniyamamapodya devādīnāmapi vidyāsvadhikāra uktastathaiva dvijātyadhikāraniyamāpavādena śūdrasyāpyadhikāraḥ syādityetāmāśaṅkāṃ nivartayitumidamadhikaraṇamārabhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3866: yacca karmasvanadhikārakāraṇaṃ śūdrasyānagnitvaṃ na tadvidyāsvavikārasyāpavādakaṃ liṅgam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3869: saṃvargavidyāyāṃ hi jānaśrutiṃ pautrāyaṇaṃ śuśrūṣuṃ śūdraśabdena
GSP33brssbh1u:3870: parāmṛśati- 'aha hāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhirastu' (chāṃ 4.2.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3873: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ, vedādhyayanābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3881: yaccedaṃ 'śūdro yajñe 'navakḷptaḥ' iti tannyāyapūrvakatvādvidyāyāmapyanavakḷptatvaṃ dyotayati, nyāyasya sādhāraṇatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3882: yatpunaḥ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ śūdraśabdaśravaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ manyase, na talliṅgaṃ nyāyābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3890: (chā. 4.1.3) ityasmāddhaṃsavākyādātmano 'nādaraṃ śrutavato jānaśruteḥ pautrāyaṇasya śugutpede, tāmṛṣīraikvaḥ śūdraśabdenānena sūcayaṃbabhūvātmanaḥ parokṣajñatākhyāpanāyeti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3892: kathaṃ punaḥ śūdraśabdena śugutpannā sūcyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3894: śucamabhidudrāva, śucā vābhidudruve, śucā vā raikvamabhidudrāveti śūdraḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3899: hāreṇa niṣkeṇa itvāgantā ratho hāretvā saca gobhiḥ saha he śūdra,
GSP33brssbh1u:3905: yugvā gantrī śakaṭī tathā saha sthitaṃ raikvamivaitadvacanamāttha /
GSP33brssbh1u:3908: yatkāraṇaṃ prakaraṇanirūpaṇena kṣatriyatvamasyottaratra caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā kṣatriyeṇa samabhivyāhārādgamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3909: uttaratra hi saṃvargavidyāvākyaśeṣe caitrarathirabhipratārī kṣatriyaḥ saṃkīrtyate- ' atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kapoyamabhipratāraṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī vibhikṣe' (chā. 4.3.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3911: kāpeyayogo hi citrarathasyāvagataḥ 'etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayan'
GSP33brssbh1u:3913: samānānvayānāṃ ca prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3915: tena kṣatriyeṇābhipratāriṇā saha samānāyāṃ vidyayāyāṃ saṃkīrtanaṃ jānaśruterapi kṣatriyatvaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3924: itaśca na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ, yadvidyāpradeśeṣūpanayanādayaḥ saṃskārāḥ parāmṛśyante- 'taṃ hopaninye' (śa.brā. 11.5.3.13) /
GSP33brssbh1u:3925: ' adhīhi bhagava iti hopasasāda' (chā. 7.1.1) ' brahmaparā brahmaniṣṭhāḥ paraṃ brahmānveṣamāṇā eṣa ha vai tatsarvaṃ vakṣyatīti te ha samitpāṇayo bhagavantaṃ pippalādamupasannāḥ' (pra. 1.1) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:3939: yatsatyavacanena śūdratvābhāve nirdhārite jābālaṃ gautama upanetumanuśāsituṃ ca pravavṛte 'naitadbrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhati samidhaṃ somyāharopa tvā neṣye na satyādagāḥ' (chā. 4.4.5) iti śrutiliṅgāt // 37 //
GSP33brssbh1u:3940: FN: nāhaṃ gotraṃ vedmi na mātā vetti parantu tathoktam upanayanārthamācāryaṃ gatvā satyakāmo jābālo 'smīti brūhītyanena satyavacanena /
GSP33brssbh1u:3947: 'padyu ha vā etacchmaśānaṃ yacchūdrastasmācchūdrasamīpe nādhyetavyam' iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:3949: yasya hi samīpe 'pi nādhyetavyaṃ bhavati sa kathamaśrutamadhīyīta /
GSP33brssbh1u:3950: bhavati ca vedoccāraṇe jihvācchedo dhāraṇe śarīrabheda iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3951: ata eva cārthādarthajñānānuṣṭhānayoḥ pratiṣedho bhavati 'na śūdrasya matiṃ dadyāt' iti, 'dvijātīnāmadhyayanamijyā dānam' iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:3952: yeṣāṃ punaḥ pūrvakṛtasaṃskāravaśādviduradharmavyādhaprabhṛtīnāṃ jñānotpattisteṣāṃ na śakyate phalaprāptiḥ pratiṣeddhuṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:3966: mahadbhayaṃ vajramudyataṃ ya etadviduramṛtāste bhavanti' (kā. 2.6.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3968: asminvākye sarvamidaṃ jagatprāṇāśrayaṃ spandate, mahacca kiñcidbhayakāraṇaṃ vajraśabditamudyataṃ, tadvijñānāccāmṛtatvaprāptiriti śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3969: tatra ko 'sau prāṇaḥ kiṃ tadbhayānakaṃ vajramityapratipattervicāre kriyamāṇe prāptaṃ tāvatprasiddheḥ pañcavṛttirvāyuḥ prāṇa iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3975: vāyau hi parjanyabhāvena vivartamāne vidyutstanayitruvṛṣṭyaśanayo vivartanta ityācakṣate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3986: tasmiṃllokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tadu nātyeti kaścana' (kā. 2.6.1) iti brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ, tadevehāpi saṃnidhānāt jagatsarvaṃ prāṇa ejatīti ca
GSP33brssbh1u:3990: tathācoktam- 'na prāṇena nāpānena martyo jīvati kaścana /
GSP33brssbh1u:3993: bhayādindraśca vāyuśca mṛtyurdhāvati pañcamaḥ' (kā. 2.6.3) iti brahmaiva nirdekṣyate na vāyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3995: tadevehāpi saṃnidhānānmahadbhayaṃ, vajramudyatamiti ca bhayahetutvapratyabhijñānānnirdiṣṭamiti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3997: yathāhi vajramudyataṃ mamaiva śirasi nipatedyadyahamasya śāsanaṃ na kuryāmityanena bhayena jano niyamena rājādiśāsane pravartata evamidamagnivāyusūryādikaṃ jagadasmādeva brahmaṇo bibhyanniyamena svavyāpāre pravartata iti bhayānakaṃ vajropamitaṃ brahma /
GSP33brssbh1u:4004: 'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' (śve. 6.15) iti mantravarṇāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4010: anyatra bhūtācca bhavyācca yattatpaśyasi tadvada (kā. 1.2.14) iti paramātmanaḥ pṛṣṭatvāt // FN: bhīṣā bhītyā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4013: 'apapunarmṛtyuṃ jayati' iti śrutyā hyapamṛtyorvijaya ukto na tu
GSP33brssbh1u:4020: tatra saṃśayyate, kiṃ jyotiḥśabdaṃ cakṣurviṣayatamopahaṃ tejaḥ kiṃvā paraṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:4027: 1.1.24) ityatra hi prakaraṇājyotiḥśabdaḥ svārthaṃ parityajya brahmaṇi
GSP33brssbh1u:4033: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - parameva brahma jyotiḥśabdam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4036: tasya hīha prakaraṇe vaktavyatvenānuvṛttirdṛśyate, ' ya ātmāpahatapāpmā'
GSP33brssbh1u:4039: 'aśarīraṃ vāvasantaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ'(chā. 8.12.1) iti cāśarīratāyai jyotiḥsaṃpatterasyābhidhānāt
GSP33brssbh1u:4044: nahyātyantike mokṣe gatyutkrāntī sta iti vakṣyāmaḥ // 40 //
GSP33brssbh1u:4045: FN: 'atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ' ityādi nāḍīkhaṇḍaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4050: 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma tadamṛtaṃ sa ātmā' (chā. 8.14.1) iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4051: tatkimākāśasabdaṃ paraṃ brahma kiṃvā prasiddhameva bhūtākāśamiti vicāre bhūtaparigraho yuktaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:4052: ākāśaśabdasya tasminrūḍhatvāt, nāmarūpanirvahaṇasya cāvakāśādānadvāreṇa tasminyojayituṃ śakyatvāt, sraṣṭṛtvādeśca spaṣṭasya brahmaliṅgasyāśravaṇāditi /
GSP33brssbh1u:4053: evaṃ prāpta idamucyate- parameva brahmehākāśaśabdaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4058: naca brahmaṇo 'nyannāmarūpābhyāmarthāntaraṃ saṃbhavati' sarvasya vikārajātasya nāmarūpābhyāmeva vyākṛtatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4059: nāmarūpayorapi nirvahaṇaṃ niraṅ kuśaṃ na brahmaṇo 'nyatra saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4066: 'tadbrahma tadamṛtaṃ sa ātmā' (chā. 8.14) iti ca brahmavādasya liṅgāni /
GSP33brssbh1u:4068: FN: nāmarūpe śabdāthā tadantaḥpātinastadbhinnatvaṃ tatkartṛtvaṃ cāyuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4073: bṛhadāraṇyake ṣaṣṭe prapāṭhake 'katama ātmeti yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 4.3.7) ityupakramya bhūyānātmaviṣayaḥ prapañcaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4080: upasaṃhāre ca sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' (bṛ.
GSP33brssbh1u:4081: 4.4.22) iti tadaparityāgāt, madhye 'pi buddhāntādyavasthopanyāsena tasyaiva prapañcanāditi
GSP33brssbh1u:4082: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - parameśvaropadeśaparamevedaṃ vākyaṃ na
GSP33brssbh1u:4086: suṣuptau tāvat 'ayaṃ puruṣaḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana
GSP33brssbh1u:4087: veda nāntaram' (bṛ. 4.3.21) iti śārīrādbhedena parameśvaraṃ vyapadiśati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4095: tasmātsuṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena vyapadeśātparameśvara evātra vivakṣata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4097: atra brūmaḥ - upakrametāvat 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu iti na saṃsārisvarūpaṃ vivakṣitaṃ kiṃ tarhyanūdya saṃsārisvarūpaṃ pareṇa brahmaṇāsyaikatāṃ vivakṣati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4099: tathopasaṃhāre 'pi yathopakramamevopasaṃharati- 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4100: yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu saṃsārī lakṣyate sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā
GSP33brssbh1u:4102: yastu madhye buddhāntādyavasthopanyāsātsaṃsārisvarūpavivakṣāṃ manyante, na prācīmapi diśaṃ prasthāpitaḥ pratīcīmapi diśaṃ pratiṣṭheta /
GSP33brssbh1u:4103: yato na buddhāntādyavasthopanyāsenāvasthāvattvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ vā vivakṣati,
GSP33brssbh1u:4106: yat 'ata ūrdhve vimokṣāyaiva brūhi' iti pade pade pṛcchati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4107: yacca 'ananvāgatastena bhavatyasaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 4.3.14,15) iti pade pade prativakti
GSP33brssbh1u:4108: 'ananvāgataṃ puṇyenānanvāgataṃ pāpena tīrṇo hi tadā sarvāñśokānhṛdayasya
GSP33brssbh1u:4123: yadasminvākye patyādayaḥ śabdā asaṃsārisvarūpapratipādanaparāḥ saṃsārisvabhāvapratiṣedhanāśca bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4125: 'sa na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānno evāsādhunā kanīyān' ityevañjātīyakāḥ saṃsārisvabhāvapratiṣedhanāḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:4127: iti śrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ FN: vaśī svatantraḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4133: ānumānikam apy ekeṣām iti cen na śarīra-rūpaka-vinyasta-gṛhīter darśayati ca |
GSP33brssbh1u:4138: gatismānyaṃ ca vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmakāraṇavādaṃ prati vidyate na pradhānakāraṇavādaṃ pratīti prapañcitaṃ gatena granthena /
GSP33brssbh1u:4139: idaṃ tvidānīmavaśiṣṭamāśaṅkṣyate- yaduktaṃ pradhānasyāśabdatvaṃ tadasiddhaṃ, kāsucicchāsvāsu pradhānasamarpaṇābhāsānāṃ śabdanāṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:4141: ataḥ pradhānasya kāraṇatvaṃ vedasiddhameva mahadbhiḥ paramarṣibhiḥ kapilaprabhṛtibhiḥ parigṛhītamiti prasajyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4142: tadyāvatteṣāṃ śabdānāmanyaparatvaṃ na pratipādyate tāvatsarvajñaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇamiti pratipāditamapyākulībhavet /
GSP33brssbh1u:4147: tatra ya eva yannāmāno yatkramācca mahadavyaktapuruṣāḥ smṛtiprasiddhāsta eveha pratyabhijñāyante
GSP33brssbh1u:4151: tadeva ca jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ śrutismṛtinyāyaprasiddhibhya iti cet /
GSP33brssbh1u:4154: nahyatra yādṛśaṃ smṛtiprasiddhaṃ svatantraṃ kāraṇaṃ triguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ tādṛśaṃ pratyabhijñāyate
GSP33brssbh1u:4156: sa ca śabdo na vyaktamavyaktamiti yaugikatvādanyasminnapi sūkṣme sudurlakṣye ca prayujyate
GSP33brssbh1u:4158: yā tu pradhānavādināṃ rūḍhiḥ sā teṣāmeva pāribhāṣikī satī na vedārthanirūpaṇe kāraṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4161: prakaraṇanirūpaṇāyāṃ cātra na paraparikalpitaṃ pradhānaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4167: darśayati- 'ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu /
GSP33brssbh1u:4168: buddhiṃ tu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca //
GSP33brssbh1u:4173: saṃyataistvadhvanaḥ pāraṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamāpnoti darśayitvā, kiṃ tadadhvanaḥ pāraṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamityasyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ, tebhya eva prakṛtebhya indriyādibhyaḥ paratvena paramātmānamadhvanaḥ pāraṃ viṣṇoḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:4174: paramaṃ padaṃ darśayati- 'indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā arthebhyaśca paraṃ manaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4177: puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' (kā. 1.3.10,11) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4178: tatra ya evendriyādayaḥ pūrvasyāṃ ratharūpakakalpanāyāmaśvādibhāvena prakṛtāsta eveha parigṛhyante prakṛtahānāprakṛtaprakriyāparihārāya /
GSP33brssbh1u:4180: arthā ye śabdādayo viṣayā indriyahayagocaratvena nirdiṣṭāsteṣāṃ cendriyebhyaḥ paratvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4185: buddherātmā mahānparaḥ, yaḥ sa 'ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi' iti rathitvenopakṣiptaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4192: ' iti smṛteḥ, 'yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃśca prahiṇoti
GSP33brssbh1u:4194: 6.18) iti ca śruteryā prathamajasya hiraṇyagarbhasya buddhiḥ sā sarvāsāṃ buddhīnāṃ parā pratiṣṭhā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4196: sā ca pūrvatra buddhigrahaṇenaiva gṛhītā satī hirugīhopadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4198: etasmiṃstu pakṣe paramātmaviṣayeṇaiva pareṇa puruṣagrahaṇena rathina ātmano grahaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam
GSP33brssbh1u:4201: itarāṇīndriyādīni prakṛtānyeva paramapadadidarśayiṣayā samanukrāmanpariśiṣyamāṇenehāntyenāvyaktaśabdena pariśiṣyamāṇaṃ prakṛtaṃ śarīraṃ darśayatīti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4202: śarīrendriyamanobuddhiviṣayavedanāsaṃyuktasya hyavidyāvato bhoktuḥ śarīrādīnāṃ rathādirūpakakalpanayā saṃsāramokṣagatinirūpaṇena pratyagātmabrahmāvagatiriha vivakṣitā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4203: tathāca 'eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhātmā na prakāśate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4205: (kā. 1.3.12) iti vaiṣṇavasya paramapadasya duravagamatvamuktvā tadavagamārthaṃ yogaṃ darśayati- 'yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñastadyacchejjñāna ātmani /
GSP33brssbh1u:4212: tāmapi buddhiṃ mahatyātmani bhoktaryagryāyāṃ vā buddhau sūkṣmatāpādanena niyacchet /
GSP33brssbh1u:4213: mahāntaṃ tvātmānaṃ śānta ātmani prakaraṇavati parasminpuruṣe parasyāṃ kāṣṭhāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayediti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:4218: apiśabdādekaśabdācca brahmāṅgīkāreṇa pūrvapakṣo vicāraścāyaṃ kvācitka iti sūcitam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4241: ata uttaramucyate- sūkṣmaṃ tviha kāraṇātmanā śarīraṃ vivakṣyate sūkṣmasyāvyaktaśabdārhatvāt
GSP33brssbh1u:4242: yadyapi sthūlamidaṃ śarīraṃ na svayamavyaktaśabdamarhati, tathāpi tasya tvārambhakaṃ bhūtasūkṣmamavyaktaśabdamarhati
GSP33brssbh1u:4245: tarhyavyākṛtamāsīt' (bṛ. 1.4.7) itīdameva vyākṛtanāmarūpavibhinnaṃ jagatprāgavasthāyāṃ parityaktavyākṛtanāmarūpaṃ bījaśaktyavasthamavyaktaśabdayogaṃ darśayati // 2 //
GSP33brssbh1u:4247: gobhirgovikāraiḥ payobhiḥ matsaraṃ somaṃ śrīṇīta miśritaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4248: tat ha kila tarhi prāgavasthāyāmidaṃ jagadavyākṛtaṃ avyaktamāsīt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4251: prāgavasthamavyaktaśabdārhamabhyupagamyeta, tadātmanā ca śarīrasyāpyavyaktaśabdārhatvaṃ pratijñāyeta, sa eva tarhi
GSP33brssbh1u:4254: atrocyate- yadi vayaṃ svatantrāṃ kāñcitprāgavasthāṃ jagataḥ kāraṇatvenābhyupagacchema, prasañjyema tadā pradhānakāraṇavādam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4255: parameśvarādhīnā tviyamasmābhiḥ prāgavasthā jagato 'bhyupagamyate na svatantrā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4258: nahi tayā vinā parameśvarasya sraṣṭṛtvaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4263: avidyātmikā hi bījaśaktiravyaktaśabdanirdeśyā parameśvarāśrayā māyāmayī mahāsuptiḥ, yasyāṃ svarūpapratibodharahitāḥ śerate saṃsāriṇo jīvāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4264: tadetadavyaktaṃ kvacidākāśaśabdanirdiṣṭam- 'etasminnu khalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśca protaśca' (bṛ. 3.8.11) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4266: kvacinmāyeti sūcitam- 'māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram'
GSP33brssbh1u:4269: tadidaṃ 'mahataḥ paramavyaktam' ityuktamavyaktaprabhavatvānmahataḥ, yadā hairaṇyagarbhī buddhirmahān
GSP33brssbh1u:4270: yadā tu jīvo mahāṃstadāpyavyaktādhīnatvājjīvabhāvasya mahataḥ paramavyaktamityuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4272: avidyāvattvenaiva jīvasya sarvaḥ saṃvyavahāraḥ saṃtato vartate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4274: satyapi śarīravadindriyādīnāṃ tadvikāratvāviśeṣe śarīrasyaivābhedopacārādavyaktaśabdena grahaṇaṃ, indriyādīnāṃ svaśabdaireva gṛhītatvātpariśiṣṭatvācca śarīrasya /
GSP33brssbh1u:4275: anye tu varṇayanti- dvividhaṃ hi śarīraṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:4277: sūkṣmaṃ yaduttaratra vakṣyate- 'tadantarapratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvaktaḥ praśnanirūpaṇābhyām' (bṛ. 3.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4283: taistvetadvaktavyaṃ, aviśeṣeṇa śarīradvayasya pūrvatra rathatvena saṃkīrtitatvātsamānayoḥ prakṛtapariśiṣṭatvayoḥ kathaṃ sūkṣmameva śarīramiha gṛhyate na punaḥ sthūlamapīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4285: āmnātaṃ cāvyaktapadaṃ sūkṣmameva pratipādayituṃ śaknoti netaradvyaktatvāttasyeti cet /
GSP33brssbh1u:4288: nahīme pūrvottare āmnāte ekavākyatāmanāpadya kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayataḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:4291: tatrāvaśiṣṭāyāṃ śarīradvayasya grāhyatvākāṅkṣāyāṃ yathākāṅkṣaṃ saṃbandhe 'nabhyupagamyamāna ekavākyataiva bādhitā bhavati kuta āmnātasyārthapratipattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4296: anantaranirdiṣṭatvāttu kiṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamitīdamiha vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4298: sarvathāpi tvānumānikanirakaraṇopapattestathā nāmāstu, na naḥ kiñcicchidyate // 3 //
GSP33brssbh1u:4308: dṛṣṭā bībhatsā ghṛṇā yasmin tasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4311: jñeyatvena ca sāṃkhyaiḥ pradhānaṃ smaryate guṇapuruṣāntarajñānātkaivalyamitivadbhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4312: nahi guṇasvarūpamajñātvā guṇebhyaḥ puruṣasyāntaraṃ śakyaṃ jñātumiti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4319: asmākaṃ tu ratharūpakakḷptaśarīrādyanusaraṇena viṣṇoreva paramaṃ padaṃ darśayitumayamupanyāsa ityanavadyam // 4 //
GSP33brssbh1u:4320: vadatīti cen na prājño hi prakaraṇāt |
GSP33brssbh1u:4325: anādyanantaṃ mahataḥ paraṃ dhruvaṃ nicāyya taṃ mṛtyumukhātpramucyate' //
GSP33brssbh1u:4327: atra hi yādṛśaṃ śabdādihīnaṃ pradhānaṃ mahataḥ paraṃ smṛtau nirūpitaṃ tādṛśameva nicāyyatvena nirdiṣṭaṃ, tasmātpradhānamevedaṃ, tadeva cāvyaktaśabdanirdiṣṭamiti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4328: atra brūmaḥ - neha pradhānaṃ nicāyyatvena nirdiṣṭam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4329: prājño hīha paramātmā nicāyyatveta nirdiṣṭaṃ iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4333: 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' ityādinirdeśāt, 'eṣa
GSP33brssbh1u:4334: sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhotmā na prakāśate' iti ca durjñātatvavacanena tasyaiva jñeyatvākāṅkṣaṇāt
GSP33brssbh1u:4335: 'yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñaḥ' iti ca tajjñānāyaiva vāgādisaṃyamasya vihitatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4337: nahi pradhānamātraṃ nicāyya mṛtyumukhātpramucyata iti sāṃkhyairiṣyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4342: trayāṇām eva caivam upanyāsaḥ praśnaś ca |
GSP33brssbh1u:4347: tatra tāvat 'sa tvamagniṃ svargyamadhyeṣi mṛtyo prabrūhi taṃ śraddadhānāya
GSP33brssbh1u:4355: prativacanamapi 'lokādimamagniṃ tamuvāca tasmai yā iṣṭakāyāvatīrvā yathā vā' (kā. 1.1.15) ityagniviṣayam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4356: 'hanta ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4357: yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya ātmā bhavati gautama /
GSP33brssbh1u:4361: 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit' (kā. 1.2.18) ityādibahuprapañcaṃ paramātmaviṣayam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4364: atrāha- yo 'yamātmaviṣayaḥ praśno yeyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye 'stīti,
GSP33brssbh1u:4365: kiṃ sa evāyam 'anyatra dharmādanyatrādharmāt' iti punaranukṛṣyate, kiṃvā tato 'nyo 'yamapūrvaḥ praśna utthāpyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4367: sa evāyaṃ praśnaḥ punaranukṛṣyata iti yadyucyeta, dvayorātmaviṣayayoḥ praśnayorekatāpatteragniviṣaya ātmaviṣayaśca dvāveva praśnāvityato na
GSP33brssbh1u:4369: athānyo 'yamapūrvaḥ praśnaḥ utthāpyata ityucyeta tato yathaiva varapradānavyatirekeṇa praśnakalpanāyāmadoṣa evaṃ praśna vyatirekeṇāpi pradhānopanyāsakalpanāyāmadoṣaḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssbh1u:4370: atrocyate- naivaṃ vayamiha varapradānavyatirekeṇa praśnaṃ kañcitkalpayāmo vākyopakramasāmarthyāt
GSP33brssbh1u:4371: varapradānopakramā hi mṛtyunaciketaḥsaṃvādarūpā vākyapravṛttirāsamāpteḥ kaṭhavallīnāṃ lakṣyate
GSP33brssbh1u:4372: mṛtyuḥ kila nāciketase pitrā prahitāya trīnvarānpradadau /
GSP33brssbh1u:4373: naciketāḥ kila teṣāṃ prathamena vareṇa saumanasyaṃ vavre /
GSP33brssbh1u:4376: tatra yadyanyatra dharmādityanyo 'yamapūrvaḥ praśna utthāpyeta tato
GSP33brssbh1u:4380: yoyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye 'sti nāstīti vicikitsābhidhānāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4392: iha cānyatra dharmādityasya praśnasya prativacanaṃ 'na jāyate mriyate vā
GSP33brssbh1u:4395: sati hi prasaṅge pratiṣedho bhāgī bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4396: prasaṅgaśca janmamaraṇayoḥ śarīrasaṃsparśācchārīrasya bhavati na parameśvarasya /
GSP33brssbh1u:4398: mahāntaṃ vibhumātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati //
