GSP33brssbh1u:4399: (kā. 2.4.4) iti svapnajāgaritadṛśo jīvasyaiva mahattvavibhutvaviśeṣaṇasya mananena śokavicchedaṃ darśayanna prājñādanyo jīva iti darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4402: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4404: tathā jīvavīṣayasyāstitvanāstitvapraśnasyānantaram 'anyaṃ varaṃ naciketo vṛṇīṣva' ityārabhya mṛtyunā taistaiḥ kāmaiḥ pralobhyamāno 'pi naciketā yadā na cacāla, tadainaṃ mṛtyurabhyudayanīḥśreyasavibhāgapradarśanena vidyāvidyāvibhāgapradarśanena ca 'vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye na tvā kāmā bahavo 'lolupanta' (kā.1.2.4) iti praśasya praśnamapi tadīyaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:4407: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti //
GSP33brssbh1u:4408: ' (kā.1.2.12) iti, tenāpi jīvaprājñayorabheda eveha vivakṣata iti gamyate
GSP33brssbh1u:4409: yatpraśnanimittāṃ ca praśaṃsāṃ mahatīṃ mṛtyoḥ pratyapadyata naciketā yadi taṃ vihāya praśaṃsānantaramanyameva praśnamupakṣipedasthāna eva sā sarvā praśaṃsā prasāritā syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4414: pūrvatra hi dehādivyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvaṃ pṛṣṭamuttaratra tu tasyaivāsaṃsāritvaṃ pṛcchyata iti yāvaddhyavidyā na nivartate
GSP33brssbh1u:4415: tāvaddharmādigocaratvaṃ jīvasya jīvatvaṃ ca na nivartate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4416: tannivṛttau tu prājña eva tattvamasīti śrutyā pratyāyyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4418: yathā kaścitsaṃtamase patitāṃ kāñcidrajjumahiṃ manyamāno bhīto vepamānaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:4419: palāyate, taṃ cāparo brūyānmā bhaṣīrnāyamahī rajjureveti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4420: sa ca tadupaśrutyāhikṛtaṃ bhayamutsṛjedvepathuṃ palāyanaṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:4421: natvahibuddhikāle tadapagamakāle ca vastunaḥ kaścidviśeṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4423: tataśca 'na jāyate mriyate vā' ityevamādyapi bhavatyastitvapraśnasya prativacanam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4429: pradhānakalpanāyāṃ tu na varapradānaṃ na praśno na prativacanamiti vaiṣamyam // 6 //
GSP33brssbh1u:4430: FN: mṛtyunā naciketasaṃprati trīnvarānavṛṇīṣvetyuktestrayāṇāmeva praśno naciketasā kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4432: he mṛtyo, sa mahyaṃ dattavarastvaṃ svargahetumagnimadhyeṣi smarasi /
GSP33brssbh1u:4434: dehādanyo 'sti naveti saṃśayo.'sti ata etadātmatattvamasaṃdigdhaṃ jānīyāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4441: yena sākṣiṇā pramātā paśyati tamātmānamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4446: yathā mahacchabdaḥ sāṃkhyaiḥ sattāmātre 'pi prathamaje prayukte na tameva vaidike 'pi prayoge 'bhidhatte /
GSP33brssbh1u:4457: mantravarṇāt- 'ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīḥ prajāḥ sṛjamānāṃ sarūpāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4465: na jāyata iti cājā syāt, 'mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtiḥ' ityabhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4468: sā tu rūḍhiriha nāśrayituṃ śakyā, vidyāprakaraṇāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4470: tāṃ prakṛtimaja ekaḥ puruṣo juṣamāṇaḥ prīyamāṇaḥ sevamāno vānuśete /
GSP33brssbh1u:4473: anyaḥ punarajaḥ puruṣe utpannavivekajñāno virakto jahātyenāṃ prakṛtiṃ bhuktabhogāṃ kṛtabhogāpavargāṃ parityajati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4476: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nānena mantreṇa śrutimattva sāṃkhyavādasya śakyamāśrayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:4477: nahyayaṃ mantraḥ svātantryeṇa kañcidapi vādaṃ samarthayitumutsahate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4481: yathāhi arvāgbalaścamasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ (bṛ. 2.2.3) ityasminamantre svātantryeṇāyaṃ nāmāsau camaso 'bhipreta iti na śakyate nirūpayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:4485: tatra tu 'idaṃ tacchira eṣa hyarvāgbilaścamasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ' iti vākyaśeṣāccamasaviśeṣapratipattirbhavati
GSP33brssbh1u:4488: FN: ajāmekāṃ- na jāyata ityajā tāṃ mulaprakṛtiṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:4489: rajaḥsatvamoguṇāṃ sarūpāstriguṇātmikāḥ prajā janayantīṃ eko 'jo jīvastāṃ śabdādiviṣayarūpatāpannāṃ juṣamāṇaḥ sannanuśete nirantaraṃ muhyati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4490: jīvena bhukto bhogo yasyāṃ yasyā vā tāṃ jīvena bhujyamānāmanyaḥ paramātmā jahāti nāsyāmāsaktiṃ karoti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4491: avayavāḥ pradhānasya raja ādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayastaiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4497: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke |
GSP33brssbh1u:4498: parameśvarādutpannā jyotiḥpramukhā tejobannalakṣaṇā caturvidhasya bhūtagrāmasya prakṛtibhūteyamajā pratipattavyā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4503: rohitādirūpatāmāmananti- 'yadagre rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejastadrūpaṃ yacchukraṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4505: rohitādīnāṃ ca śabdānāṃ rūpaviśeṣeṣu mukhyatvādbhāktatvācca guṇaviṣayatvasya /
GSP33brssbh1u:4506: asaṃdigdhena ca saṃdigdhasya nigamanaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:4508: kiṅkāraṇaṃ brahma' (śve. 1.1) ityupakramya 'te dyānayogānugatā apaśyandevātmaśaktiṃ svaguṇairnigūḍhām'
GSP33brssbh1u:4510: vākyaśeṣe 'pi 'māyāṃ tu prakṛti vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram' iti 'yo yoniṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:4511: yonimadhitiṣṭhatyekaḥ' (śve. 4.10,11) iti ca tasyā evāvagamānna svatantrā kācitprakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ nāmajāmantreṇāmnāyata iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssbh1u:4512: prakaraṇāttu saiva daivī śaktiravyākṛtanāmarūpā nāmarūpayoḥ prāgavasthānenāpi mantreṇāmnāyata ityucyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4514: kathaṃ punastejobannātmanā trairūpyeṇa trirūpājā pratipattuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4519: te brahmavādino 'nayā rītyā vimṛśya dyānayogenānugatāḥ paramātmānamanu praviṣṭāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4520: avidyāśaktiryoniḥ sā ca pratijīvaṃ nānetyuktamato vīpsopapannā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4526: yathāhi loke yadṛcchayā kācidajā rohitaśuklakṛṣṇaṇavarṇā syādbahubarkarā sarūpabarkarā ca tāṃ ca kaścidajo juṣamāṇo 'nuśayīta, kaściccaināṃ bhuktabhogāṃ juhyāt, evamiyamapi tejobannalakṣaṇā bhūtaprakṛtistrivarṇā
GSP33brssbh1u:4527: bahu sarūpaṃ carācaralakṣaṇaṃ vikārajātaṃ janayati aviduṣā ca kṣetrajñenopabhujyate viduṣā ta parityajata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4528: nacedamāśaṅkitavyamekaḥ kṣetrajño 'nuśete 'nyo jahātītyataḥ kṣetrajñabhedaḥ pāramārthikaḥ pareṣāmiṣṭaḥ prāpnotīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4547: asminmantre pañca pañcajanā iti pañcasaṃkhyāviṣayāparā pañcasaṃkhyā śrūyate pañcadvayaśabdadarśanāt
GSP33brssbh1u:4549: tathā pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā yāvantaḥ saṃkhyeyā ākāṅkṣyantelatāvantyeva ca tattvāni sāṃkhyaiḥ saṃkhyāyante- 'mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtirmahadādyāḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:4551: ṣoḍaśakaśca vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ' (sāṃkhyakā. 3) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4552: tayā śrutiprasiddhayā pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā teṣāṃ smṛtiprasiddhānāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānāmupasaṃgrahātprāptaṃ punaḥ śrutimattvameva pradhānādīnām /
GSP33brssbh1u:4553: tato brūmaḥ - na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi pradhānādīnāṃ śrutimattvaṃ pratyāśā kartavyā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4557: naiṣāṃ pañcaśaḥ pañcaśaḥ sādhāraṇo dharmo 'sti, yena pañcaviṃśaterantarāle parāḥ pañca pañcasaṃkhyā niveśeran /
GSP33brssbh1u:4560: sapta ca varṣāṇi na vavarṣa śatakratuḥ' iti dvādaśavārṣikīmanāvṛṣṭiṃ kathayanti tadvaditi
GSP33brssbh1u:4563: paraścātra pañcaśabdo janaśabdena samastaḥ pañcajanā iti, pāribhāṣikeṇa svareṇaikapadatvaniścayāt
GSP33brssbh1u:4568: naca pañcasaṃkhyāyā ekasyāḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā parayā viśeṣaṇaṃ pañca pañcakā iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4570: nanvāpannapañcasaṃkhyakā janā eva punaḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā viśeṣyamāṇāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ pratyeṣyante
GSP33brssbh1u:4571: yathā pañca pañcapūlya iti pañcavaṃśatipūlāḥ pratīyante tadvat /
GSP33brssbh1u:4573: yuktaṃ yatpañcapūlīśabdasya samāhārābhiprāyatvātkatīti satyāṃ bhedākāṅkṣāyāṃ pañca pañcapūlya iti viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4574: iha tu pañca pañca janā ityādita eva bhedopādānātkatītyasatyāṃ bhedākāṅkṣāyāṃ na pañca pañcajanā iti viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh1u:4575: bhavadapīdaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ pañcasaṃkhyāyā eva bhavet, tatra cokto doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4583: sa ca pañcaviṃśatāvantargata eveti na tasyaivādhāratvamādheyatvaṃ ca yujyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4588: kathaṃ ca saṃkhyāmātraśravaṇe satyaśrutānāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānāmupasaṃgrahaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4592: ucyate- 'diksaṃkhye saṃjñāyām' (pā. sū. 2.1.50) iti viśeṣaṇasmaraṇātsaṃjñāyāmeva pañcaśabdasya janaśabdena samāsaḥ tataśca
GSP33brssbh1u:4593: rūḍhatvābhiprāyeṇaiva kecitpañcajanā nāma vivakṣyante na sāṃkhyatattvābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssbh1u:4595: pañcajanā nāma ye kecitte ca pañcaivetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4611: prāṇādayaḥ pañca nirdiṣṭāḥ - 'prāṇasya prāṇamuta cakṣuṣaścakṣuruta śrotrasya śrotramannasyānnaṃ manaso ye mano viduḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4615: samāne tu prasiddhyatikrame vākyaśeṣavaśātprāṇādaya eva gpahītavyā bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4617: janavacanaśca puruṣaśabdaḥ prāṇeṣu prayuktaḥ 'te vā ete pañca
GSP33brssbh1u:4619: 'prāṇo ha pitā prāṇo ha mātā' (chā.7.15.1) ityādi ca brāhmaṇam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4623: prasiddhārthasaṃnidhāne hyaprasiddhārthaḥ śabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ samabhivyāhārāttadviṣayo niyamyate, yathā 'udbhidā yajeta' 'yūpaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:4625: tathāyamapi pañcajanaśabdaḥ samāsānvākhyānādavagatasaṃjñābhāvaḥ saṃjñyākāṅkṣī vākyaśeṣasamabhivyāhṛteṣu prāṇādiṣu vartiṣyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4626: kaiścittu devāḥ pitaro gandharvā asurā rakṣāṃsi ca pañca pañcajanā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4635: kāṇvānāṃ tu kathaṃ prāṇādayaḥ pañcajanā bhaveyurye 'nnaṃ prāṇādiṣu nāmanantīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4638: ye prāṇādiprerakaṃ tatsākṣiṇamātmānaṃ viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4639: janavācakaḥ śabdo janaśabdaḥ pañcajanaśabda iti yāvat /
GSP33brssbh1u:4642: asatyapi kāṇvānāmanne jyotiṣā teṣāṃ pañcasaṃkhyā pūryeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:4645: kathaṃ punarubhayeṣāmapi tulyavadidaṃ jyotiḥ paṭhyamānaṃ samānamantragatayā pañcasaṃkhyayā keṣāñcidgrṛhyate keṣāñcinneti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4659: tatredamaparamāśaṅkate- na janmādikaraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo brahmaviṣayaṃ vā gatisāmānyaṃ vedāntavākyānāṃ pratipattuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4666: kvacitprāṇādikā- 'sa prāṇamasṛjata prāṇācchraddhām' (pra. 6.4) iti kvacidakrameṇaiva lokānāmutpattirāmnāyate- sa imāṃllokānasṛjata /
GSP33brssbh1u:4668: tathā kvacidasatpūrvikā sṛṣṭiḥ paṭhyate- 'asadvā idamagra āsīttato vai
GSP33brssbh1u:4672: āhurasadevedamagra āsīt' ityupakramya 'kutastu khalu somyaivaṃ syāditi
GSP33brssbh1u:4673: hovāca kathamasataḥ sajjāyeteti sattveva somyedamagra āsīt' (chā. 6.2.1,2)
GSP33brssbh1u:4677: evamanekadhā vipratipattirvastuni ca vikalpasyānupapatterna vedāntavākyānāṃ jagatkāraṇāvadhāraṇaparatā nyāyyā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4679: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - satyapi prativedāntaṃ sṛjyamāneṣvākāśādiṣu
GSP33brssbh1u:4686: atra tāvajjñānaśabdena pareṇa ca tadviṣayeṇa kāmayitṛtvavacanena cetanaṃ brahma nyarūpayadaparaprayojyatveneśvaraṃ kāraṇamabravīt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4687: tadviṣayeṇaiva pareṇātmaśabdena śarīrādikośaparaṃparayā cāntaranupraveśanena sarveṣāmantaḥ pratyagātmānaṃ niradhārayat /
GSP33brssbh1u:4690: tathā 'idaṃ sarvamasṛjata yadidaṃ kiñca' (tai.2.6) iti samastajagatsṛṣṭinirdeśena prākhsṛṣṭeradvitīyaṃ sraṣṭāramācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssbh1u:4691: tadatra yallakṣaṇaṃ brahma kāraṇatvena vijñātaṃ tallakṣaṇamevānyatrāpi
GSP33brssbh1u:4692: vijñāyate- 'sadeva semyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti
GSP33brssbh1u:4694: tathā 'ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīnnānyakiñcana miṣat /
GSP33brssbh1u:4695: sa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjai' (ai.u. 4.1.1,2) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:4697: kāryaviṣayaṃ tu vigānaṃ dṛśyate kvacidākāśādikā sṛṣṭiḥ kvacittejādiketyevañjātīyakam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4698: naca kāryaviṣayeṇa vigānena kāraṇamapi brahma sarvavedānteṣvavigītamadhigamyamānamavivakṣitaṃ bhavitumarhatīti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssbh1u:4703: nahi tatpratibaddhaḥ kvacitpuruṣārtho dṛśyate śrūyate vā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4704: naca kalpayituṃ śakyate, upakramopasaṃhārābhyāṃ tatra tatra
GSP33brssbh1u:4706: darśayati ca sṛṣṭyādiprapañcasya brahmapratipattyarthatām- 'annena somya śuṅgenāpo mūlamanvicchadbhiḥ somya śuṅgena tejo mulamanviccha tejasā somya
GSP33brssbh1u:4708: mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiśca kāryasya kāraṇenābhedaṃ vadituṃ sṛṣṭyādiprapañcaḥ śrāvyata iti gamyate
GSP33brssbh1u:4717: yatpunaḥ kāraṇaviṣayaṃ vigānaṃ darśitam- 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' ityādi tatparihartavyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4741: santamenaṃ tato viduḥ' ityasadvādāpavādenāstitvalakṣaṇaṃ brahmānnamayādikośaparamparayā pratyagātmānaṃ nirdhārya 'so 'kāmayata' iti tameva prakṛtaṃ samākṛṣya saprapañcāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ tasmācchrāvayitvā
GSP33brssbh1u:4742: 'tatsatyamityācakṣate' iti copasaṃhṛtya 'tadapyeṣa śloko bhavati' iti tasminneva prakṛter'the ślokamimamudāharati- 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4745: tasmānnāmarūpavyākṛtavastuviṣayaḥ prāyeṇa sacchabdaḥ prasiddha iti tadvyākaraṇābhāvāpekṣayā prāgutpatteḥ sadeva brahmāsadivāsīdityupacaryate
GSP33brssbh1u:4753: jagato vyākaraṇaṃ kathyate, 'sa eṣa iha praviṣṭa ānakhāgrebhyaḥ'
GSP33brssbh1u:4755: niradhyakṣe vyākaraṇābhyupagame hyanantareṇa prakṛtāvalambanā sa ityanena sarvanāmnā kaḥ kāryānupraveśitvena samākṛṣyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:4759: apica yādṛśamidamadyatve nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākriyamāṇaṃ jagatsādhyakṣaṃ vyākriyata evamādisarge 'pīti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4763: vyākriyata ityapi karmakartari lakāraḥ satyeva parameśvare vyākartari saukaryamapekṣya draṣṭavyaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:4764: yathā lūyate kedāraḥ svayameveti satyeva pūrṇake lavitari /
GSP33brssbh1u:4775: kauṣītakibrāhmaṇe bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvāde śrūyate- 'yo vai bālāka eteṣāṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:4776: kartā yasya vai tatkarma sa veditavyaḥ' (kau. brā. 4.19) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4777: tatra kiṃ jīvo veditavyatvenopadiśyata uta mukhyaḥ prāṇa uta paramātmeti viśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4783: vākyaśeṣe ca 'athāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' iti prāṇaśabdadarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4786: ityevamādayaḥ puruṣā nirdiṣṭāsteṣāmapi bhavati prāṇaḥ kartā prāṇāvasthāviśeṣatvādityādidevatātmanām
GSP33brssbh1u:4787: 'katama eko deva iti prāṇa iti sa brahma tyadityācakṣate (bṛ. 3.9.9) iti śrutyantaraprasiddheḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:4789: tasyāpi dharmādharmalakṣaṇaṃ karma śakyate śrāvayitum 'yasya vaitatkarma'
GSP33brssbh1u:4793: yatkāraṇaṃ veditavyatayopanyastasya puruṣāṇāṃ karturvedanāyopetaṃ bālākiṃ prati bubodhayiṣurajātaśatruḥ suptaṃ puruṣamāmantryāmantraṇaśabdāśravaṇātprāṇādīnāmabhoktṛtvaṃ pratibodhya yaṣṭighātotthānātprāṇādivyatiriktaṃ jīvaṃ bhoktāraṃ pratibodhayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4794: tathā parastādapi jīvaliṅgamavagamyate- 'tadyathā śreṣṭhī svairbhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhina bhuñjantyevamevaiṣa prajñātmaitairātmabhirbhuṅkte
GSP33brssbh1u:4795: evamevaita ātmāna etamātmānaṃ bhuñjanti' (kau. brā. 4.20) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4799: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - parameśvara evāyameteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4802: iha hi bālākirajātaśatruṇā saha 'brahma te bravāṇi' iti saṃvaditumupacakrame /
GSP33brssbh1u:4804: tamajātaśatruḥ 'mṛṣā vai khalu mā saṃvadiṣṭā brahma te bravāṇi' ityamukhya brahmavāditayāpodya tatkartāramanyaṃ veditavyatayopacikṣepa /
GSP33brssbh1u:4807: kartṛtvaṃ caiteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na parameśvarādanyasya svātantryeṇāvakalpate
GSP33brssbh1u:4814: liṅgavacanavigānācca nāpi puruṣaviṣayasya karotyarthasya kriyāphalasya vāyaṃ nirdeśaḥ, kartṛśabdenaiva tayorapapāttatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4819: tathāpyasati viśeṣopādāne sādhāraṇenārthena saṃnidhānena saṃnihitavastumātrasyāyaṃ nirdeśa iti gamyate na viśiṣṭasya kasyacit /
GSP33brssbh1u:4821: pūrvatra ca jagadekadeśabhūtānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ viśeṣopādānadaviśeṣitaṃ jagadevehopādīyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4822: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ya eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ jagadekadeśabhūtānāṃ kartā,
GSP33brssbh1u:4823: kimanena viśeṣeṇa, yasya kṛtsnameva jagadaviśeṣitaṃ karmeti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4825: ye bālākinā brahmatvābhimatāḥ puruṣāḥ kīrtitāsteṣāmabrahmatvakhyāpanāya viśeṣopādānam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4826: evaṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakanyāyena sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāṃ jagataḥ kartā veditavyatayopadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4832: yatkāraṇaṃ yasmājjīvaṃ bodhayati tasmādasti suptotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4835: ata yaduktaṃ vākyaśeṣagatājjīvaliṅgānmukhyaprāṇaliṅgācca tayorevānyatarasyeha grahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ na parameśvarasyeti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4839: trividhaṃ hyatropāsanamevaṃ sati prasajjyeta jīvopāsanaṃ mukhyaprāṇopāsanaṃ brahmopāsanaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4844: 'sarvānpāpmano 'pahṛtya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyamādhipatyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4849: prāṇaśabdo 'pi brahmaviṣayo dṛṣṭaḥ 'prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ' (chā.
GSP33brssbh1u:4854: anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyām api caivam eke |
GSP33brssbh1u:4855: apica naivātra vivaditavyaṃ jīvapradhānaṃ vedaṃ vākyaṃ syādbrahmapradhānaṃ veti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4859: praśnastāvatsuṣuptapuruṣapratibodhanena prāṇādivyatirikte jīve pratibodhite punarjīvavyatiriktaviṣayo dṛśyate- 'kvaiṣa etadbālāke puruṣo 'śayiṣṭa kva vā etadabhūtkuta etadāgāt' (kau.brā. 4.19) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4860: prativacanamapi 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' ityādi 'etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo lokāḥ' (kau.brā. 4.20) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:4861: suṣuptikāle ca pareṇa brahmaṇā jīva ekatāṃ gacchati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4862: parasmācca brahmaṇaḥ prāṇādikaṃ jagajjāyata iti vedāntamaryādā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4863: tasmādyatrāsya jīvasya niḥsaṃbodhatāsvacchatārūpaḥ svāpa upādhijanitaviśeṣavijñānarahitaṃ svarūpaṃ, yatastaddhaṃśarūpamāgamanaṃ, so
GSP33brssbh1u:4865: apicaivameke śākhino vājasaneyino 'sminneva bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvāde spaṣṭaṃ vijñānamayaśabdena jīvamāmnāya tadvyatiriktaṃ paramātmānamāmananti- 'ya eṣa vijñānamayapuruṣaḥ kvaiṣa tadābhūtkuta
GSP33brssbh1u:4870: 'sarva eta ātmano vyuccaranti' iti copādhimatāmātmanāmanyato vyuccaraṇamāmanantaḥ paramātmānameva kāraṇatvenāmanantīti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4878: bṛhadāraṇyake maitreyībrāhmaṇe 'dhīyate- 'na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya'
GSP33brssbh1u:4879: ityupakramya 'na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyo maitreyyātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' /
GSP33brssbh1u:4880: (bṛ. 4.5.6) iti, tatraitadvicikitsyate- kiṃ vijñānātmaivāyaṃ draṣṭavyaśrotavyatvādirūpeṇopadiśyata āhosvitparamātmeti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4887: patijāyāputravittādikaṃ hi bhogyabhūtaṃ sarvaṃ jagadātmārthatayā priyaṃ bhavatīti priyasaṃsūcitaṃ bhoktāramātmānamukramyānantaramidamātmano darśanādyupadiśyamānaṃ kasyānyasyātmanaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4889: bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tānyevānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāsti' iti prakṛtasyaiva mahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena bruvanvijñānātmanaṃ evedaṃ draṣṭavyatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4890: tathā 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti kartṛvacanena śabdenopasaṃharanvijñānātmānamevehopadiṣṭaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4895: vākyaṃ hīdaṃ paurvāparyeṇāvekṣyamāṇaṃ paramātmānaṃprati anvitāvayavaṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4896: kathamiti, tadupapādyate- 'amṛtatvasya tu nāśāsti vittena' iti yājñavalkyādupaśrutya 'yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kimahaṃ tena kuryāṃ yadeva
GSP33brssbh1u:4897: bhagavānveda tadeva me brūhi' ityamṛtatvamāśāsānāya maitreyyā yājñavalkya
GSP33brssbh1u:4901: nacaitadaupacārikamāśrayituṃ śakyaṃ, yatkāraṇamātmavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāyānantareṇa granthena tadevopapādayati- 'brahma taṃ parādādyo 'nyatrātmano brahma veda' ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4902: yo hi brahmakṣatrādikaṃ jagadātmanonyatra svātantryeṇa labdhasadbhāvaṃ paśyati taṃ mithyādarśinaṃ tadeva mithyādṛṣṭaṃ brahmakṣatrādikaṃ jagatparākarotīti bhedadṛṣṭimapodya 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' iti sarvasya vastujātasyātmāvyatirekamavatārayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4904: 'asya mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasitametadyadṛgvedaḥ' ( bṛ. 4.5.11) ityādinā ca prakṛtasyātmano nāmarūpakarmaprapañcakāraṇatāṃ vyācakṣāṇaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:4906: tathaivaikāyanaprakriyāyāmapi (bṛ. 4.5.12) saviṣayasya sendriyasya sāntaḥkaraṇasya prapañcasyaikāyanamanantaramabāhyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ prajñānaghanaṃ vyācakṣāṇaḥ paramātmānamenaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4920: ṛgvedādikaṃ nāma, iṣṭaṃ hutamiti karma, ayaṃ ca loka iti rūpam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4923: astyatra pratijñā 'ātmani vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati' 'idaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:4925: tasyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ siddhiṃ sūcayatyetalliṅgaṃ yatpriyasaṃsūcitasyātmano draṣṭavyatvādisaṃkīrtanam
GSP33brssbh1u:4926: yadi hi vijñānātmā paramātmano 'nyaḥ syāttataḥ paramātmavijñāne 'pi
GSP33brssbh1u:4927: vijñānātmā na vijñāta ityekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ yatpratijñātaṃ taddhīyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:4931: śrutiścaivaṃ bhavati- 'eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate' (chā. 8.12.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4932: kvacicca jīvāśrayamapi nāmarūpaṃ nadīnidarśanena jñāpayati- 'yathā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudre 'staṃ gacchanti nāmarūpe vihāya /
GSP33brssbh1u:4935: yathā loke nadyaḥ svāśrayameva nāmarūpaṃ vihāya samudramupayantyevaṃ jīvo 'pi svāśrayameva nāmarūpaṃ vihāya paraṃ puruṣamupaitīti hi tatrārthaḥ pratīyate dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayostulyatāyai FN: samutthānamutkrāntiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4942: mantravarṇaśca- 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste (tai.ā. 3.12.7) ityevañjātīyakāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4943: naca tejaḥ prabhṛtīnāṃ sṛṣṭau jīvasya pṛthaksṛṣṭiḥ, śrutā, yena parasmādātmano 'nyastadvikāro jīvaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4944: kāśakṛtsnasyācāryasyāvikṛtaḥ parameśvaro jīvo nānya iti matam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4945: āśmarathyasya tu yadyapi jīvasya parasmādananyatvamabhipretaṃ, tathāpi pratijñāsiddheriti sāpekṣatvābhidhānātkāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kiyānapyabhipreta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4946: auḍulomipakṣe punaḥ spaṣṭamevāvasthāntarāpekṣau bhedābhedau gamyete tatra kāśakṛtsnīyaṃ mataṃ śrutyanusārīti gamyate, pratipādayiṣitārthānusārāt
GSP33brssbh1u:4949: vikārātmakatve hi jīvasyābhyupagamyamāne vikārasya prakṛtisaṃbandhe pralayaprasaṅgānna tajjñānādamṛtamavakalpeta
GSP33brssbh1u:4950: ataśca svāśrayasya nāmarūpasyāsaṃbhavādupādhyāśrayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ jīva upacaryate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4951: ata evotpattirapi jīvasya kvacidagnivisphuliṅgodāharaṇena śrāvyamāṇopādhyāśrayaiva veditavyā
GSP33brssbh1u:4952: yadapyuktaṃ prakṛtasyaiva mahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena darśayanvijñānātmana evedaṃ draṣṭavyatvaṃ darśayatīti, tatrāpiyameva trisūtrī yojayitavyā 'pratijñāsiddherliṅgamāśmarathyaḥ' /
GSP33brssbh1u:4953: idamatra pratijñātam- 'ātmani vidite sarvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati' 'idaṃ sarvaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:4956: tasyā eva pratijñāyāḥ siddhiṃ sūcatyetalliṅgaṃ yanmahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena kathitamityāśmarathya ācāryo manyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4957: abhede hi satyekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñātamavakalpayata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4967: 'atraiva mā bhagavānamūmuhanna pretya saṃjñāsti' iti paryanuyujya svayameva śrutyārthāntarasya darśitatvāt- 'na vā are 'haṃ mohaṃ bravīmyavināśī vā are 'yamātmānucchittidharmā mātrāsaṃsargastvasya
GSP33brssbh1u:4969: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kūṭasthanitya evāyaṃ vijñānaghana ātmā nāsyocchedaprasaṅgo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4971: saṃsargābhāve ca prakṛtasya viśeṣavijñānasyābhāvānna pretya saṃjñāstītyuktamiti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4972: yadapyuktam- 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti kartṛvacanena śabdenopasaṃhārādvijñānātmana evedaṃ draṣṭavyamiti, tadapi kāśakṛtsnīyenaiva darśanena parihapaṇīyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4973: apica 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati' (bṛ. 2.4.13)
GSP33brssbh1u:4974: ityārabhyāvidyāviṣaye tasyaiva darśanādilakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣajñānaṃ prapañcya 'yatra tvasya sarvāmātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' ityādinā vidyāviṣaye tasyaiva darśanādilakṣaṇasya viśeṣavijñānasyābhāvamabhidadhāti punaśca viṣayābhāve 'pi ātmānaṃ vijānīyāt ityāśaṅkya 'vijñātāramare kena
GSP33brssbh1u:4976: tataśca viśeṣavijñānābhāvopapādānaparatvādvākyasya vijñānadhātureva kevalaḥ saṃnbhūtapūrvagatyā kartṛvacanena tṛcā nirdiṣṭa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4978: ataśca vijñānātparamātmanoravidyāpratyupasthāpitanāmarūparacitadehādyupādhinim itto bhedo na pāramārthika ityeṣor'thaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:4987: bhedadarśanāpavādācca 'anyo 'sāvanyo 'hamasmīti na sa veda yathā paśuḥ'
GSP33brssbh1u:4988: (bṛ. 1.4.10), 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ca iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19)
GSP33brssbh1u:4990: 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmājaro 'maro 'mṛto 'bhayo brahma' (bṛ. 4.425) iti cātmani sarvavikriyāpratiṣedhāt
GSP33brssbh1u:4995: 'tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ' (īśā. 7) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:4997: sthite ca kṣetrajñaparamātmaikatvaviṣaya samyagdarśane kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti nāmamātrabhaidāt, kṣetrajño 'yaṃ paramātmano bhinnaḥ paramātmāyaṃ kṣetrajñādbhinna ityevañjātīyaka ātmabhaidaviṣayo nirbandho nirarthakaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:5000: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyām' (tai. 2.1) iti kāñcidevaikāṃ guhāmadhikṛtyaitaduktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:5003: ye tu nirbandhaṃ kurvanti te vedāntārthaṃ bādhamānāḥ śreyodvāraṃ samyagdarśanameva bādhante
GSP33brssbh1u:5008: vicitya nirmāya teṣāṃ nāmāni kṛtvā tatrānupraviśyābhivadannabhivadanādi kurvan /
GSP33brssbh1u:5018: tacca lakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭarucakādīnāṃ mṛtsuvarṇādivatprakṛtitve kulālasuvarṇakārādivannimittatve ca samānamityato bhavati vimarśaḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:5025: īkṣāpūrvakaṃ ca kartṛtvaṃ nimittakāraṇeṣveva kulālādiṣu dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssbh1u:5027: sa ca nyāya ādikartaryapi yuktaḥ saṃkramayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:5029: īśvarāṇāṃ hi rājavaivasvatādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇatvameva kevalaṃ pratīyate tadvatparameśvarasyāpi nimittakāraṇatvameva yuktaṃ pratipattum /
GSP33brssbh1u:5030: kāryaṃ cedaṃ jagatsāvayavamacetanamaśuddhaṃ ca dṛśyate, kāraṇenāpi tasya tādṛśenaiva bhavitavyaṃ, kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyadarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:5031: brahma ca naivaṃlakṣaṇamavagamyate 'niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:5036: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ prakṛtiścopādānakāraṇaṃ ca brahmābhyupagantavyaṃ nimittakāraṇaṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:5041: pratijñā tāvat- 'uta tamādeśamaprākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātam' (chā. 6.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5042: tatra caikena vijñātena sarvamandavijñātamapi vijñātaṃ bhavatīti pratīyate
GSP33brssbh1u:5044: nimittakāraṇāvyatirekāstu kāryasya nāsti, loke takṣṇaḥ prāsādavyatirekadarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:5045: dṛṣṭānto 'pi yathā 'somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam'
GSP33brssbh1u:5047: tathā 'ekena lohamaṇinā sarvaṃ lohamayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt' 'ekena
GSP33brssbh1u:5048: nakhanikṛntanena sarvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt' (chā. 6.1.4,5,6) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:5049: tathānyatrāpi 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati (muṇḍa. 1.1.2) iti pratijñā /
GSP33brssbh1u:5051: tathā 'ātmani kalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāta idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' iti pratijñā /
GSP33brssbh1u:5052: 'sa yathā dundubherhanyamānasya na bāhyāñśabdāñśaknuyādgrahaṇāya dundubhestu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātasya vā śabdo gṛhītaḥ' (bṛ. 4.5.6,7)
GSP33brssbh1u:5054: evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ prativedāntaṃ pratijñādṛṣṭāntau prakṛtitvasādhanau pratyetavyau /
GSP33brssbh1u:5055: yata itīyaṃ pañcamī 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' ityatra 'janikartuḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:5059: yathā hi loke mṛtsuvarṇādikamupādānakāraṇaṃ kulālasuvarṇakārādīnadhiṣṭhātṛnapekṣya pravartate naivaṃ brahmaṇa upādānakāraṇasya sato 'nyo 'dhiṣṭhātāpekṣyo 'sti,
GSP33brssbh1u:5066: niṣkalaṃ niravayavam, niṣkriyamacalam, śāntamapariṇāmi, niravadyaṃ nirastasamastadoṣam /
GSP33brssbh1u:5069: dundubhyāghātasya janakasya janyatayā saṃbandhī vā śabdo viśeṣaśabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:5071: abhidhyopadeśaścātmanaḥ kartṛtvaprakṛtitve gamayati 'so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti' 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:5078: prabhavapralayāvāmnāyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:5080: yaddhi yasmātprabhavati yasmiṃśca pralīyate tattasyopādānaṃ prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh1u:5087: svayamakuruta' (tai. 2.7) ityātmanaḥ karmatvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ta darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:5089: kathaṃ punaḥ pūrvasiddhasya sataḥ kartṛtvena vyavasthitasya kriyamāṇatvaṃ śakyaṃ saṃpādayitum
GSP33brssbh1u:5091: pūrvasiddho 'pi hi sannātmā viśeṣeṇa vikārātmanā pariṇamayāmāsātmānamiti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5095: tasyaiṣor'thaḥ - itaśca prakṛtirbrahma, yatkāraṇaṃ brahmaṇa eva
GSP33brssbh1u:5098: FN: sat pratyakṣaṃ bhūtatrayam, tyat parokṣaṃ bhūtadvayam, niruktaṃ vaktuṃ śakyaṃ ghaṭādi, aniruktaṃ vaktumaśakyaṃ kapotarūpādikam /
GSP33brssbh1u:5100: itaśca prakṛtirbrahma yonirityapi paṭhyate vedānteṣu 'kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:5106: kacitsthānavacano 'pi yoniśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ - 'yoniṣṭa indra niṣade akāri'
GSP33brssbh1u:5108: vākyaśeṣāttvatra prakṛtivacanatā parigṛhyate 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca' (muṇḍa. 1.1.7) ityevañjātīyakāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:5110: yatpunaridamuktamīkṣāpūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ nimittakāraṇeṣveva kulālādiṣu loke dṛṣṭaṃ nopādāneṣvityādi, tatpratyucyate- na lokavadiha bhavitavyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:5115: FN: kartāraṃ kriyāśaktimantam, īśaṃ niyantāram, puruṣaṃ pratyañcam, brahma
GSP33brssbh1u:5117: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ sthānaṃ mayā akāri kṛtam /
GSP33brssbh1u:5122: tasya hi pakṣasyopodbalakāni kānicilliṅgābhāsāni vedānteṣvāpātena mandamatīnpratibhāntīti
GSP33brssbh1u:5124: devalaprabhṛtibhiśca kaiściddharmasūtrakāraiḥ svagrantheṣvāśritaḥ, tena tatpratiṣedhe yatno 'tīva kṛto nāṇvādikāraṇavādapratiṣedhe /
GSP33brssbh1u:5127: ataḥ pradhānamallanibarhaṇanyāyenātidiśati- etena pradhānakāraṇavādapratiṣedhanyāyakalāpena sarve 'ṇvādikāraṇavādā api pratiṣiddhatayā vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:5130: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 4 //
